description_html:
What Impact will you make?

Data Engineer / BI Engineer@ Deloitte Alexander Competence Center

Are you looking for an opportunity in Thessaloniki , that offers you a hybrid working model?

Are you ready to work on international projects for industry-leading clients around the world and elevate your tech consulting career to an international level?

If so, check below for more info about this career opportunity!

You bring passion, we bring opportunities!

#YourOpportunity

Deloitte is a worldwide leader in Professional Services with a presence in more than 150 countries and territories. Since 2018, Deloitte has been operating its Alexander Competence Center in Thessaloniki with satellites in the cities of Patras, Heraklion, and Ioannina - which are model hubs of expertise, training, and innovation, specializing in cutting-edge exponential technologies, in which graduates and young professionals undergo immersive experiences, continuous learning, gaining practical insights and hands-on training that empower them to navigate the complexities of the digital landscape.


Deloitte is an ideal working environment for both young and senior professionals who want to take the next step in their careers, offering them a supportive and international working environment that leverages their expertise and potential. Its corporate culture is based on trust and collaboration and ensures diversity and inclusion so that everyone feels part of a great team.

#AboutYourTeam

Our Data Engineering Team as part of our Engineering, AI & Data service line in Thessaloniki operates in diverse teams, has a detail-oriented mindset and analytical thinking skills, understands and interpret business requirements and transform them into actionable data processes.


In your role in Deloitte, you will be focused on functional analysis and development of data management processes, while working with a progressively - increasing autonomy within multi-functional teams.

For a full coverage of your role, you ought to be able to:

•    Design and implement PaaS solutions using Public Cloud offerings and hybrid clouds.

•    Design and build data analytics solutions on the cloud and on-premise.

•    Design and Develop data pipelines / APIs /ETLs using Python, SQL, PySpark or SSIS and Azure or AWS Methods.

•    Work with large relational databases and big data platforms on data management platforms development and optimization

•    Build large-scale batch and real-time data pipelines with data processing frameworks in AWS or Azure cloud platform.

•    Produce a high-quality work product and collaborate with others to deliver a superior client experience

•    Use an analytical, data-driven approach to drive a deep understanding of fast-changing business.

•    Deliver key messages with clarity, confidence and poise to instill confidence in clients

•    Apply a global and diverse perspective to problem solving

•    Work with a distributed team and deliver your tasks independently

•    Fruitfully cooperate with inter-functional and international teams

Technologies you will work with include but are not limited to, Azure Data Factory, Databricks, Airflow, SQL Server Integration Services, SQL Server Analysis Services, Git, Jira, Oracle Data Integrator, and Qlik Data Integration Suite.

#OurRequierements

Key Qualifications

The ideal candidate meets the following requirements:


•    Bachelor / Master’s degree in Computer science, Software Engineering, Information Technology, or in similar technical-scientific disciplines (e.g., Mathematics, Physics, Statistics);

•    Knowledge of Data Warehouse and Big Data principles and Database and Big Data Technologies

•   At least 2 years of relevant working experience

•    Strong command of SQL, Stored Procedures and ETL flows

•    Working experience in CI/CD

•    Good command of Python

•    Proficient in MS Word, Excel and PowerPoint

•    Eagerness to continuously develop skills on emerging technologies

•    Strong ability to communicate in Greek and English

•    Willingness to travel, domestically and abroad

•    Military obligations fulfilled where applicable

Bonus Qualifications

•    Experience with Azure data services or AWS data Services and ETL tools (e.g., MS SSIS, Oracle Data Integrator etc.) will be considered a plus

•    Experience in DevOps methodologies for Data. Hands-on experience in Azure DevOps will be considered a plus

•    Experience in Financial Services / Energy sector will be considered a plus

The profile is rounded up by excellent analytical skills, precision, self-management capacities and a strong goal-oriented inclination

#WhoWeAreLookingFor

Individuals who have a strong will to expand their knowledge of new technologies, a passion to grow within the company and aspirations for career growth. At Deloitte we foster a consultative culture because the best decisions are made in collaboration with others. We approach our work with a collaborative mindset, teaming across businesses, geographies, and skill sets to deliver tangible, measurable, attributable impact. These are not aspirations, but principles that we all commit to today and every day.

#WhatWeOffer

At Deloitte, we know that great people make a great organization. We value our people and offer employees a broad range of benefits:

🏠 Modern hybrid workplace, characterized by flexibility and Smart Working

⚖ Empowered well-being: We provide multiple program offerings to support your well-being needs (flexible working arrangements, extra days of leave, parental allowances)

🌍 Engagement within international large-scale teams and projects, with opportunities to travel for training or client purposes

📚 Constant opportunities for learning with unlimited access to internal and external learning platforms and sponsored certificates aligned with business needs and technology trends

🚀 Challenging and innovating environment where personal development and growth are encouraged, always with transparency and trust

👬 Diverse culture and active communities that enable you to bring yourself to work

🎉 Team Building and Corporate Social Responsibility Activities

🏃 A buddy to support you with your onboarding

⚕️ Private medical health insurance plan

💳 Ticket restaurant card

 🛍️ Exclusive Discounts to several retail providers, restaurants and others

 📱 Mobile phone

 🍏 Fresh fruits and unlimited coffee everyday at our offices

 Please note that all the well-being benefits mentioned above are subject to annual review


We exist to solve complex problems
 
Our consultants are renowned for their straightforward approach to solving some of the world’s largest and most complex business challenges. Each member of our  team is energized by the challenge a seemingly inscrutable problem presents. Our distinctiveness lies in our refusal to accept a problem at face value - we draw on the depth of our shared insight to ask the right questions, and it’s these questions that uncover answers - answers with impact.
 
We are committed to collaboration
 
Our role is to unlock potential for growth and innovation. We believe this requires real collaboration – with our own networks and with our clients. It is why we commit to truly getting under the skin of our client’s needs, developing a full appreciation for their environment, goals and ambitions. We are also unafraid to challenge.  In so doing, we build long-term and trusted affinities.
 
We create long-term, sustainable impact
 
We often work hand-in-hand with our clients to help find the right solution and to help apply that solution. Our aim is to leave behind ambassadors who are equipped to continue the transformation we began. For us, it is about embedding sustainable change, allowing the impact of our insight to be felt for a long time to come.

 
#AboutDeloitte

title: Junior – Monitor Deloitte
description_html:
Junior – Monitor Deloitte

Stiamo cercando figure junior da inserire nel team di Monitor Deloitte nella sede di Milano, che lavorerà in modalità Hybrid. 

Your Role

Nel ruolo di Analyst, all’interno del team di lavoro la risorsa si occuperà di:

  • Strategic Transformation & Innovation: supporto nella definizione di strategie innovative e sostenibili di business transformation volte alla creazione di valore delle aziende clienti con l’obiettivo di ottimizzare il proprio portafoglio prodotti, adottando un approccio orientato alla differenziazione;
  • Customer Strategy: supporto nella definizione e realizzazione di strategie e processi di trasformazione dei modelli di marketing, customer management e pricing;
  • Digital Strategy: supporto nella definizione di strategie orientate alla digital transformation;
  • M&A Strategy: supporto nella gestione dell’intero processo di M&A, dalla definizione della strategia fino alla selezione del giusto partner passando per la conduzione di una commercial due diligence approfondita, fino alla chiusura del deal e alla relativa gestione del programma di integrazione.

Winning Requirements

  • Laurea Magistrale conseguita oppure a massimo 6 mesi dal suo conseguimento
  • Esperienza da 0 a 1 anni in società di consulenza strategica
  • Brillante percorso accademico in ambito: Economico, Ingegneristico, Informatico, Fisico, Matematico o Statistico
  • Esperienza pregressa in contesti internazionali
  • Ottimo livello di inglese

Make An Impact That Matters

Deloitte è un network leader nei servizi professionali alle imprese, presente in oltre 150 Paesi con 457 mila professionisti. Offriamo soluzioni innovative e sostenibili in Audit & Assurance, Consulting, Financial Advisory, Risk Advisory, Tax e Legal. Il nostro obiettivo è supportare le aziende nello sviluppo e nell'implementazione di strategie al passo con il mercato.

In Deloitte la sostenibilità è un tema centrale. Per questo, attraverso le strategie e le progettualità legate alle tematiche Environmental, Social e Governance (ESG), ci impegniamo a promuovere una crescita responsabile, sostenibile e inclusiva per il Pianeta, le nostre persone e la società. Scopri di più sulle nostre strategie di Corporate Sustainability, tra cui Well-being, la strategia volta a migliorare il benessere fisico, mentale e sociale delle nostre persone, affinché siano felici e piene di energia in tutti gli ambiti della loro vita e WorldClimate, la strategia globale di Deloitte per diventare un’organizzazione Net Zero e per guidare scelte responsabili all’interno e all’esterno dell’organizzazione.

Sei pront* a #MakeAnImpactThatMatter insieme?  Candidati ora! 

La ricerca rispetta il d.lgs. 198/2006, il D.lgs. 215/03 e il D.lgs. 216/03 ed è aperta a candidat* di qualsiasi orientamento o espressione di genere, orientamento sessuale, età, etnia e credo religioso. Il presente annuncio è stato ideato nel rispetto della diversity e dell’inclusività.

title: Junior - Software Engineer
description_html:
Junior - Software Engineer

Stiamo cercando una figura Junior da inserire nella sede di Milano, che lavorerà in modalità Hybrid.

Il business si occupa di accompagnare le aziende nel percorso di trasformazione digitale, con un particolare focus sul settore bancario e dei pagamenti, supportando il Cliente nella progettazione e implementazione di soluzioni innovative basate su tecnologie emergenti. 

Your Role

La risorsa Junior sarà inserita in un team di lavoro, affiancando colleghi senior e occupandosi di:

  • Supportare la progettazione e l’implementazione di soluzioni software per clienti nazionali in ambito Financial Services attraverso l’utilizzo di tecnologie moderne e best practices di sviluppo quali Angular e Java;
  • Collaborare a progetti relativi a tecnologie emergenti come cybersecurity, cloud computing, data analytics, AI/ML, blockchain e sistemi ERP (SAP, Oracle);
  • Lavorare con team multidisciplinari in progettualità che abbracciano il ciclo completo di sviluppo software utilizzando anche le metodologie Agile.
 
Winning Requirements

  • Laurea triennale e/o magistrale in Informatica, Ingegneria, Matematica, Fisica, Statistica o discipline STEM affini;
  • Conoscenze base in ambito programmazione, esperienza pregressa in Java e Angular rappresentano un plus;
  • Familiarità con concetti di data analysis e architetture IT (client-server, microservizi, cloud);
  • Ottime capacità analitiche e di problem solving, con approccio metodico e orientato ai dettagli;
  • Buona conoscenza della lingua inglese;
  • Disponibilità ad operare in trasferta. 

To Make An Impact That Matters

Il network Deloitte, leader nei servizi professionali alle imprese, opera a livello globale in più di 150 Paesi con oltre 460 mila persone.
In Italia, Deloitte è presente in 24 città con circa 13.400 persone che assistono i clienti offrendo servizi di Audit & Assurance, Technology & Transformation, Strategy, Risk & Transactions Advisory e Tax & Legal.

WorldImpact è il nostro programma globale che riunisce tutte le iniziative attraverso cui vogliamo avere un impatto positivo sulle persone, i clienti, l’ambiente e le comunità in cui operiamo.

description_html:
Junior - Data Engineering - NextHub Bari

Stiamo cercando una figura junior da inserire nel team Deloitte NextHub nella sede di Bari, che lavorerà in modalità Hybrid.
Il nostro Hub ha l’obiettivo di fornire ai giovani e a tutti i professionisti solide competenze nella trasformazione digitale del Paese e in particolare nel Mezzogiorno.
 
Your Role

La risorsa Junior sarà inserita in un team di lavoro, affiancando colleghi senior e occupandosi di:

  • Interpretare proattivamente i bisogni dei colleghi e del cliente, individuando metodologie e approcci coerenti
  • Sviluppare iniziative e soluzioni in modo indipendente, raccogliendo e strutturando dati e svolgendo analisi a supporto delle decisioni di business
  • Individuare potenziali rischi e criticità e condividerli tempestivamente con il resto del team
  • Collaborare efficacemente in team eterogenei ed internazionali

  • Database - SQL/PL-SQL, Oracle, Microsoft SQL Server, PostgreSQL, MySQL, Hadoop, HBase, MongoDB, Cloudera, SnowFlake, Palantir, Cosmos DB, Cassandra 
  • Business Intelligence: PowerBI, Qlik, Tableau, SAS Visual Analytics, SAP Business Objects, SAP analytics cloud, Oracle BIEE, AWS quicksight, Microstrategy, Alteryx

Diploma o Laurea con indirizzo STEM
Familiarità con la modellazione di database e il linguaggio SQL

ETL

WorldImpact

title: Audit - The Deloitte ACCA Programme - 2026 Intake
description_html:
AUDIT & ASSURANCE

Audit & Assurance - ACCA Programme


Your Story

Can’t wait to make an impact on the world? You’re not alone. Join us in driving progress in the working world and beyond.


Your Journey with Us

We are looking for ambitious individuals who are eager to start their ACCA journey. Here at Deloitte, we offer continuous support during your studies, as well as providing valuable work experience. You will be contributing to team productivity and working to help solve complex business issues our clients face.


The Audit & Assurance line is looking to add a number of students across teams, namely within but not limited to:


    Assurance
    Audit


    As an ACCA student working in the A&A service line, you will be responsible for proactively assisting clients in their yearly statutory audit, supporting them in helping with decision making whilst navigating their business complexities, risk and opportunities, and being a point of contact for corporate and accounting-related queries.


    What’s in it for you?

      Access to thousands of e-learning courses on our platformAppraisals to help you stay on track and plan your future.Support from mentors, buddies and dedicated learning teamOpportunity for overseas experiencesStudy leave and continuous support during your studiesSalary increments with every successful examination pass.Flexibility to choose your own learning provider to suit your learning styleFully subsidized study courses and materialFull time employment with Deloitte with the option to work reduced hours.

      Feel free to visit the Deloitte ACCA Programme page for more information about this programme.


      Let’ s Talk About You

      You are in the process or about to commence your ACCA journey. You have at least a minimum of two Advanced level certificates in any subject (with grades A, B or C) and a minimum of three Ordinary level certificates, which must include Mathematics and English. You are also eligible to apply if you possess a Bachelors’ degree (preferably 2:1 or higher) or Advanced Diploma in any related field.

      You're a result driven individual who continuously seeks feedback to enhance quality and performance. You’re agile and adaptable but work with precision to ensure we deliver outstanding experiences. You are a strategic thinker and problem solver who will quickly develop close working relationships with others supporting wider processes and policies.


      Why Deloitte?

      World-leading professional services firm, we offer value added services in audit & assurance, risk advisory, accounting, tax & legal, consulting and financial advisory.


      Our client-facing Audit & Assurance practice delivers audit, assurance and advisory services of the highest quality. Covering a wide range of industries and markets, be it financial services in multinational corporations to smaller, owner-managed businesses. Our distinctive audit approach and investment in technology enables our Audit & Assurance team to deliver seamless global accounting and auditing services. We are forward thinking, risk focused and insights based.


      Life looks different for each of us, so we created a varied benefits package that you can tap into:

      • Premium membership for corporate discounts in restaurants, retail, gyms and more.
      • Health Insurance cover for yourself and dependents. 
      • Sponsored mental health support sessions through leading mental health services.
      • Weekly get-togethers.
      • Deloitte Communities to bring our people together and encourage work/life balance, social life and common interests.
      • Hybrid working flexibility subject to business requirements.
      • Digital learning, mentoring and regular performance snapshots. 
      • Renowned training programme with Deloitte University.

      Join us to make an impact together! Apply now!

title: Experienced - Valuation & Modeling - Milano
description_html:
Experienced Valuation & Modeling

Stiamo cercando una figura Associate da inserire nel team Valuation & Modeling di Deloitte nelle sede di Milano che lavorerà in modalità Hybrid.


Your Role

In quanto Associate, all’interno del team di Valuation & Modeling avrai l'opportunità di collaborare con il Top Management delle aziende clienti (aziende corporate e fondi di private equity) ed avrai l’occasione di confrontarti con la dinamicità delle operazioni di finanza straordinaria.
Nello specifico ti occuperai di:
  • Predisporre valutazioni d’azienda e di singoli assets tangibili (PP&E) ed intangibili (es. brand, Intellectual property, patents, customer relationship) attraverso l’utilizzo dei principali metodi di valutazione (DCF, multipli, reddituali)
  • Supportare e partecipare alla realizzazione di modelli finanziari secondo le best practice di mercato prevista per i settori energia rinnovabile e infrastrutture garantendo accuratezza, trasparenza e allineamento con i requisiti richiesti dai clienti
  • Supportare nella predisposizione di analisi di benchmark e analisi di sensitivity da integrare nei modelli finanziari
  • Sviluppare iniziative e soluzioni in modo indipendente confrontandosi con il resto del team

Winning Requirements

  • Laurea specialistica in ambito economico - finanziario o in Ingegneria Gestionale
  • Costituisce requisito preferenziale aver conseguito un Master in Corporate Finance o Finanza Aziendale o altro Master con forte taglio accounting e quantitativo
  • Buona conoscenza dei principi contabili italiani e internazionali
  • Conoscenza di tematiche di capital budgeting (es. stima dell’IRR, NPV, ecc.)
  • Esperienza di 2/3 anni maturata presso società di consulenza strutturate o boutique di corporate finance su tematiche di valutazioni aziendali e costruzione di modelli finanziari
  • Ottima conoscenza dei metodi di valutazione d’azienda e singoli assets (tangibili ed intangibili), conoscenze di business planning e financial modeling
  • Capacità di gestione di modelli finanziari complessi
  • Elevata attitudine a lavorare in team, capacità organizzative e di problem solving
  • Ottima conoscenza della lingua inglese

Make An Impact That Matters


Deloitte è un network leader nei servizi professionali alle imprese, presente in oltre 150 Paesi con 457 mila professionisti. Offriamo soluzioni innovative e sostenibili in Audit & Assurance, Strategy, Risk & Transaction Advisory, Tax & Legal e Technology & Transformation. Il nostro obiettivo è supportare le aziende nello sviluppo e nell'implementazione di strategie al passo con il mercato.
In Deloitte la sostenibilità è un tema centrale. Per questo, attraverso le strategie e le progettualità legate alle tematiche Environmental, Social e Governance (ESG), ci impegniamo a promuovere una crescita responsabile, sostenibile e inclusiva per il Pianeta, le nostre persone e la società. Scopri di più sulle nostre strategie di Corporate Sustainability, tra cui Well-being, la strategia volta a migliorare il benessere fisico, mentale e sociale delle nostre persone, affinché siano felici e piene di energia in tutti gli ambiti della loro vita e WorldClimate, la strategia globale di Deloitte per diventare un’organizzazione Net Zero e per guidare scelte responsabili all’interno e all’esterno dell’organizzazione.

Sei pront* a #MakeAnImpactThatMatter insieme? Candidati ora!

La ricerca rispetta il d.lgs. 198/2006, il D.lgs. 215/03 e il D.lgs. 216/03 ed è aperta a candidat* di qualsiasi orientamento o espressione di genere, orientamento sessuale, età, etnia e credo religioso. Il presente annuncio è stato ideato nel rispetto della diversity e dell’inclusività.

title: Shopify Web Developer @ Thessaloniki
description_html:
What Impact will you make?

Shopify Web Developer @ Thessaloniki

Are you looking for an opportunity in Thessaloniki, that offers you a hybrid working model?

Are you ready to work on international projects for industry-leading clients around the world and elevate your tech consulting career to an international level?

If so, check below for more info about this career opportunity!

You bring passion, we bring opportunities!


#YourOpportunity

Deloitte is a worldwide leader in Professional Services with a presence in more than 150 countries and territories. Since 2018, Deloitte has been operating its Competence Center in Thessaloniki with satellites in the cities of Patras, Heraklion, and Ioannina - which are model hubs of expertise, training, and innovation, specializing in cutting-edge exponential technologies, in which graduates and young professionals undergo immersive experiences, continuous learning, gaining practical insights and hands-on training that empower them to navigate the complexities of the digital landscape.

Deloitte is an ideal working environment for both young and senior professionals who want to take the next step in their careers, offering them a supportive and international working environment that leverages their expertise and potential. Its corporate culture is based on trust and collaboration and ensures diversity and inclusion so that everyone feels part of a great team.


#YourServiceLine: Technology & Transformation

Our Technology & Transformation teams empower organizations to navigate the future through technology-driven business transformation. Combining deep industry knowledge with cutting-edge technology, we deliver tailored solutions that drive innovation, enhance efficiency, promote cybersecurity, and foster sustainable growth.


#AboutYourTeam

Our Deloitte Central Mediterranean practice (Greece, Italy, Malta) hosts our Salesforce Commerce Cloud and Magento/Adobe Commerce competence center. We are growing the pipeline of Italian based clients; thus, we are expanding to support international collaboration opportunities within Deloitte member firms across EMEA.

We are looking for a Shopify Web Developer in Thessaloniki. You will have the chance to participate to important international projects becoming part of a growing, international network. You will be part of a project delivery team, with colleagues in Greece but as well as members of other international offices, including Italy. Delivering front and / or back-end development tasks, as part of an Agile Scrum team. The projects will focus on the delivery of the Shopify platform (Liquid, Hydrogen, Headless).

For a full coverage of your role, you ought to be able to:

  • Work collaboratively with local and remote team members as part of an Agile delivery team.
  • Understand functional documentation (user stories) and be able to translate these into technical solutions.
  • Learn the Shopify platform development and solution design.
  • Implement functional and technical solutions.
  • Improve your technical skills in: HTML5, CSS3/SASS, JavaScript/React, NodeJS, REST API, GraphQL, Git.
  • Perform Testing and Verification (unit, system, integration, and acceptance).
  • Ensure the resolution of complex incidents.
  • Problem management (bug, updates failures) and propose technical solutions.
  • Guarantee the quality of services as requested by our clients and act accordingly to ensure SLA fulfilment.

 

#OurRequierements

Key Qualifications

To qualify for the role, you must have:

  • Degree related to Computer Engineering, Information Engineering, Computer Science, and Information Technology.
  • 1-2 years of professional experience on the Shopify platform.
  • Excellent knowledge of English and strong communication and interpersonal skills, ability to work autonomously but also within a team, high motivation for consulting field and analytical and problem-solving attitude.
  • Proficiency in front-end languages such as JavaScript (ES6+) with a strong focus on React.js and its core principles.
  • Experience with popular React.js workflows.
  • Experience with modern styling frameworks and component libraries such as Tailwind CSS, Material UI (MUI) or Chakra UI.
  • Knowledge of modern front-end build pipelines and tools.
  • Familiarity with RESTful APIs and asynchronous request handling.
  • Ability to write efficient, secure, and clean code.
  • Knowledge the Client-Server model, especially Browser-Web Server interactions.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Ability to work in teams.
  • Flexibility and strong motivation to work in the fast-paced consulting field.
  • Ability to learn and adapt to new technologies quickly.
  • Availability to travel.

Bonus Qualifications

  • Academic or professional hands-on experience in Web Application development.
  • Knowledge of the main performance analysis tools.
  • Experience with agile development methodologies.
  • Experience in creating eCommerce projects.
  • Experience and background on UI/UX and Figma.

The profile is rounded up by excellent analytical skills, precision, self-management capacities and a strong goal-oriented inclination.


Individuals who have a strong will to expand their knowledge of new technologies, a passion to grow within the company and aspirations for career growth. At Deloitte we foster a consultative culture because the best decisions are made in collaboration with others. We approach our work with a collaborative mindset, teaming across businesses, geographies, and skill sets to deliver tangible, measurable, attributable impact. These are not aspirations, but principles that we all commit to today and every day.

#WhatWeOffer

At Deloitte, we know that great people make a great organization. We value our people and offer employees a broad range of benefits:

🏠 Modern hybrid workplace, characterized by flexibility and Smart Working

⚖ Empowered well-being: We provide multiple program offerings to support your well-being needs (flexible working arrangements, extra days of leave, parental allowances)

🌍 Engagement within international large-scale teams and projects, with opportunities to travel for training or client purposes.

📚 Constant opportunities for learning with unlimited access to internal and external learning platforms and sponsored certificates aligned with business needs and technology trends

🚀 Challenging and innovating environment where personal development and growth are encouraged, always with transparency and trust

🌈 Diverse culture and active communities that enable you to bring yourself to work

🎉 Team Building and Corporate Social Responsibility Activities

🏃 A buddy to support you with your onboarding

🌴 Extra days of annual leave

⚕️Private medical health insurance plan

💳 Ticket restaurant card

🏷️Exclusive Discounts to several retail providers, restaurants, and others

📱 Mobile phone

🍏 Fresh fruits and unlimited coffee every day at our offices 

Sounds like the sort of role for you? Apply now.

Location: Thessaloniki

title: Manager Up - SAP EWM
description_html:
Manager Up – SAP EWM

Stiamo cercando una figura Manager/ Senior Manager da inserire nel team SAP di Deloitte nella sede di Milano, Roma, Torino, Napoli, che lavorerà in modalità Hybrid. 
Il business SAP di Deloitte si occupa di supportare i nostri clienti nella individuazione di soluzioni e modelli finalizzati al miglioramento della produttività, efficienza, qualità dei servizi offerti, anche con il supporto delle nuove tecnologie.

Entrando nel Team SAP avrai l’occasione di utilizzare la tecnologia e la conoscenza dei processi per supportare le aziende nei loro percorsi di trasformazione digitale basati sull’implementazione di soluzioni SAP.

Lavoriamo su progetti cross industry, dal food&beverage, al retail & grocery, automotive, fashion & luxury, FSI,e molto altro, spaziando da progetti nazionali a quelli internazionali, collaborando con altre member firm Deloitte.

Il nostro team interviene quando è il momento di re-immaginare i processi di business, tenendo in considerazione anche i dati, i customer insight, le operation, la forza lavoro, i mercati.


Your Role

Il Manager/Senior Manager ricoprirà un ruolo strategico: guidando un team, condividendo il suo know-how e approccio, sarà responsabile delle relazioni con il cliente favorendo lo sviluppo del business occupandosi di:

  • Condurre e gestire progetti, identificando, valutando e progettando le migliori architetture e soluzioni dimostrando eccellenza operativa, visione e pensiero strategico
  • Affrontare e risolvere le sfide tecnologiche dei clienti in modo innovativo ed efficace
  • Impegnarsi con gli stakeholder interni ed esterni per rafforzare le relazioni commerciali e creare opportunità di business 
  • Partecipare a team interfunzionali in tutta la rete Deloitte gestendo progetti di alto livello e strategici, coinvolgendo le giuste capacità per sostenere la consegna del progetto e l'implementazione della soluzione.

 
Winning Requirements

  • Laurea specialistica in economia o ingegneria gestionale
  • Esperienza di almeno 5 anni maturata presso aziende o società di consulenza nell’implementazione o gestione di soluzioni SAP all’interno di progetti nazionali ed internazionali
  • Competenze sul modulo SAP EWM
  • Disponibilità a trasferte in Italia e all’estero
  • Fluente conoscenza della lingua inglese


To Make An Impact That Matters


Il network Deloitte, leader nei servizi professionali alle imprese, opera a livello globale in più di 150 Paesi con oltre 460 mila persone.


In Italia, Deloitte è presente in 24 città con circa 13.400 persone che assistono i clienti offrendo servizi di Audit & Assurance, Technology & Transformation, Strategy, Risk & Transactions Advisory e Tax & Legal.


In qualità di network globale ci impegniamo per affrontare le principali sfide sociali, economiche e ambientali della società di oggi. WorldImpact è il nostro programma globale che riunisce tutte le iniziative attraverso cui vogliamo avere un impatto positivo sulle persone, i clienti, l’ambiente e le comunità in cui operiamo. 

Con Impact for Italy, la declinazione italiana di WorldImpact, Deloitte ha realizzato progetti che – in collaborazione con istituzioni, realtà del terzo settore, università e altri soggetti – hanno lasciato un impatto concreto e una legacy per il futuro su tutto il territorio nazionale.


La ricerca rispetta il d.lgs. 198/2006, il D.lgs. 215/03 e il D.lgs. 216/03 ed è aperta a candidat* di qualsiasi orientamento o espressione di genere, orientamento sessuale, età, etnia e credo religioso. Il presente annuncio è stato ideato nel rispetto della diversity e dell’inclusività.

title: Experienced – Internal Audit & Internal Control System FSI – Milano / Torino / Roma
description_html:
Experienced – Internal Audit & Internal Control System FSI – Milano / Torino / Roma

 

Sei pronto a crescere insieme al team “Controls Assurance FSI”?

Entrando nel Team di Deloitte “Control Assurance FSI” avrai l’opportunità di supportare le attività di advisory e di assurance nell'ambito della Funzione di Internal Audit e – più in generale - dei Sistemi di Controllo Interno per realtà operanti nell’Industry “Financial Services” (Banche, Assicurazioni, SGR, SIM, Istituti di Pagamento e altri Intermediari Finanziari).

In particolare, ti occuperai di:

·     Interpretare proattivamente i bisogni del cliente, individuando metodologie e approcci coerenti;

·     Sviluppare iniziative e soluzioni in modo indipendente, raccogliendo e strutturando dati e svolgendo analisi a supporto delle decisioni di business;

·     Valorizzare il contributo delle risorse più Junior e contribuire alla loro crescita;

·     Individuare potenziali rischi e criticità e condividerli tempestivamente con il resto del Team;

·     Collaborare efficacemente in team eterogenei ed internazionali.

Grazie a questa esperienza, potrai acquisire un bagaglio culturale utile e ampio in questo ambito, operando - in modalità ibrida (in presenza / smart-working) - in una realtà leader nel settore.

 

#YourRole

Saranno prese in considerazione tutte le candidature indistintamente, nel rispetto dei nostri valori ed in linea con la nostra cultura inclusiva.

In quanto Consultant / Senior Consultant / Assistant Manager avrai la possibilità di condividere la tua esperienza e le tue conoscenze con i colleghi più giovani, iniziando a sviluppare capacità di leadership, e individuando la migliore soluzione per il cliente.

Conoscerti ci permetterà di aiutarti a trovare la strada giusta per la tua carriera, scegliendo percorsi di formazione e crescita professionale: con la supervisione dei colleghi e colleghe più esperte, sarai responsabile delle attività progettuali nelle quali sarai coinvolto, e della qualità del tuo lavoro e del tuo allineamento alle priorità, agli obiettivi e alle esigenze dei clienti.

Grazie all’ufficio Learning, avrai modo di seguire corsi e attività di formazione che ti permetteranno di ampliare e approfondire le tue conoscenze.

I colleghi del Talent invece, si occuperanno in maniera strutturata del tuo avanzamento di carriera, con KPI e obiettivi definiti, che se raggiunti, ti garantiranno la revisione del grade e degli economics. 

 

#WinningRequirements

·     Da 2 a 5 anni di comprovata esperienza maturata presso Società di Consulenza, di Revisione Contabile o Intermediari Finanziari (Banche, Assicurazioni, SGR, SIM, Istituti di Pagamento e altri Intermediari Finanziari);

·   Track record in progetti di advisory (es. revisione processi, redazione procedure, disegno metodologie, implementazione sistemi informatici) e/o di assurance (es. audit, verifiche, testing) nell’ambito delle Funzioni Aziendali di Controllo (i.e. Internal Audit, Compliance, Anti-Money Laundering e Risk Management) o – più in generale - dei Sistemi di Controllo Interno di Intermediari Finanziari;

·     Conoscenze rispetto alle normative di settore FSI (quali ad esempio direttive e regolamenti UE, TUB, TUF e CAP, regolamenti, circolari e provvedimenti di Banca d’Italia, IVASS e CONSOB), alle Funzioni Aziendali di Controllo (i.e. Internal Audit, Compliance, Anti-Money Laundering e Risk Management) e ai principali Sistemi di Controllo Interno (Basilea, COSO, D.Lgs. 231/2001, L. 262/2005, SOX/ Sarbanes-Oxley Act, J-SOX, UK-SOX…);

·     TCF - Tax Control Framework;

·    Capacità di analisi critica e di mappatura dei processi aziendali, volta all’intercettazione di rischi e all’identificazione delle opportunità di mitigazione degli stessi e miglioramento / efficientamento;

·     Autonomia nel relazionarsi con il cliente e/o con le strutture interne della propria azienda e nel predisporre i deliverable;

·     Capacità di supervisionare e coordinare le risorse junior;

·     Proattività nello svolgimento del lavoro e spirito d’iniziativa; 

·     Disponibilità a viaggi e trasferte in Italia e all’estero;

·     Laurea in ambito economico, giuridico o ingegneristico-gestionale;

·   Eventuale Master / Specializzazione (tale titolo di studio costituirà titolo preferenziale qualora sia attinente agli ambiti di competenza elencati sopra);

·     Pacchetto Microsoft Office (in particolare conoscenza avanzata di excel, power point e word);

·     Strumenti e tools di GRC;

·     Conoscenza fluente di inglese scritto e parlato (ulteriori lingue costituiranno un plus).

  

#Make An Impact That Matters

Deloitte è un network leader nei servizi professionali alle imprese, presente in oltre 150 Paesi con 457 mila professionisti. Offriamo soluzioni innovative e sostenibili in Audit & Assurance, Strategy, Risk & Transaction Advisory, Tax & Legal e Technology & Transformation. Il nostro obiettivo è supportare le aziende nello sviluppo e nell'implementazione di strategie al passo con il mercato.

In Deloitte la sostenibilità è un tema centrale. Per questo, attraverso le strategie e le progettualità legate alle tematiche Environmental, Social e Governance (ESG), ci impegniamo a promuovere una crescita responsabile, sostenibile e inclusiva per il Pianeta, le nostre persone e la società. Scopri di più sulle nostre strategie di Corporate Sustainability, tra cui Well-being, la strategia volta a migliorare il benessere fisico, mentale e sociale delle nostre persone, affinché siano felici e piene di energia in tutti gli ambiti della loro vita e WorldClimate, la strategia globale di Deloitte per diventare un’organizzazione Net Zero e per guidare scelte responsabili all’interno e all’esterno dell’organizzazione.

Sei pront* a #MakeAnImpactThatMatter insieme? Candidati ora!

La ricerca rispetta il d.lgs. 198/2006, il D.lgs. 215/03 e il D.lgs. 216/03 ed è aperta a candidat* di qualsiasi orientamento o espressione di genere, orientamento sessuale, età, etnia e credo religioso. Il presente annuncio è stato ideato nel rispetto della diversity e dell’inclusività.

title: Operating Model & Organization Design Analyst - Italian Speaker @ Thessaloniki
description_html:
Operating Model & Organization Design Analyst @ Thessaloniki

What Impact will you make?

#YourOpportunity
Deloitte is a global leader in professional services, with a presence in over 150 countries and territories. Since 2018, Deloitte has developed a Competence Center in Greece with locations in Thessaloniki, Patras, Heraklion, and Ioannina – true hubs of expertise, training, and innovation. These centers offer young professionals immersive and hands-on experiences, continuous learning opportunities, and a practical understanding of digital skills. 
Joining Deloitte means being part of a dynamic, international, and collaborative environment where both junior and experienced professionals can grow, supported by a culture based on trust, inclusion, and teamwork. 

#YourServiceLine: Technology & Transformation
Our Technology & Transformation teams drive business transformation through digital innovation. By combining deep industry knowledge with cutting-edge technology, we deliver tailored solutions that foster innovation, enhance efficiency, ensure security, and promote sustainable growth. We support national and international clients in building digital strategies and enabling new working models. 

#AboutYourTeam
We support leading national and international players in managing complex transformation programs, helping them identify, develop, and implement agile, flexible and scalable organizational models that can enable and drive the evolving business strategy, delivering continuous value to all stakeholders.
We assist our clients in designing resilient and robust organizations capable of withstanding internal and market disruptions, maximizing performance, managing change, attracting and developing talent and evolving ways of working.
 
Our Team focuses on the following key areas of activity:
• Analysis and design of corporate organizational models, defining both the macro and micro organizational structures (e.g., organizational charts, functional charts, span of control, organizational layers, etc.) and Governance Models (e.g., roles, responsibilities, communication and collaboration mechanisms, decision-making and escalation processes, etc.).
• Evolution of operating models and corporate ways of working (Target Operating Model), including strategic assessment of transformation programs and design of the TOM’s key dimensions (organization, processes, ways of working, systems, etc.).
• Qualitative and quantitative analysis of organizational sizing (e.g., process metrics, headcount/Full-Time Equivalent, skills, etc.) and definition of rightsizing models aimed at maximizing process and activity effectiveness and efficiency.
• Process analysis and optimization, identifying functional areas for improvement and intervention actions to enable operational efficiency and ensure optimal cost management, while emphasizing key activities that contribute to value creation and competitive advantage.
• Design of HR strategies and organizational development models to optimize the employee experience, evolve corporate culture and climate, enhance organizational talent, and strengthen the HR function’s role as a strategic business partner. 

#Your Role
As Operating Model & Organization Design Analyst, you will focus on the proactive and responsible execution of the project activities you are involved in. Under the guidance of more experienced colleagues, you will be accountable for the quality of your work and its full alignment with priorities, objectives, and client needs, consistently striving to achieve our ambition: “make an impact that matters”.

Key Activities
• Collect and analyze data to drive project initiatives
• Create presentations and documentation to support project delivery
• Collaborate proactively with the project team to achieve shared goals
• Communicate ideas and proposals clearly and effectively
• Focus on results, take ownership of your work, and ensure high-quality outcomes
• Demonstrate strong teamwork, actively supporting colleagues while maintaining a positive and constructive attitude
 
#OurRequirements
Qualifications and Required Skills:
• Bachelor's degree in Economics or Management Engineering 
• Strong interest in Organization Design topics
• Excellent command of the English language. Good command of English. Knowledge of Italian Language will be considered as a plus
• Strong analytical skills and a problem-solving mindset
• High motivation for the consulting sector
• Organizational autonomy, initiative, and creativity
• Team-oriented approach
• Master's degree in Economics or Management Engineering is a plus
• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills (both written and verbal)


Nice to Have:
• Knowledge of Data Analytics tools (e.g. Tableau, PowerBI,…)
• Knowledge of Organizational Frameworks
• Familiarity with HR Management processs
 
#WhoWeAreLookingFor
We are looking for young professionals passionate about Organization Design, eager to grow their skills in a dynamic, cross-functional environment. You are proactive, collaborative, enthusiastic about emerging technologies, and ready to make a tangible impact in transforming how people learn. 
At Deloitte, we promote collective growth: we believe in teamwork, continuous learning, and the power to make an impact that matters – every day. 

#WhatWeOffer
At Deloitte, we know that great people make a great organization. We value our people and offer employees a broad range of benefits:

🏠 Modern hybrid workplace, characterized by flexibility and Smart Working
⚖ Empowered well-being: We provide multiple program offerings to support your well-being needs (flexible working arrangements, extra days of leave, parental allowances)
🌍 Engagement within international large-scale teams and projects, with opportunities to travel for training or client purposes.
📚 Constant opportunities for learning with unlimited access to internal and external learning platforms and sponsored certificates aligned with business needs and technology trends
🚀 Challenging and innovating environment where personal development and growth are encouraged, always with transparency and trust
🏳️‍🌈 Diverse culture and active communities that enable you to bring yourself to work
🎉 Team Building and Corporate Social Responsibility Activities
🏃 A buddy to support you with your onboarding
⚕ Private medical health insurance plan
💳 Ticket restaurant card
🛍️ Exclusive Discounts to several retail providers, restaurants and others
📱 Mobile phone
🍏 Fresh fruits and unlimited coffee everyday at our offices

Please note that all the well-being benefits mentioned above are subject to annual review.

Sounds like the sort of role for you? Apply now.

title: Experienced – Functional Analyst – Nexthub Bari
description_html:
Experienced – Functional Analyst – Nexthub Bari

Stiamo cercando una figura consultant da inserire nel team Customer Product di Deloitte NextHub nella sede di Bari, che lavorerà in modalità Hybrid. 
Il team si occupa di supportare i nostri clienti nell'identificazione di soluzioni e modelli mirati a migliorare la produttività, l'efficienza e la qualità dei servizi offerti, anche con il supporto delle nuove tecnologie.


Your Role
La risorsa Experienced verrà inserita in un team di lavoro e si occuperà di:

  • Identificare i bisogni del cliente e contribuire alla formulazione delle più opportune soluzioni progettuali, utilizzando un approccio strutturato ed orientato al problem solving;
  • Contribuire a creare una relazione di fiducia, positiva e collaborativa, all’interno del team e con il cliente;
  • Mostrare maturità professionale in situazioni complesse e delicate, fungendo da punto di riferimento per i colleghi junior;
  • Definire soluzioni innovative, ad esempio basate su nuove metodologie e nuove tecnologie, in collaborazione con i colleghi esperti in materia.


Winning Requirements
  • Laurea in Ingegneria gestionale, o ambito STEM; 
  • Almeno 2 anni di esperienza nella definizione dei requisiti di business/ funzionali nell’ambito di progetti di trasformazione ed evoluzione di strumenti esistenti (anche custom) ovvero adozione di nuove piattaforme;
  • Capacità di coordinamento di un team tecnico;
  • Capacità di gestione del cliente e organizzazione del lavoro (Organizzazione meeting, stesura documenti, supporto alle sessioni di test);
  • Capacità di lavorare in modalità Agile o Waterfall;
  • Conoscenza degli approcci e delle modalità di identificazione e valutazione di possibili fornitori, partner di piattaforme e/o soluzioni;
  • Dimestichezza con l’applicazione di possibili soluzioni di efficientamento ed evoluzione dei processi;
  • Conoscenza della lingua inglese;
  • Disponibilità a trasferte.


To Make an Impact that Matters

Il network Deloitte, leader nei servizi professionali alle imprese, opera a livello globale in più di 150 Paesi con oltre 460 mila persone. 
In Italia, Deloitte è presente in 24 città con circa 13.400 persone che assistono i clienti offrendo servizi di Audit & Assurance, Technology & Transformantion, Strategy, Risk & Transactions Advisory e Tax & Legal.

In qualità di network globale ci impegniamo per affrontare le principali sfide sociali, economiche e ambientali della società di oggi. WorldImpact è il nostro programma globale che riunisce tutte le iniziative attraverso cui vogliamo avere un impatto positivo sulle persone, i clienti, l’ambiente e le comunità in cui operiamo. 
Con Impact for Italy, la declinazione italiana di WorldImpact, Deloitte ha realizzato progetti che – in collaborazione con istituzioni, realtà del terzo settore, università e altri soggetti – hanno lasciato un impatto concreto e una legacy per il futuro su tutto il territorio nazionale.

La ricerca rispetta il d.lgs. 198/2006, il D.lgs. 215/03 e il D.lgs. 216/03 ed è aperta a candidat* di qualsiasi orientamento o espressione di genere, orientamento sessuale, età, etnia e credo religioso. Il presente annuncio è stato ideato nel rispetto della diversity e dell’inclusività.

title: Junior Cybersecurity Analyst (OT/IoT)| Cyber @Thessaloniki
description_html:
What Impact will you make?

Are you looking for an opportunity in Thessaloniki, that offers you a hybrid working model?

Are you ready to work on international projects for industry-leading clients around the world and elevate your tech consulting career to an international level?

If so, check below for more info about this career opportunity!

You bring passion, we bring opportunities!

#YourOpportunity 

Deloitte is a worldwide leader in Professional Services with a presence in more than 150 countries and territories. Since 2018, Deloitte has been operating its Alexander Competence Center in Thessaloniki with satellites in the cities of Patras, Heraklion, and Ioannina - which are model hubs of expertise, training, and innovation, specializing in cutting-edge exponential technologies, in which graduates and young professionals undergo immersive experiences, continuous learning, gaining practical insights and hands-on training that empower them to navigate the complexities of the digital landscape. 

Deloitte is an ideal working environment for both young and senior professionals who want to take the next step in their careers, offering them a supportive and international working environment that leverages their expertise and potential. Its corporate culture is based on trust and collaboration and ensures diversity and inclusion so that everyone feels part of a great team. 

We are currently seeking for ambitious team players to become part of our Emerging Technologies team within our Technology & Transformation department in Thessaloniki.

#Would you like to learn more AboutYourTeam

Our Cyber Emerging Technologies Team sits within Cyber and Technology & Transformation, one of the fastest growing practices in Deloitte.

We are looking for a junior member of staff to join our team specialized in the study, support and implementation of specific cybersecurity solutions for the OT (Operational Technology) and IoT (Internet of Things) sectors.

We work to innovate and protect critical infrastructures, industrial systems and connected devices, contributing to the digital security of companies.

In our  team, you will improve your knowledge and experiences working in a global team of diverse and talented professionals that enjoy designing cybersecurity architectures, identifying new cybersecurity technologies for industrial environments as well as helping our clients exploring the cyber risks dimension for smart factories and operational fields, for market leading companies in diverse industries at international level (Energy, Manufacturing, Utilities, Hospitality, Life Sciences & Healthcare).

Below you can find some daily tasks of your potential role:

  • Collect and analyze data to identify risks and vulnerabilities in OT/IoT environments
  • Analyze distributed IoT systems and recommend actions to increase reliability
  • Collaborate proactively with the project team to develop and implement innovative cybersecurity solutions.
  • Support customers in adopting protection strategies for critical infrastructures and connected devices.

#OurRequirements

Key Qualifications

  • Bachelor's/ Master's degree in Computer or Telecommunication engineer
  • Proficient knowledge of English
  • Passion for computer networks and systems (Linux and Windows OS)

·       Be an independent and collaborative person who cooperates in one or more project teams to deliver high quality results

B    Bonus Qualifications

Some experiences in the following areas:

  • Cyber risk assessments (IRAM2), Threat modeling (STRIDE, PASTA)
  • Cyber Security: NGFW, XDR, SRA, SIEM, ZTNA, SSE
  • Networking: Routing, Switching, ACL, VPN, SPAN, SD-WAN

    If you're ready to take your career to the next level in a challenging international environment, focusing on continuous learning and dynamic teamwork, both in Greece and abroad, you're ready for Deloitte!

    #WhatWeOffer

    At Deloitte, we know that great people make a great organization. We value our people and offer employees a broad range of benefits:

    🏠 Modern hybrid workplace, characterized by flexibility and Smart Working

    ⚖ Empowered well-being: We provide multiple program offerings to support your well-being needs (flexible working arrangements, extra days of leave, parental allowances) 

    🌍 Engagement within international large-scale teams and projects, with opportunities to travel for training or client purposes. 

    📚 Constant opportunities for learning with unlimited access to internal and external learning platforms and sponsored certificates aligned with business needs and technology trends 

    🚀 Challenging and innovating environment where personal development and growth are encouraged, always with transparency and trust 

    ? Diverse culture and active communities that enable you to bring yourself to work  

    🎉 Team Building and Corporate Social Responsibility Activities
    🏃 A buddy to support you with your onboarding
    🌴 Extra days of annual leave

    ⚕ Private medical health insurance plan 

    💳 Ticket restaurant card 

    ? Exclusive Discounts to several retail providers, restaurants and others 

    📱  Mobile phone 

    🍏 Fresh fruits and unlimited coffee everyday at our offices  

    Please note that all the well-being benefits mentioned above are subject to annual review


    About Deloitte
     
    #OurServices
    Deloitte offers integrated services that include Audit, Technology & Transformation, Strategy Risk & Transactions Advisory, Tax and Legal. Our approach combines insight and innovation from multiple disciplines with global business and industry expertise to help our clients excel anywhere in the world. We deliver outstanding impact on the reputation and success of our clients, in Italy and globally. In pursuing this we contribute to a sustainable and prosperous society, and are firm believers in the positive impact business can and should have on the world it operates within.
     
    #OurPurpose
    We are led by a purpose, to make an impact that matters with clients, people and society. This purpose defines who we are and what we stand for. It's not about being the biggest. It’s about being the first choice for the largest and most influential clients, and the first choice for the best talent.
     
    #OurValues
    At Deloitte we foster a collaborative culture where talented individuals can produce their best work. We value innovative thinking, diverse insights and a genuinely distinctive level of customer service through our expertise and professionalism. We value difference, with respect at the heart of our inclusive culture.
     
    #OurTalentExperience
    From day one at our firm, practitioners are part of a community. Our development and career progression framework will help them develop the skills and capabilities to succeed. The wellness of our people and the ability to offer agile working arrangements is at the center of our unique talent experience. We create a workplace that encourages collaboration, creativity, inclusiveness to ensure our staff are supported, encouraged and feel a sense of purpose and meaning in what they do each day.

    Sounds like the sort of role for you? Apply now. 

    Location: Thessaloniki

title: Experienced Technology Consultant - Engineering, AI & Data
description_html:
Experienced Technology Consultant - Engineering, AI & Data


What Impact will you make?


#YourOpportunity

Deloitte is proud to be named the no. 1 consulting service provider in the world by Gartner and the most valuable and strongest commercial services brand in the world by Brand Finance.

We are delivering business advisory and technology-enabled business transformations across the globe, always with a focus to our vision: to make an impact that matters. Within Deloitte, the Engineering, AI & Data team focuses on delivering trusted high-end technology advisory services.

Under this framework, we are currently looking for an enthusiastic Experienced Technology Consultant to become part of our dynamic Technology & Transformation team in our offices in Athens. In this role, you’ll work within a team to help clients transform their technology platforms and business operations. Partnering with some of the world’s largest organizations, you’ll help COO’s, CFO’s, CIO’s and their teams realize their ambitions – from improving financial performance, to accelerating speed to market and delivering continuous innovation.

#YourRole

Your role as an Experienced Technology Consultant will focus on the delivery of client engagements, by understanding objectives for clients and Deloitte, aligning your own work to objectives and setting personal priorities, teaming with others across businesses and borders and taking accountability for own and team results.

In this role, you will build relationships and exercise your communication skills in order to positively influence your peers and other stakeholders. You will commit to personal learning and development by actively seeking opportunities for growth, you will share knowledge and experience with others, and act as a strong brand ambassador, embracing our purpose and values in order to put these into practice in your professional life.

During your tenure as an Experienced Technology Consultant, you will demonstrate and develop your ability to:

  • Support project delivery at the intersection of business and IT, assisting in the design and execution of advisory and transformation initiatives;
  • Collaborate with clients, including D - level and C - level executives, to define objectives and align solutions with business and technology strategies;
  • Contribute to the development of IT Strategy, IT Masterplans, and Digital Roadmaps, ensuring alignment with client priorities;
  • Manage internal and external stakeholders, fostering effective communication and strong relationships;
  • Assist in the design and implementation of IT Operating Models and IT Delivery Models, supporting process optimization and efficiency;
  • Support execution of IT Due Diligence and Technology Benchmarking assessments, gathering and analyzing data under guidance;
  • Contribute to IT Financial Management activities, including investment analysis, budgeting, and cost optimization tracking;
  • Assist in the design and application of IT Governance frameworks, as well as Portfolio and Project Management practices;
  • Prepare documentation, presentations, and reports to communicate progress, outcomes, and recommendations to stakeholders;
  • Engage with clients on-site where necessary, supporting workshops, presentations, and collaborative sessions to ensure alignment and satisfaction.


#WinningRequirements

To qualify for the role you must have:

  • Bachelor’s degree in, Business Administration, Computer Science, Engineering , or a related field; postgraduate studies (MBA, MSc) are considered an asset;.
  • At least 3 years of professional experience in consulting or an equivalent advisory role, with proven involvement in IT strategy, IT governance, IT operating model design, digital transformation, IT financial management, or related areas;
  • Strong IT background combined with business understanding, with the ability to bridge technology solutions and business value;
  • Proven experience in developing client-ready deliverables such as presentations, reports, and business cases;
  • Excellent analytical and problem - solving skills, with the ability to translate findings into actionable recommendations;
  • Strong interpersonal and communication skills, with stakeholder management experience; prior exposure to C- level executives is considered an advantage;
  • Fluency in both Greek and English (written and spoken) is required;
  • Military obligations fulfilled, where applicable.

#AboutTechnology&Transformation 

Six core competency areas make up our Technology & Transformation service line:

  • Cyber;
  • Engineering, AI & Data;
  • Enterprise, Technology & Performance;
  • Finance Transformation;
  • Deloitte Digital;
  • Human Capital.

We exist to solve complex problems

Our consultants are renowned for their straightforward approach to solving some of the world’s largest and most complex business challenges. Each member of our Technology & Transformation team is energized by the challenge a seemingly inscrutable problem presents. Our distinctiveness lies in our refusal to accept a problem at face value - we draw on the depth of our shared insight to ask the right questions, and it’s these questions that uncover answers - answers with impact.

We are committed to collaboration

Our role is to unlock potential for growth and innovation. We believe this requires real collaboration – with our own networks and with our clients. It’s why we commit to truly getting under the skin of our client’s needs, developing a full appreciation for their environment, goals and ambitions. We’re also unafraid to challenge.  In so doing, we build long-term and trusted affinities.

We create long-term, sustainable impact  

We often work hand-in-hand with our clients to help find the right solution and to help apply that solution. Our aim is to leave behind ambassadors who are equipped to continue the transformation we began. For us, it’s about embedding sustainable change, allowing the impact of our insight to be felt for a long time to come.


WHY DELOITTE

At Deloitte, we create positively differentiated work experiences that enable our people to feel valued and achieve their full potential. We value difference, and embrace people with diverse backgrounds and thinking styles. Knowing that people work best in different ways, we are happy to discuss alternative arrangements if the working pattern you are looking for is not specifically indicated.

ABOUT DELOITTE

Our services

Deloitte operates in Greece since 1975, as a member of one of the world’s largest professional services networks, Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu. With offices in Athens, Thessaloniki, Heraklion, Patras and Ioannina, Deloitte Greece employs more than 2,900 professionals.

After 50 years of successful and dynamic presence in the Greek market, we bring an unmatched breadth and depth of expertise across audit and assurance, technology & transformation, tax & legal and strategy, risk & transactions advisory services. Operating in a multidisciplinary model enables us to draw from a pool of world-class talent, identifying the ideal skillset for each project, and to collaborate across businesses, to solve the toughest, most challenging issues of our clients. It is with them that we have built a trusted relationship, by delivering innovative solutions and utilizing state-of-the-art tools and technologies across all industries- Consumer Products, Energy Resources & Industrials, Financial Services, Life Sciences & Health Care, Government & Public Services, Technology, Media & Telecommunications.

Our Purpose

Our purpose, “To make an impact that matters for our clients, our people and society “- defines who we are and what we stand for. This is not about size, it's about being the first choice. The first choice for the largest and most influential clients, and the first choice for the best talent.

Our values

At Deloitte we foster a collaborative culture where talented individuals can produce their best work. We value innovative thinking, diverse insights and a genuinely distinctive level of customer service through our expertise and professionalism.

We value difference, with respect at the heart of our inclusive culture.

Our talent experience

From day one at our firm, practitioners are part of a community. Our development and career progression framework will help them develop the skills and capabilities to succeed. The wellness of our people and the ability to offer agile working arrangements is at the centre of our unique talent experience. We create a workplace that encourages collaboration, creativity, inclusiveness to ensure our staff are supported, encouraged and feel a sense of purpose and meaning in what they do each day.


Sounds like the sort of role for you? Apply now.

  • Lead the architecture, development, and deployment of end - to - end AI systems - from data ingestion and model training to productionization and monitoring;
  • Evaluate, fine - tune and optimize Machine Learning and Large Language Models (LLMs) for domain - and client - specific applications;
  • Design and impelement Retrieval  Augmented Generation (RAG), agentic, and multi - agent AI workflows that enhance contextual understanding, reasoning, and automation.
  • Build and orchestrate autonomous AI agents using frameworks such as LangGraph, CrewAI, or AutoGen, integrating them into scalable enterprise ecosystems;
  • Integrate AI models into enterprise systems, ensuring scalability, performance, and security across cloud and on-prem environments;
  • Collaborate cross - functionally with business, data, and technology teams to translate business needs into robust technical solutions;
  • Contribute to AI governance and Responsible AI practices, ensuring ethical, explainable, and compliant model deployments;
  • Guide and mentor junior engineers, fostering innovation, technical excellence, and continuous learning;
  • Engage with client leadership to identify AI opportunities, define strategic roadmaps, and drive transformation initiatives; 
  • Develop AI accelerators, reusable assets, and best practices within Deloitte's community.

  • Bachelor’s and/or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related STEM field; 
  • 5+ years of experience in designing, building, and deploying AI/ML solutions, ideally within a consulting or large-scale enterprise environments;

  • Strong experience with cloud platforms (Azure, AWS, or GCP) and MLOps practices (CI/CD, model monitoring, and versioning);
  • Solid understanding of data pipelines, API development, and scalable architectures using Docker and Kubernetes;
  • Exposure to responsible AI principles, model interpretability, bias mitigation, and governance frameworks;

title: Data Engineer – ESG & Sustainability @Thessaloniki
description_html:
What Impact will you make?

Are you looking for an opportunity in Thessaloniki that offers you a hybrid working model?

Are you ready to work on large scale projects for industry-leading clients around the world and elevate your career to an international level?

If so, check below for more info about this career opportunity!

You bring passion, we bring opportunities!

#YourOpportunity

Deloitte is a worldwide leader in Professional Services with a presence in more than 150 countries and territories. Since 2018, Deloitte has been operating its Competence Center in Thessaloniki with satellites in the cities of Patras, Heraklion, and Ioannina - which are model hubs of expertise, training, and innovation, specializing in cutting-edge exponential technologies, in which graduates and young professionals undergo immersive experiences, continuous learning, gaining practical insights and hands-on training that empower them to navigate the complexities of the digital landscape.

Deloitte is an ideal working environment for both young and senior professionals who want to take the next step in their careers, offering them a supportive and international working environment that leverages their expertise and potential. Its corporate culture is based on trust and collaboration and ensures diversity and inclusion so that everyone feels part of a great team.

We are currently looking for ambitious team-players to join our dynamic and highly motivating team in Thessaloniki.

#YourServiceLine

Strategy, Risk & Transactions (SR&T) Advisory

Strategy, Risk & Transactions (SR&T) is an end-to-end strategic advisory practice, enabling our C-suite clients to make informed, robust decisions and strategic choices. It integrates the full scale of Deloitte's M&A capabilities, consolidates Climate & Sustainability advisory capabilities, and tightens the connection between strategy development and risk management to assist clients with navigating uncertainty and change.

#AboutYourTeam

The Sustainability team is a key department with an ambitious plan in terms of growth, innovation, talent management and market recognition.

You will be part of a dynamic team that takes a practical and business-focused approach to helping companies integrate sustainability into their strategy and operations as a way to improve business continuity, build brand value, and enhance risk resilience with the goal of supporting business growth and mitigating environmental footprints. Our professionals work with companies to evaluate and develop sustainable strategies that can help drive toward near-term and long-term results, and support companies in the implementation of such strategies.

Our talented professionals are unified by a collaborative culture that fosters integrity, outstanding value to markets and clients, commitment to each other, and strength from cultural diversity.

#AboutYourRole

As a Consultant, you will play a pivotal role in supporting our clients in identifying, assessing, and managing risks that may impact their business objectives. This role offers a unique opportunity to work on diverse projects, collaborating with cross-functional teams and leveraging your expertise to deliver value-added insights.

At the crossroads of Sustainability, Finance and Technology, we are looking for ambitious, sustainability oriented, technology proficient team players to join our growing team in our offices in Thessaloniki. As Sustainability Consultant you will:

  • Join a dynamic team, passionate about helping our clients' sustainability organization
  • Work in a collaborative team environment to analyze issues and address client challenges
  • Be trained and coached to develop your knowledge and skills, management and business development capabilities
  • Develop specialized ESG technology implementation expertise and build a reputation as a business advisor
  • Contribute to firm initiatives by supporting the development of proposals, thought leadership, market facing initiatives and recruitment

You will drive our client’s operations to the next level through:

  • Defining the IT architecture and systems’ strategy for the selection of new corporate sustainability reporting software
  • Blueprinting the sustainability processes, internal controls and implementing new sustainability technology/software (focused on Watershed and Workiva) and processes
  • Engaging with client teams to identify gaps and inconsistencies in data points, to ensure their contributions align with ESRS requirements
  • Process data and perform a set of checks and balances to identify missing or incomplete data, ensure accuracy and consistency
  • Using Watershed, measuring the company's carbon footprint, which involves the collection and preparation of activity data, accurate mapping to the relevant Greenhouse Gas (GHG) categories, and thorough reporting of the company's emissions.
  • Using Workiva, executing double materiality and creating the CSRD Reporting
  • Operating in the sustainability consolidation and reporting department of our clients
  • Improving the corporate sustainability, financial and non-financial performance management and reporting cycles

#OurRequirements

University degree ideally in economics, computer science, engineering, or a technically oriented field or equally by experience

title: Junior - Java Developer
description_html:
Junior – Java Developer

Stiamo cercando una figura junior da inserire sulla sede di Milano e che lavorerà in modalità Hybrid.

Il business si occupa di supportare i nostri clienti nella individuazione di soluzioni e modelli finalizzati al miglioramento della produttività, efficienza, qualità dei servizi offerti, anche con il supporto delle nuove tecnologie, lavorando su API che consentono a terze parti di accedere ai dati bancari dei clienti, in conformità con gli standard di sicurezza e regolamentari (PSD2, PSD3, Open Banking, Berlin group).

Your Role

La risorsa Junior sarà inserita in un team di lavoro, affiancando colleghi senior e occupandosi di:

  • Sviluppo e Manutenzione di API PSD2/Open Banking su architettura a microservizi cloud native, che consentono a terze parti di accedere ai dati bancari dei clienti, collaborando con team interni ed esterni per integrare le API con sistemi esistenti e nuovi;
  • Gestione della Sicurezza e della Conformità: identificazione e risoluzione delle vulnerabilità di sicurezza nelle implementazioni PSD2 e open banking, implementazione di strumenti e processi per monitorare continuamente la sicurezza delle API e dei sistemi associati;
  • Automazione dei Test: utilizzo di strumenti come JMeter, Selenium IDE, e altri per automatizzare i test delle API e garantire che funzionino correttamente sotto diverse condizioni ed esecuzione di test di verifica e validazione per assicurare che le API rispettino gli standard di qualità e sicurezza;
  • Innovazione e Miglioramento Continuo: esplorazione di nuove tecnologie e metodologie per migliorare le soluzioni di open banking e PSD2, ed identificazione di opportunità per migliorare l'efficienza e ridurre i costi attraverso l'ottimizzazione dei processi esistenti

Winning Requirements

  • Laurea specialistica in materie STEM (Ingegneria, Informatica, Matematica, Fisica, Statistica)
  • Buona conoscenza del linguaggio Java (sarà considerato plus avere già maturato esperienza su API Gateway)
  • Buona conoscenza della lingua inglese (parlata e scritta)
  • Disponibilità a trasferte sul territorio nazionale

Make an Impact that Matters

Il network Deloitte, leader nei servizi professionali alle imprese, opera a livello globale in più di 150 Paesi con oltre 460 mila persone.
 
In Italia, Deloitte è presente in 24 città con circa 13.400 persone che assistono i clienti offrendo servizi di Audit & Assurance, Technology & Transformation, Strategy, Risk & Transactions Advisory e Tax & Legal.
 
In qualità di network globale ci impegniamo per affrontare le principali sfide sociali, economiche e ambientali della società di oggi. WorldImpact è il nostro programma globale che riunisce tutte le iniziative attraverso cui vogliamo avere un impatto positivo sulle persone, i clienti, l’ambiente e le comunità in cui operiamo. 
Con Impact for Italy, la declinazione italiana di WorldImpact, Deloitte ha realizzato progetti che – in collaborazione con istituzioni, realtà del terzo settore, università e altri soggetti – hanno lasciato un impatto concreto e una legacy per il futuro su tutto il territorio nazionale.
 
 La ricerca rispetta il d.lgs. 198/2006, il D.lgs. 215/03 e il D.lgs. 216/03 ed è aperta a candidat* di qualsiasi orientamento o espressione di genere, orientamento sessuale, età, etnia e credo religioso. Il presente annuncio è stato ideato nel rispetto della diversity e dell’inclusività.

title: Manager Up - Turnaround & Restructuring
description_html:
Manager Up  Turnaround & Restructuring



 Stiamo cercando una figura Manager up da inserire nel team Turnaround & Restructuring di Deloitte Financial Advisory per la sede di Milano, che lavorerà in modalità Hybrid. Entrando nel Team di Turnaround & Restructuring avrà l’occasione di fornire soluzioni creative e innovative con cui affrontare incarichi complessi, operando secondo metodologie del network internazionale Deloitte, attraverso l’uso di tecnologie e strumenti di riferimento per il settore.


 Your Role


 Il Manager in Deloitte ricopre un ruolo strategico: oltre a guidare un team, condividendo il suo know-how e approccio, sarà responsabile della gestione delle relazioni con il cliente; potrà mettere in campo le sue competenze per favorire lo sviluppo del business e mettere in luce le sue qualità imprenditoriali. 



 Winning Requirements

  •  Brillante percorso accademico con Laurea Magistrale in materie economiche con specializzazione in ambito finanziario; 
  •  Esperienza di 6-8 anni in società di consulenza strategica operanti in ambito Restructuring o affini; 
  •  Esperienza in progetti di business planning, IBR, attività di advisory in progetti di ristrutturazione aziendale e del debito; 
  •  Gestione di numerosi progetti riguardanti analisi strategiche di mercato e delle performance economiche e finanziarie di società target di matrice industriale; 
  •  Elevata attitudine al Project Management e alla Leadership; 
  •  Buona conoscenza della lingua Inglese. 



Make An Impact That Matters

Deloitte è un network leader nei servizi professionali alle imprese, presente in oltre 150 Paesi con 457 mila professionisti. Offriamo soluzioni innovative e sostenibili in Audit & Assurance, Strategy, Risk & Transaction Advisory, Tax & Legal e Technology & Transformation. Il nostro obiettivo è supportare le aziende nello sviluppo e nell'implementazione di strategie al passo con il mercato.


In Deloitte la sostenibilità è un tema centrale. Per questo, attraverso le strategie e le progettualità legate alle tematiche Environmental, Social e Governance (ESG), ci impegniamo a promuovere una crescita responsabile, sostenibile e inclusiva per il Pianeta, le nostre persone e la società. Scopri di più sulle nostre strategie di Corporate Sustainability, tra cui Well-being, la strategia volta a migliorare il benessere fisico, mentale e sociale delle nostre persone, affinché siano felici e piene di energia in tutti gli ambiti della loro vita e WorldClimate, la strategia globale di Deloitte per diventare un’organizzazione Net Zero e per guidare scelte responsabili all’interno e all’esterno dell’organizzazione.

title: Junior Integration Consultant – HR Strategy & Technology @ Thessaloniki
