Junior Integration Consultant @ Thessaloniki

What Impact will you make?

Are you looking for an opportunity in Thessaloniki, that offers you a hybrid working model?
Are you ready to work on projects for industry-leading clients and elevate your tech consulting career?
If so, check below for more info about this career opportunity!

You bring passion, we bring opportunities!

#YourOpportunity
Deloitte is a worldwide leader in Professional Services with a presence in more than 150 countries and territories. Since 2018, Deloitte has been operating its Competence Center in Thessaloniki with satellites in the cities of Patras, Heraklion, and Ioannina - which are model hubs of expertise, training, and innovation, specializing in cutting-edge exponential technologies, in which graduates and young professionals undergo immersive experiences, continuous learning, gaining practical insights and hands-on training that empower them to navigate the complexities of the digital landscape.
Deloitte is an ideal working environment for both young and senior professionals who want to take the next step in their careers, offering them a supportive and international working environment that leverages their expertise and potential. Its corporate culture is based on trust and collaboration and ensures diversity and inclusion so that everyone feels part of a great team.
Deloitte is the first ranked consulting company delivering business advisory and technology-enabled business transformations across the globe. Within Deloitte, the Technology Team focuses on delivering trusted high-end technology advisory services.
At Deloitte, you will gain exposure to a variety of industries and business models, helping your career growth and professional development.

#YourServiceLine
Our Technology & Transformation teams empower organizations to navigate the future through technology-driven business transformation. Combining deep industry knowledge with cutting-edge technology, we deliver tailored solutions that drive innovation, enhance efficiency, promote cybersecurity, and foster sustainable growth.

#AboutYourTeam
We are currently looking for a Junior Integration Consultant with a strong inclination towards Innovation to join our dynamic and highly motivating Human Capital HR Strategy & Technology team in Thessaloniki.
Should you be a professional, with a great interest in technologies applicable to the Human Capital world, passionate about improving processes and motivated to make more junior resources to grow, in a dynamic environment, innovated by the AI, this is the opportunity to do so.

As the team is growing, we’re looking for people who are natural initiative-takers, brilliant listeners, bring out the best in others, and people who can make our business grow without compromising standards, integrity, or culture.

During your tenure as a Junior Integration Consultant, you will demonstrate and develop your ability to:

  • Support the delivery of international and/or multinational projects, contributing to the implementation of modern enterprise and HR technology solutions.
  • Participate in the design and development of system integrations and platform extensions, including exposure to AI-enabled features.
  • Assist in analyzing business and technical requirements and translating them into technical solutions.
  • Contribute to integration development using APIs, data formats, and middleware platforms.
  • Support testing, troubleshooting, and issue resolution across environments.
  • Assist in preparing technical documentation, solution designs, and project deliverables.
  • Collaborate closely with senior consultants and developers in an agile environment.
  • Participate in training programs, certifications, and continuous learning initiatives.

#Our Requirements

Key Qualifications

  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related technical discipline.
  • Knowledge of web technologies and integration concepts (e.g. APIs, JSON, REST).
  • Exposure to at least one programming or scripting language (e.g. JavaScript, Java, PHP, Python).
  • Familiarity with cloud platforms or Platform-as-a-Service environments is a plus.
  • Understanding of agile software development methodologies (e.g. Scrum).
  • Comfortable using standard office tools (Outlook, Word, PowerPoint, Excel).
  • Strong analytical mindset and willingness to learn new technologies.
  • Good command of English, both written and verbal.
Bonus Qualifications
  • Basic knowledge of enterprise systems or business applications.
  • Exposure to HR systems or digital transformation projects.
  • Experience working in a team-based or consulting-style environment.
#WhoWeAreLookingFor
Individuals who have a strong will to expand their knowledge of new technologies, a passion to grow within the company and aspirations for career growth. At Deloitte we foster a consultative culture because the best decisions are made in collaboration with others. We approach our work with a collaborative mindset, teaming across businesses, geographies, and skill sets to deliver tangible, measurable, attributable impact. These are not aspirations, but principles that we all commit to today and every day.

#WhatWeOffer
At Deloitte, we know that great people make a great organization. We value our people and offer employees a broad range of benefits:
🏠 Modern hybrid workplace, characterized by flexibility and Smart Working
⚖ Empowered well-being: We provide multiple program offerings to support your well-being needs (flexible working arrangements, extra days of leave, parental allowances)
🌍 Engagement within international large-scale teams and projects, with opportunities to travel for training or client purposes.
📚 Constant opportunities for learning with unlimited access to internal and external learning platforms and sponsored certificates aligned with business needs and technology trends
🚀 Challenging and innovating environment where personal development and growth are encouraged, always with transparency and trust
🏳️‍🌈 Diverse culture and active communities that enable you to bring yourself to work
🎉 Team Building and Corporate Social Responsibility Activities
🏃 A buddy to support you with your onboarding
⚕ Private medical health insurance plan
💳 Ticket restaurant card
🛍️ Exclusive Discounts to several retail providers, restaurants and others
📱 Mobile phone
🍏 Fresh fruits and unlimited coffee everyday at our offices

Please note that all the well-being benefits mentioned above are subject to annual review.

Sounds like the sort of role for you? Apply now.

Location: Thessaloniki

About Deloitte

#OurServices
Deloitte offers integrated services that include Audit & Assurance, Tax & Legal, Technology & Transformation, and Strategy, Risk & Transactions (SR&T) Advisory. Our approach combines insight and innovation from multiple disciplines with global business and industry expertise to help our clients excel anywhere in the world. We deliver outstanding impact on the reputation and success of our clients, in Italy and globally. In pursuing this we contribute to a sustainable and prosperous society, and are firm believers in the positive impact business can and should have on the world it operates within.
#OurPurpose
Our purpose, “To make an impact that matters for our clients, our people and society “- defines who we are and what we stand for. This is not about size; it is about being the first choice. The first choice for the largest and most influential clients and the first choice for the best talent.
#OurValues
At Deloitte, we foster a collaborative culture where talented individuals can produce their best work. We value innovative thinking, diverse insights and a genuinely distinctive level of customer service through our expertise and professionalism. We value difference, with respect at the heart of our inclusive culture.
#OurTalentExperience
From day one at our firm, practitioners are part of a community. Our development and career progression framework will help them develop the skills and capabilities to succeed. The wellness of our people and the ability to offer agile working arrangements is at the center of our unique talent experience. We create a workplace that encourages collaboration, creativity, inclusiveness to ensure our staff are supported, encouraged and feel a sense of purpose and meaning in what they do each day.

title: Manager - Customer Strategy Retail Fashion & Luxury
description_html:
Manager – Customer Strategy Retail Fashion & Luxury

Stiamo cercando una figura Manager da inserire nel team Customer Strategy nella sede di Milano, che lavorerà in modalità Hybrid. 

Nel team di Customer Strategy ogni giorno ci impegniamo nel definire la strategia ed il percorso di trasformazione digitale per i nostri Clienti operanti nel settore Retail Fashion & Luxury, abilitando nuovi modelli operativi sempre più incentrati sulla valorizzazione di un’Experience distintiva per la customer base. 
Supportiamo i nostri Clienti nel disegnare e potenziare la Customer Experience dei clienti finali, trasformando i dati e l’ascolto del cliente in insight di valore. 


Your Role


La risorsa Manager verrà inserita in un team di lavoro e seguirà le seguenti attività:

  • Digital Strategy Definition, Roadmapping & Cost case e nell’identificazione della lista di interventi, con previsione delle rispettive priorità e dell’impatto economico, da mettere a terra per la realizzazione della trasformazione digitale in risposta ai need identificati
  • Competenze di Diagnostic, Analisi e Reingegnerizzazione dei processi mediante l’assessment dell’attuale stato di digitalizzazione dei clienti e la definizione del modello to-be con la raccolta dei requisiti di business e tecnologici necessari all’implementazione dei nuovi processi target alla base della trasformazione
  • Program & Project Management di iniziative complesse di Digital Transformation finalizzati alla governance end-to-end del percorso di trasformazione, gestendo la relazione con il cliente, coordinando tutti i tavoli di lavoro e i vari stakeholder coinvolti nell’iniziativa – interni ad esterni a Deloitte
  • Design, Build & Deploy di strategie e soluzioni digitali al servizio della Customer Experience a 360°
  • Collaborare a iniziative di business development attraverso la preparazione di gare e POV aventi l’obiettivo di abilitare nuove opportunità progettuali su clienti nuovi o già esistenti

Winning Requirements

  • Esperienza di almeno 5-6 anni in società di consulenza su progetti di trasformazione digitale nel settore dei Retail Fashion & Luxury;
  • Esperienza in Transformation Value Management: gestione del valore e nel monitoraggio dei benefici di programmi di trasformazione digitale su larga scala, capacità di strutturare roadmap di digitalizzazione, coordinare team multidisciplinari e interfacciarsi con stakeholder C-level.
  • Esperienza in Omnichannel Strategy & Execution: integrazione dei canali digitali e fisici per migliorare la customer experience e ottimizzare il business model.
  • Maturata esperienza nel KPI Monitoring: definizione e misurazione di KPI per assicurare il raggiungimento degli obiettivi strategici.
  • Conoscenza di tecnologie e piattaforme digitali per eCommerce quali CRM, MarTech e RetailTech.

Make An Impact That Matters 

Deloitte è un network leader nei servizi professionali alle imprese, presente in oltre 150 Paesi con 457 mila professionisti. Offriamo soluzioni innovative e sostenibili in Audit & Assurance, Consulting, Financial Advisory, Risk Advisory, Tax e Legal. Il nostro obiettivo è supportare le aziende nello sviluppo e nell'implementazione di strategie al passo con il mercato. In Deloitte la sostenibilità è un tema centrale. Per questo, attraverso le strategie e le progettualità legate alle tematiche Environmental, Social e Governance (ESG), ci impegniamo a promuovere una crescita responsabile, sostenibile e inclusiva per il Pianeta, le nostre persone e la società. Scopri di più sulle nostre strategie di Corporate Sustainability, tra cui Well-being, la strategia volta a migliorare il benessere fisico, mentale e sociale delle nostre persone, affinché siano felici e piene di energia in tutti gli ambiti della loro vita e WorldClimate, la strategia globale di Deloitte per diventare un’organizzazione Net Zero e per guidare scelte responsabili all’interno e all’esterno dell’organizzazione. 

 La ricerca rispetta il d.lgs. 198/2006, il D.lgs. 215/03 e il D.lgs. 216/03 ed è aperta a candidat* di qualsiasi orientamento o espressione di genere, orientamento sessuale, età, etnia e credo religioso. Il presente annuncio è stato ideato nel rispetto della diversity e dell’inclusività.

YOUR ROLE


Vuoi intraprendere la Professione di Dottore Commercialista e dedicarti alla consulenza fiscale con un focus sulla finanza agevolata? Lo Studio Tributario e Societario Deloitte è alla ricerca, per le sedi di Genova o Torino, di laureand* o neolaureat* con background economico da inserire all’interno della Service Line Global Investment & Innovation Incentives (GI3), mediante un percorso di stage iniziale.

 

Avrai la possibilità di collaborare alla consulenza in finanza agevolata e offrire una proposta di servizi ai clienti che include il supporto su misure agevolative come:

·       agevolazioni fiscali, quali crediti d’imposta, deduzioni fiscali, Patent Box;
·       contributi a valere su bandi regionali, nazionali e comunitari per la realizzazione di progetti di investimento legati a sviluppo tecnologico, efficienza energetica, ambiente, innovazione, sostenibilità e formazione.
Grazie all’attività consulenziale ed alla formazione continua interna allo Studio (corso di formazione per i neoentrati, meeting di aggiornamento periodici, possibilità di collaborare ad attività pubblicistiche, corsi di inglese, corsi di materie digitali e STEM, etc) avrai modo di sviluppare ottime competenze pratiche e teoriche, il tutto all’interno di una primaria realtà riconosciuta a livello Globale come sinonimo di eccezionale qualità, che mette al centro della propria attività la diversità e l’inclusione delle persone.



About Global Investment & Innovation Incentives


Il Global Investment and Innovation Incentives (GI3) assiste le imprese nell’individuazione e nella fruizione delle agevolazioni e degli incentivi esistenti, offrendo un servizio completo a 360°, sia in Italia che all’estero, al fine di fornire una visione d’insieme sulle diverse agevolazioni sia nell’analisi degli aspetti fiscali e amministrativi che nell’analisi degli aspetti scientifici e tecnologici dei progetti.



WINNING REQUIREMENTS


Ti sarà affidato un ruolo proattivo e di crescente responsabilità negli incarichi e progetti in cui sarai coinvolt*, costantemente supportat* all’interno dei Team di lavoro da associate e senior esperti in materia, coordinati da partner Deloitte.


Sei il profilo che cerchiamo se hai le seguenti caratteristiche:


•                Laureand* in corsi di laurea magistrale in Economia (LM-77 LM-56);

•                Neolaureat* in Economia o con minima esperienza maturata nell’ambito della consulenza in finanza agevolata presso primari Studi e Network internazionali;

•                Buona conoscenza della lingua inglese;

•                Conoscenza di applicazioni standard (Microsoft Excel, Word, Power Point, Outlook);

•                Motivazione, determinazione e propensione al team working;

•                Predisposizione al problem solving.


Cerchiamo persone motivate, appassionate alle materie tributarie e contabili, che vogliano intraprendere un percorso trasversale e multidisciplinare di crescita professionale che li conduca ad acquisire le competenze tecniche e personali necessarie sia per l’abilitazione e l’esercizio della Professione di Dottore Commercialista sia per un soddisfacente percorso di carriera nell'ambito della consulenza fiscale di nuova generazione.

Lo Studio Tributario e Societario, Società tra Professionisti dedicata alla consulenza ed assistenza fiscale ad imprese e gruppi italiani ed internazionali, facente parte del network Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu, è presente in Italia con sedi a Milano, Roma, Firenze, Torino, Genova, Bologna, Padova, Napoli e Catania. Lo Studio offre consulenza ed assistenza fiscale e tributaria nei diversi settori di specializzazione con scrupolosa attenzione agli aspetti tecnici, forte impegno verso la qualità e continuo riferimento alle esigenze del cliente.

title: Junior Penetration Tester
description_html:
Junior Penetration Tester


What Impact will you make?

 

#YourOpportunity

 

Do you thrive at solving complex challenges? Want to work on next-generation, cutting-edge products and services that deliver outstanding value? Work with other experts in your field? Work for a world-class organization that provides exceptional career experience and an inclusive and collaborative culture? Want to make an impact that matters? Consider joining Deloitte.

We are currently seeking for enthusiastic team players with exceptional penetration testing skills and a well-rounded personality to become part of our dynamic Cyber - Offensive Security team. The team is part of a global network, where brilliant colleagues collaborate across Deloitte locations, to deliver services to our clients both in Greece and abroad.

As a Junior Penetration Tester, you will work in a highly skilled team to perform various Penetration Testing and Red Teaming engagements for our domestic and international clients. Using your offensive skills, you will covertly breach our clients’ networks and provide recommendations to strengthen the client’s security posture. To sharpen your skills, you will be trained with the Offensive Security trainings; you will join the periodic Deloitte Global Ethical Hacking and Red Team knowledge exchange sessions, and perform research on the latest techniques and tools. Moreover, you will serve as a “Subject Matter Expert”, adding interpretive value to findings presented and be responsible for creating and executing custom penetration testing engagements to identify if client systems are vulnerable to security issues.

 

#YourRole


Your role as a Junior Penetration Tester will enable you to work alongside fellow Ethical Hackers, who are incredibly passionate about what they do and are characterized by their commitment to working as a team, and their ever-present customer focus. In this role, you will actively participate in technical planning and the delivery of best-in-class service to our clients. In this role, you will find yourself in a personal learning and development fast track and will be given many opportunities to get exposure and make an impact that matters.


During your tenure as a Junior Penetration Tester, you will be able to:

  • Receive training and attain certifications in the use of cutting-edge cybersecurity products but also on various cybersecurity engineering topics.
  • Be part of a truly global community of Deloitte experts in Ethical Hacking and Cyber Security.
  • Work on projects focused on identifying security vulnerabilities on client’s infrastructure, Web and Mobile Apps etc.
  • Find creative ways to obtain a foothold in a client's network.
  • Apply an adversary mindset to simulate sophisticated actors and achieve project-specific objectives.
  • Perform research and develop your own tools and sharpen your tradecraft.
  • Share your research within the Deloitte Global Hacking and Red Team community.
  • Turning security weaknesses into tailored and concrete recommendations.
  • Share knowledge and experiences to support the development of peers.
  • Monitor your own results against objectives and seek feedback to identify ways to improve personal and team performance.

#WinningRequirements


To qualify for the role, you must have:

  • Bachelor’s Degree in Information Technology, Information Systems Security, Cybersecurity or any related discipline
  • Familiar with penetration testing like Web Application, Mobile, Infrastructure and Vulnerability Assessments both on *nix and Windows environments.
  • Expertise using Kali Linux and tools like Burp, Metasploit, Covenant, Cobalt Strike, and Nessus.
  • Willingness to research new security testing techniques and tradecraft.
  • Experience effectively prioritizing workload to meet deadlines and work objectives.
  • Demonstrated ability to write clearly, succinctly, and in a manner that appeals to a wide audience.
  • Consultant mindset, commitment to teamwork, and ability to build strong client relationships.
  • Strong communication skills in Greek and English.
  • Ability to maintain professionalism and always strive for high ethical standards.
  • Military obligations fulfilled where applicable

Ideally:

  • Burp Suite Certified Practitioner (BSCP) - PortSwigger
  • Hack the Box level: Pro Hacker and above

 

#ChooseDeloitteif:

  • You want to work with inspiring, ambitious, and supportive people with diverse geographical and academic backgrounds and extensive skills.
  • You get excitement in managing clients shifting priorities and accomplish tasks in a challenging, fast-paced environment.
  • You like to nurture people and share your knowledge with others.

 

#AboutDeloitte


Our services

Deloitte offers Global professional services that include Audit, Risk Advisory, Tax, Consulting and Financial Advisory. Our approach combines insight and innovation from multiple disciplines with global business and industry expertise to help our clients excel anywhere in the world.

We deliver outstanding impact on the reputation and success of our clients, in Greece and globally. In pursuing this we contribute to a sustainable and prosperous society, and are firm believers in the positive impact business can and should have on the world it operates within.

 

Our Purpose

Our purpose, “To make an impact that matters for our clients, our people and society “- defines who we are and what we stand for. This is not about size, it's about being the first choice. The first choice for the largest and most influential clients, and the first choice for the best talent.

 

Our values

At Deloitte we foster a collaborative culture where talented individuals can produce their best work. We value innovative thinking, diverse insights and a genuinely distinctive level of customer service. We value difference, with respect at the heart of our inclusive culture, and we support agile working arrangements.

 

Our talent experience

From day one at our firm, practitioners are part of a community. Our development and career progression framework will help them develop the skills and capabilities to succeed. The wellness of our people and the ability to offer agile working arrangements is at the centre of our unique talent experience. We create a workplace that encourages collaboration, creativity, inclusiveness to ensure our staff are supported, encouraged, and feel a sense of purpose and meaning in what they do each day.

 

Sounds like the sort of role for you? Apply now.

title: Experienced – Transaction Support
description_html:
Experienced – Finance Transaction Support 


Stiamo cercando una figura Associate da inserire nel team Transaction Services di Deloitte nelle sedi di Milano e Roma che lavorerà in modalità Hybrid.

Il team si occupa di supportare i nostri clienti nella individuazione di soluzioni e modelli finalizzati al miglioramento della produttività, efficienza, qualità dei servizi offerti, anche con il supporto delle nuove tecnologie.


Your Role


Nel ruolo di Associate avrai la possibilità di interfacciarti con il Top Management delle aziende clienti partecipando all'elaborazione di due diligence finanziarie (sell-side e buy-side) attraverso:

  • Analisi dei dati contabili, finanziari e gestionali relativi alla società oggetto della transazione;
  • Identificazione di potenziali rischi ed opportunità connesse alla transazione;
  • Analisi delle marginalità, del capitale circolante netto, dell’indebitamento finanziario e dei flussi di cassa.

Winning Requirements

  • Laurea Magistrale in ambito economico e finanziario;
  • Esperienza di almeno 2 anni maturata in società di revisione per clienti industriali e/o in contesti strutturati nell'ambito dell’elaborazione di due diligence finanziarie;
  • Ottima conoscenza dei processi di contabilità e bilancio e dei rispettivi principi di riferimento italiani ed internazionali;

title: Junior - Deal Transformation and Post Merger Integration - Nexthub
description_html:
Junior – Deal Transformation and Post Merger Integration - Nexthub

Stiamo cercando una figura junior da inserire nel team Deal Transformation & Post Merger Integration di Deloitte NextHub nella sede di Bari, che lavorerà in modalità Hybrid.

Il business  si occupa di supportare  i clienti, sia corporate che private equity, offrendo servizi su misura in contesti nazionali e internazionali di operazioni di finanza straordinaria (M&A), in cui diamo supporto end-to-end su tutto il ciclo di vita del deal: da M&A Strategy / Commercial & Operational Due Diligence, proseguendo con l’execution di progetti di integrazione e/o separazione del target. 

Your Role

La risorsa Junior sarà inserita in un team di lavoro, affiancando colleghi senior e occupandosi di:

  • Interpretare proattivamente i bisogni del cliente, individuando metodologie e approcci coerenti;
  • Sviluppare iniziative e soluzioni raccogliendo e svolgendo analisi di dati per sviluppare action plan per supportare il cliente nel massimizzare i risultati attesi;
  • Progettare operazioni di finanza straordinaria (M&A);
  • In fase Pre Deal, con focus sulla strategia di M&A e sull’identificazione e valutazione di potenziali deal, sia buy-side che sell-side, tramite attività di Commercial & Operational Due Diligence (analisi delle performance aziendali, del business plan, del contesto competitivo e del mercato di riferimento), nonchè attraverso la definizione di integration/separation blueprint e delle attività di Day-1 readiness;
  • In fase Post Deal, concentrandoti sul design e supporto all’esecuzione di piani di separazione e integrazione aziendale (100-Day Plan e post-merger integration), analisi e quantificazione delle potenziali sinergie e supporto all'implementazione delle stesse nonché assistenza al Management nell’elaborazione di piani strategici-industriali;
  • Lavorare su progetti di assessment delle performance aziendali per identificare iniziative di accelerazione e ottimizzazione dei risultati;
  • Design delle iniziative strategiche a supporto della crescita, con relativa quantificazione dei benefici sul P&L e Cash Flow;
  • Execution delle iniziative, tramite l'elaborazione di action plan per supportare il cliente nel massimizzare i risultati attesi;
  • Grazie all’ufficio Learning avrai modo di seguire corsi e attività di formazione che ti permetteranno di ampliare e approfondire le tue conoscenze. 

Winning Requirements

  • Brillante percorso accademico con laurea specialistica in Economia Aziendale, Finanza o Ingegneria Gestionale;
  • Ottima conoscenza degli applicativi MS Word, MS Excel e MS Power Point;
  • Elevata attitudine a lavorare sia autonomamente che in team, capacità di multitasking, problem solving, gestione dello stress, precisione e uno spiccato orientamento al raggiungimento dei risultati;
  • Ottima conoscenza della lingua inglese;
  • Capacità di lavorare in ambienti internazionali e multietcnici;
  • Disponibilità a lavorare in trasferta, anche all’estero.


To Make An Impact That Matters


Il network Deloitte, leader nei servizi professionali alle imprese, opera a livello globale in più di 150 Paesi con oltre 460 mila persone.
In Italia, Deloitte è presente in 24 città con circa 13.400 persone che assistono i clienti offrendo servizi di Audit & Assurance, Technology & Transformation, Strategy, Risk & Transactions Advisory e Tax & Legal.

In qualità di network globale ci impegniamo per affrontare le principali sfide sociali, economiche e ambientali della società di oggi. WorldImpact è il nostro programma globale che riunisce tutte le iniziative attraverso cui vogliamo avere un impatto positivo sulle persone, i clienti, l’ambiente e le comunità in cui operiamo. 

Con Impact for Italy, la declinazione italiana di WorldImpact, Deloitte ha realizzato progetti che – in collaborazione con istituzioni, realtà del terzo settore, università e altri soggetti – hanno lasciato un impatto concreto e una legacy per il futuro su tutto il territorio nazionale.


La ricerca rispetta il d.lgs. 198/2006, il D.lgs. 215/03 e il D.lgs. 216/03 ed è aperta a candidat* di qualsiasi orientamento o espressione di genere, orientamento sessuale, età, etnia e credo religioso. Il presente annuncio è stato ideato nel rispetto della diversity e dell’inclusività.

description_html:
Experienced – UX/UI Designer - NextHub Bari

Stiamo cercando un UX/UI Designer con esperienza (Consultant) da inserire nel team Product Strategy nella sede di Bari, con modalità di lavoro ibrida. 

La risorsa entrerà a far parte di un team in forte crescita, lavorando in un ambiente stimolante e collaborativo per creare esperienze digitali intuitive e centrate sull’utente. Collaborando a stretto contatto con colleghi senior e clienti, guiderà soluzioni progettuali di forte impatto su diversi touchpoint digitali.



Your Role

La risorsa Experienced verrà inserita in un team di lavoro e si occuperà di:
  • Esecuzione proattiva e responsabile delle attività progettuali con la supervisione dei designer senior o di un manager, garantendo qualità e pieno allineamento con gli obiettivi del cliente e le priorità del progetto.
  • Contribuire alla definizione della customer experience, sviluppando concept e linee guida che si traducano in interfacce ed interazioni significative per l’utente finale.
  • Progettare wireframe, flussi utente, mockup, prototipi e user journey per diversi dispositivi e piattaforme.
  • Sviluppare elementi visivi (moodboard, icone, foto, illustrazioni) con una solida comprensione di tipografia e layout.
  • Collaborare direttamente con i clienti per progettare esperienze end-to-end utilizzando tecniche partecipative e iterative, come studi osservazionali, test di usabilità e interviste agli utenti.
  • Raccogliere le esigenze dei clienti e supportarli nell’identificazione delle soluzioni progettuali più adatte.
  • Collaborare in team, assegnando task, fornendo indicazioni e assicurandosi della qualità e dei tempi di consegna dei deliverable dei membri junior del team.



Winning Requirements
  • 3-4 anni di esperienza su prodotti digitali (web, mobile, fisici, vocali) in contesti italiani/internazionali dimostrata da portfolio con possibilità di visualizzare anche prototipi interattivi
  • Esperienza nell’uso di design system e collaborazione cross-team
  • Ottime capacità di gestione priorità, rispetto scadenze e interazione con clienti
  • Conoscenza fluente della lingua inglese
  • Disponibilità a viaggiare in italia e all’estero

title: Assistant Manager- External Comms - Brand & Communications
description_html:
Assistant Manager- External Comms - Brand & Communications

#DiscoveringDeloitte

At Deloitte, the spirit of the excellence is part of our DNA. We strive to hire the brightest minds from all around the globe, allowing us to excel in both long-term strategic thinking and business improvement implementation as the undisputed global leader in professional services.

Our culture is rooted in profound shared values. Our values guide us as we live our purpose to serve our clients with quality and distinction, inspire our people to work collaboratively to deliver value, actively contribute to society, and lead the profession by challenging ourselves to do what matters most. Deloitte’s values are what unite us across cultures and geographies, and ultimately help us earn the trust and respect of our people, clients, and society.

We believe that our differences enable us to #makeanimpactthatmatters.

#ChooseDeloitteIf:

  • You want to work with inspiring, ambitious, and supportive people with diverse geographical and academic backgrounds and extensive skills;
  • You get excitement by accomplishing tasks in a challenging, fast-paced environment;
  • You like to nurture people and share your knowledge with others.

#YourRole

Your role as a Brand and Communications Assistant Manager will focus on serving as a strategic advisor to leaders while identifying and implementing creative communications plans to engage professionals and clients. You will develop and execute communication plans addressing internal and external audiences, in collaboration with the Brand and Communications leader and communications colleagues, write and/or edit communications, effectively capturing the voice and strategic priorities of the business and provide communications support to all Deloitte functions and sectors. You will design, track, and report internal metrics and results of initiatives to demonstrate impact.

#WinningRequirements

Our ideal candidates are bright and enthusiastic professionals that focus on delivering work of high quality, commit to high levels of service and have the ability to build strong relationships. We expect that you also have strong interpersonal and organizational skills and the ability to work effectively within a team.

In particular, to qualify for the role you must have:

  • Five (5) to seven (7) years of relevant work experience;
  • Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business Administration or relevant field from a well-acclaimed University in Greece or abroad, a Master’s degree will be considered an asset;
  • Strong writing skills and the ability to develop persuasive messages based on provided information;
  • Ability to gather and synthesize large volumes of information into clear, well-structured materials;
  • Exceptional written and verbal communication skills in both Greek and English.
  • Ability to differentiate tone of voice based on audience (e.g., employees, students, clients, media);
  • Ability to create vibrant, engaging content for social media platforms (LinkedIn, Facebook, Instagram);
  • Experience in campaign planning and execution across both digital and offline channels.
  • Ability to work well in team environment as the Brand & Comms team works closely to develop communication plans, reports, articles, presentations and brochures in accordance with specific outlined objectives;
  • Ability to work smoothly with 3rd party providers (Communication & Creative agencies);
  • Comfort working in fast-paced, matrixed environments with cross-functional teams.
  • Ability to take initiative, interact efficiently with all levels of management and think strategically and creatively;
  • Ability to recognize & detect opportunities for further raising awareness on key issues of your agenda;
  • Ability to manage your time properly and prioritize;
  • Excellent PC use in Windows environment (Word, Excel, Power Point);
  • Familiarity with using AI-powered tools (e.g., content creators, image/video generators) to streamline communication tasks and enhance content.

ABOUT DELOITTE

Our Services

After 50 years of successful and dynamic presence in the Greek market, we bring an unmatched breadth and depth of expertise across Audit and Assurance, Technology & Transformation, Tax & Legal and Strategy, Risk & Transactions Advisory Services. Operating in a multidisciplinary model enables us to draw from a pool of world-class talent, identifying the ideal skillset for each project, and to collaborate across businesses, to solve the toughest, most challenging issues of our clients. It is with them that we have built a trusted relationship, by delivering innovative solutions and utilizing state-of-the-art tools and technologies across all industries- Consumer Products, Energy Resources & Industrials, Financial Services, Life Sciences & Health Care, Government & Public Services, Technology, Media & Telecommunications.

Our Purpose

We are led by a purpose, to make an impact that matters with clients, people, and society. This purpose defines who we are and what we stand for. It's not about being the biggest. It’s about being the first choice for the largest and most influential clients, and the first choice for the best talent.

Our Values

At Deloitte we foster a collaborative culture where talented individuals can produce their best work. We value innovative thinking, diverse insights and a genuinely distinctive level of customer service through our expertise and professionalism. We value difference, with respect at the heart of our inclusive culture.

Our Talent experience

From day one at our firm, practitioners are part of a community. Our development and career progression framework will help them develop the skills and capabilities to succeed. The wellness of our people and the ability to offer agile working arrangements is at the center of our unique talent experience. We create a workplace that encourages collaboration, creativity, inclusiveness to ensure our staff are supported, encouraged and feel a sense of purpose and meaning in what they do each day.

Build your legacy with us. Aim higher: join Deloitte now!

Deloitte is an equal opportunity employer (EOE) and we are committed to providing a working environment that embraces and values diversity and inclusion. Knowing that people work best in different ways, we are happy to discuss alternative arrangements if the working pattern you are looking for is not specifically indicated.
All applications will be considered without distinction, in accordance with our values and in line with our inclusive culture. If you have any support or access requirements, we encourage you to advise us at the time of application to assist you through the recruitment process.

Please, visit our website for more information.

description_html:
Junior - Categorie Protette art.1 L.68/99 – Financial Accounting SAP S4HANA - Assurance

Sei pronto a crescere insieme al team Assurance?

Entrando nel Team di Deloitte Assurance Advisory avrai l’occasione di crescere e sviluppare forti competenze trasversali, lavorando su progetti sfidanti e collaborando con moltissimi clienti.

In particolare, ti occuperai di supportare il Team nelle attività di Accounting Assurance, Accounting Operation e Digital Finance Advisory con particolare focus su analisi e ridisegno dei processi finance and accounting, performance management, controllo di gestione, reporting, working capital optimization, IAS/IFRS.

Grazie a questa esperienza, potrai acquisire un bagaglio culturale utile e ampio in questo ambito operando in una realtà leader nel settore.

#YourRole

I candidati e le candidate parteciperanno ad un percorso di selezione nel quale avranno la possibilità di mettersi alla prova attraverso giornate di assessment, con l’obiettivo di valorizzare competenze e potenzialità personali.

Saranno prese in considerazione tutte le candidature indistintamente, nel rispetto dei nostri valori ed in linea con la nostra cultura inclusiva.

In quanto Analyst avrai la possibilità di imparare dai colleghi più Senior (attraverso il learning on the job) e sviluppare competenze tecniche e relazionali.

Conoscerti ci permetterà di aiutarti a trovare la strada giusta per la tua carriera scegliendo percorsi di formazione e crescita professionale: con la supervisione dei colleghi e colleghe più esperte, sarai responsabile delle attività progettuali nelle quali sarai coinvolto, e della qualità del tuo lavoro e del tuo allineamento alle priorità, agli obiettivi e alle esigenze dei clienti.

Grazie all’ufficio Learning avrai modo di seguire corsi e attività di formazione che ti permetteranno di ampliare e approfondire le tue conoscenze.

I colleghi del Talent invece, si occuperanno in maniera strutturata del tuo avanzamento di carriera con KPI e obiettivi definiti, che se raggiunti, ti garantiranno la revisione del grade e degli economics. 

Si offre inserimento in stage di 6 mesi caratterizzato da un percorso di training ad alto valore formativo.

Sedi di lavoro: Milano, Roma, Padova, Verona, Bologna.

#WinningRequirements

  • Laureando/neolaureato in Amministrazione, Finanza Aziendale e Controllo, Economia e Management, Ingegneria Gestionale e altri indirizzi STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering and Mathematics)
  • Ottima conoscenza della lingua inglese
  • Padronanza dei principali strumenti informatici
  • Attitudine al teamwork, al problem solving e spiccate capacità di analisi
  • Ottime capacità relazionali e comunicative
  • Dinamicità e attitudine alla professione del consulente, ambizione allo sviluppo professionale
  • Forte motivazione verso i temi legati all’area Amministrazione, Finanza aziendale e Controllo
  • Disponibilità a viaggiare in Italia e all'estero
  • Appartenenza alle Categorie Protette Art. 1 Legge 68/99;

Make An Impact That Matters

Deloitte è un network leader nei servizi professionali alle imprese, presente in oltre 150 Paesi con 457 mila professionisti. Offriamo soluzioni innovative e sostenibili in Audit & Assurance, Strategy, Risk & Transaction Advisory, Tax & Legal e Technology & Transformation. Il nostro obiettivo è supportare le aziende nello sviluppo e nell'implementazione di strategie al passo con il mercato.

In Deloitte la sostenibilità è un tema centrale. Per questo, attraverso le strategie e le progettualità legate alle tematiche Environmental, Social e Governance (ESG), ci impegniamo a promuovere una crescita responsabile, sostenibile e inclusiva per il Pianeta, le nostre persone e la società. Scopri di più sulle nostre strategie di Corporate Sustainability, tra cui Well-being, la strategia volta a migliorare il benessere fisico, mentale e sociale delle nostre persone, affinché siano felici e piene di energia in tutti gli ambiti della loro vita e WorldClimate, la strategia globale di Deloitte per diventare un’organizzazione Net Zero e per guidare scelte responsabili all’interno e all’esterno dell’organizzazione.


Sei pront* a #MakeAnImpactThatMatter insieme? Candidati ora!

La ricerca rispetta il d.lgs. 198/2006, il D.lgs. 215/03 e il D.lgs. 216/03 ed è aperta a candidat* di qualsiasi orientamento o espressione di genere, orientamento sessuale, età, etnia e credo religioso. Il presente annuncio è stato ideato nel rispetto della diversity e dell’inclusività.

title: Junior - HR Strategy - NextHub Bari
description_html:
Junior - HR  Strategy - NextHub Bari

Stiamo cercando una figura junior da inserire nel team di HR Strategy di Deloitte NextHub nella sede di Bari, che lavorerà in modalità Hybrid.

Il business di HR Strategy si occupa di supportare i nostri clienti nella individuazione di soluzioni e modelli finalizzati al miglioramento della produttività, efficienza, qualità dei servizi offerti, anche con il supporto delle nuove tecnologie. 

Your Role

La risorsa Junior sarà inserita in un team di lavoro, affiancando colleghi senior e occupandosi di:

  • Supportare l’analisi, disegno, implementazione ed ottimizzazione di processi e landscape applicativi basati su soluzioni leader di mercato (Workday, SAP SuccessFactors, Oracle HCM, ServiceNow ed altre) per raggiungere obiettivi di maggior efficienza e standardizzazione dei processi, miglioramento della qualità del dato e reportistica e/o per rilasciare nuove funzionalità.
  • Gestire il ciclo di vita dai requisiti degli utenti: dalla raccolta alla realizzazione di soluzioni progettate per soddisfare i bisogni dei clienti, imparando le tecniche e metodologie di project governance e monitoring per la gestione dei progetti e loro fasi (dall’implementazione alla gestione nel continuo in ottica di servizio) 
  • Collaborare con il gruppo di lavoro ed il cliente finale in modo proattivo e collaborativo, andando a gestire i rischi e strategie di gestione e governo dei sistemi e processi
  • Essere costantemente focalizzato sul risultato, sulla responsabilità individuale, sulla qualità del lavoro e sulla crescita costante del proprio ruolo, legata ai temi di innovazione
  • Essere costantemente aggiornato sulle tendenze di mercato, in ambito Risorse Umane e per quanto riguarda le soluzioni a supporto di contesti di HR Transformation che stanno sempre più abbracciando temi innovativi come: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Metaverso ed altri.

Winning Requirements

  • Laurea in materie informatiche, fisica, matematica, Ingegneria Gestionale, Economia e Risorse Umane e spiccata attitudine verso l’Information Technology.
  • Interesse a operare nell’ambito della consulenza e servizi di manutenzione applicativa di soluzioni HCM. Previa formazione su soluzioni leader di mercato quali: Workday, Oracle, SAP SuccessFactors, ServiceNow e molte altre … attraverso percorsi di crescita definiti ed affiancati da colleghi di provata esperienza in ambito HR Transformation
  • Buona conoscenza della lingua inglese
  • Conoscenza di linguaggi di presentazione e programmazione come: HTML5, javascript, xml, java, abap, VBscript, Python, C, C++, C#, matlab e altri.

To Make An Impact That Matters

Il network Deloitte, leader nei servizi professionali alle imprese, opera a livello globale in più di 150 Paesi con oltre 460 mila persone.
In Italia, Deloitte è presente in 24 città con circa 13.400 persone che assistono i clienti offrendo servizi di Audit & Assurance, Technology & Transformantion, Strategy, Risk & Transactions Advisory e Tax & Legal.

In qualità di network globale ci impegniamo per affrontare le principali sfide sociali, economiche e ambientali della società di oggi. WorldImpact è il nostro programma globale che riunisce tutte le iniziative attraverso cui vogliamo avere un impatto positivo sulle persone, i clienti, l’ambiente e le comunità in cui operiamo. 

Con Impact for Italy, la declinazione italiana di WorldImpact, Deloitte ha realizzato progetti che – in collaborazione con istituzioni, realtà del terzo settore, università e altri soggetti – hanno lasciato un impatto concreto e una legacy per il futuro su tutto il territorio nazionale.

La ricerca rispetta il d.lgs. 198/2006, il D.lgs. 215/03 e il D.lgs. 216/03 ed è aperta a candidat* di qualsiasi orientamento o espressione di genere, orientamento sessuale, età, etnia e credo religioso. Il presente annuncio è stato ideato nel rispetto della diversity e dell’inclusività.

title: Junior Developer - Order Management System (OMS) @ Thessaloniki
description_html:
What Impact will you make?


Junior Developer - Order Management System (OMS) @ Thessaloniki

Are you looking for an opportunity in Thessaloniki, that offers you a hybrid working model?

Are you ready to work on international projects for industry-leading clients around the world and elevate your tech consulting career to an international level?

If so, check below for more info about this career opportunity!

You bring passion, we bring opportunities!


#YourOpportunity

Deloitte is a worldwide leader in Professional Services with a presence in more than 150 countries and territories. Since 2018, Deloitte has been operating its Competence Center in Thessaloniki with satellites in the cities of Patras, Heraklion, and Ioannina - which are model hubs of expertise, training, and innovation, specializing in cutting-edge exponential technologies, in which graduates and young professionals undergo immersive experiences, continuous learning, gaining practical insights and hands-on training that empower them to navigate the complexities of the digital landscape.

Deloitte is an ideal working environment for both young and senior professionals who want to take the next step in their careers, offering them a supportive and international working environment that leverages their expertise and potential. Its corporate culture is based on trust and collaboration and ensures diversity and inclusion so that everyone feels part of a great team.


#YourServiceLine: Technology & Transformation

Our Technology & Transformation teams empower organizations to navigate the future through technology-driven business transformation. Combining deep industry knowledge with cutting-edge technology, we deliver tailored solutions that drive innovation, enhance efficiency, promote cybersecurity, and foster sustainable growth.

#AboutYourTeam

Our Deloitte Central Mediterranean practice (Greece, Italy, Malta) hosts our Salesforce Commerce Cloud and Magento/Adobe Commerce competence center. We are growing the pipeline of Italian based clients; thus, we are expanding to support international collaboration opportunities within Deloitte member firms across EMEA.

We are looking for a Junior Developer in Thessaloniki. You will have the chance to participate to important international projects becoming part of a growing, international network. You will be part of a project delivery team, with colleagues in Greece but as well as members of other international offices, including Italy. Delivering front and / or back-end development tasks, as part of an Agile Scrum team. The team supports our Clients in the design and implementation of value-added services based on eCommerce and Order Management technologies. You will have the opportunity to improve your knowledge of the eCommerce ecosystem, the services required by the market and your development skills. You will work on stimulating projects and have the opportunity to interact with enterprise-level international companies, supporting them in reaching their digital transformation goals. The role requires an interest in business process analysis and a willingness to learn Order Management solution configuration and integration skills.

For a full coverage of your role, you ought to be able to:

  • Support the design and implementation of OMS solutions in agile mode, participating in all project phases, from analysis to configuration, testing and production.
  • Collaborate with various team members (team leaders, technical architects, functional specialists, UX/UI experts and other developers) to complete project activities
  • Interact with client company representatives to understand their needs and support them in identifying the best solution.

#OurRequierements


Key Qualifications

To qualify for the role, you must have:

  • Degree related to Computer Engineering, Information Engineering, Computer Science, and Information Technology.
  • Excellent knowledge of English and strong communication and interpersonal skills, ability to work autonomously but also within a team, high motivation for consulting field and analytical and problem-solving attitude.
  • Knowledge of an Object-Oriented programming language (such as Java).
  • Knowledge of web front-end development (JavaScript, HTML/CSS).
  • Knowledge of relational databases and query languages (SQL).
  • Willingness to learn how to configure and extend package solutions and use the application's API.
  • Ability to write efficient, secure, and clean code.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Ability to work in teams.
  • Interest and motivation to work in consulting, system integration or in a corporate environment on projects related to Order Management Systems.
  • Flexibility and strong motivation to work in the fast-paced consulting field.
  • Ability to learn and adapt to new technologies quickly.
  • Availability to travel.

Bonus Qualifications

  • Experience with Salesforce suite (CRM, Service Cloud, Sales Cloud) and development tools (Apex, SOQL, Flows, LWC).
  • Basic knowledge of the main Order Management System solutions on the market (IBM Sterling, Manhattan, Fluent Commerce, Salesforce OMS, Radial, Kibo).
  • Interest in developing back-end integration with eCommerce and retail ecosystems.
  • Interest and/or indirect experience in eCommerce and Omnichannel projects.

The profile is rounded up by excellent analytical skills, precision, self-management capacities and a strong goal-oriented inclination.

Individuals who have a strong will to expand their knowledge of new technologies, a passion to grow within the company and aspirations for career growth. At Deloitte we foster a consultative culture because the best decisions are made in collaboration with others. We approach our work with a collaborative mindset, teaming across businesses, geographies, and skill sets to deliver tangible, measurable, attributable impact. These are not aspirations, but principles that we all commit to today and every day.

#WhatWeOffer

At Deloitte, we know that great people make a great organization. We value our people and offer employees a broad range of benefits:

🏠 Modern hybrid workplace, characterized by flexibility and Smart Working

⚖ Empowered well-being: We provide multiple program offerings to support your well-being needs (flexible working arrangements, extra days of leave, parental allowances)

🌍 Engagement within international large-scale teams and projects, with opportunities to travel for training or client purposes.

📚 Constant opportunities for learning with unlimited access to internal and external learning platforms and sponsored certificates aligned with business needs and technology trends

🚀 Challenging and innovating environment where personal development and growth are encouraged, always with transparency and trust

🌈 Diverse culture and active communities that enable you to bring yourself to work

🎉 Team Building and Corporate Social Responsibility Activities

🏃 A buddy to support you with your onboarding

🌴 Extra days of annual leave

⚕️Private medical health insurance plan

💳 Ticket restaurant card

🏷️Exclusive Discounts to several retail providers, restaurants, and others

📱 Mobile phone

🍏 Fresh fruits and unlimited coffee every day at our offices 

Sounds like the sort of role for you? Apply now.

Location: Thessaloniki

title: Future Opportunities - Internships
description_html:
Future Opportunities - Internships

What Impact will you make?

#YourOpportunity

Are you looking for an internship opportunity, that offers you a hybrid working model?

Are you ready to work on Greek and international projects for industry-leading clients around the world and elevate your career?

You bring passion, we bring opportunities!

#DiscoveringDeloitte

At Deloitte, the spirit of the excellence is part of our DNA. We strive to hire the brightest minds from all around the globe, allowing us to excel in both long-term strategic thinking and business improvement implementation as the undisputed global leader in professional services. We are committed to delivering impacting results for diverse private and public organization clients, linking our peerless talent with unrivalled opportunities for impact - committing ourselves to sustainable growth and investment in our employees’ development and inclusion along the way.

Our culture is rooted in profound shared values. Our values guide us as we live our purpose to serve our clients with quality and distinction, inspire our people to work collaboratively to deliver value, actively contribute to society, and lead the profession by challenging ourselves to do what matters most. Deloitte’s values are what unite us across cultures and geographies and ultimately help us earn the trust and respect of our people, clients, and society.

We believe that our differences enable us to #makeanimpactthatmatters.

Deloitte is an ideal working environment for those who want to make the first steps in their careers, offering them a supportive and international working environment that leverages their expertise and potential. Its corporate culture is based on trust and collaboration and ensures diversity and inclusion so that everyone feels part of a great team.

#WhoWeAreLookingFor

Individuals who have a strong will to expand their knowledge of new technologies and a passion to grow within the company. At Deloitte we foster a consultative culture because the best decisions are made in collaboration with others. We approach our work with a collaborative mindset, teaming across businesses, geographies, and skill sets to deliver tangible, measurable, attributable impact. These are not aspirations, but principles that we all commit to today and every day.

It’s never too early to think about your future! For a head start on an amazing career, join us as an Intern.

Deloitte offers different internship opportunities for dynamic and motivated students.

These programs provide excellent opportunities for students to experience our firm and its culture while you will learn from experienced colleagues and meet clients representing a variety of industries and environments as we help you make a smooth transition from student to professional life.

#ChooseDeloitteif:

  • You want to work with inspiring, enthusiastic, and supportive people with diverse geographical and academic backgrounds and extensive skills
  • You get excitement in handling clients shifting priorities and accomplish tasks in a challenging, fast-paced environment

title: AML Analyst
description_html:
Your Journey with Us


We are currently seeking to grow our Quality & Risk Management team which falls under the internal compliance function.

At Deloitte, we recognize there is no one size fits all career path, and global, cross-business mobility and up/re-skilling are all within the range of possibilities to shape a unique and fulfilling career. If you're ready to take your career to the next level in a challenging international environment, focusing on continuous learning and dynamic teamwork, you're ready for Deloitte!

How you will Make an Impact

You will be involved in certain functions that form part of the Customer Due Diligence (CDD) and Know Your Client (KYC) procedures of the firm.

Your main tasks will include but are not limited to the following:

  • Supporting and assisting in the general day-to-day duties relating to client acceptance and engagement acceptance, including client on-boarding, customer due diligence and Anti Money Laundering /Financing of Terrorism (AML/FT) screening, in line with the firm’s policies and procedures;
  • Assisting in the analysis of the firm’s clients’ profiles in carrying out the necessary client risk assessments at client on-boarding stage and on an ongoing basis;
  • Ongoing liaison with the QRM management team in order to ensure continued compliance with internal AML/FT policies and regulatory requirements;
  • The use of a number of IT systems and processes
  • Keeping updated on any changes in any relevant laws and regulations and undertaking any necessary tasks to ensure the firm’s ongoing compliance with such regulatory requirements.
  • Supporting client facing teams within the firm on matters or queries relating to AML/CFT;
  • Engaging in any other tasks commensurate with the role.

Let’ s Talk About You

We are looking for individuals with at least two years' of experience in AML to join our team. Candidates having local practical experience in applying the required KYC/CDD processes to corporate clients, including those forming part of large corporate structures, will be given preference.

You have a tertiary level of education, and possess sound knowledge of relevant Anti Money Laundering legislation and guidance.

Your Professional & Leadership skills:

  • Seeks challenges, and opportunities to build on own and teams’ strengths, develop new capabilities, and learn from and share with others.
  • Seeks opportunities to work with other teams; develops an understanding of what colleagues do and builds collaborative working relationships.
  • Is open to constructive feedback and transparency
  • Escalates potential risks to leaders
  • Develops an advanced understanding of confidentiality, data security and privacy responsibilities, including applicable policies and acts accordingly
  • Consults team leaders for clarity and applicability.

Your Specialized skills:

  • Sound knowledge of local AML/CFT Laws and Regulations
  • A high standard of written and spoken English
  • An ability and willingness to work within and as part of a team
  • Highly motivated with a strong work ethic
  • Naturally inquisitive, analytical and able to highlight risks based on findings;
  • Sound computer literacy; MS Word, Excel, Power point and Outlook.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
  • Excellent organizational skills, with the ability to manage multiple priorities and work under pressure in a fast-paced changing environment
  • Willingness to develop in the area of AML/ CFT

Our Story
World-leading professional services firm, we offer value added services in audit & assurance, risk advisory, accounting, tax & legal, consulting and financial advisory.

Our internal Quality and Risk Management (QRM) team falls under the Enabling Areas which support Deloitte’s client-facing services. Together with the client-financing teams, the QRM team plays a key role within the Firm where we focus on managing our business with integrity, improve quality and enhance our Firm’s brand and reputation. This includes anti-money laundering frameworks, addressing any conflicts of interest amongst clients and maintaining our independence from them, ensuring we remain compliant with regulations and managing the security of our people.


Why Deloitte?

As a Purpose-led organization, at the heart of everything we do is a set of timeless principles that distinguish the Deloitte culture. We foster diversity and inclusion and encourage you to bring your authentic self to work. Explore, question and collaborate while building a career that inspires and energies you. We tailor a personalized learning experience, offering you the opportunity to grow at your own pace and achieve maximum impact.

Life looks different for each of us, so we created a varied benefits package that you can tap into:

  • Four-day work week during the months of July and August.
  • Premium membership for corporate discounts in restaurants, retail, gyms and more.
  • Health Insurance cover for yourself and dependents. 
  • Sponsored mental health support sessions through leading mental health services.
  • Deloitte Communities to bring our people together and encourage work/life balance, social life and common interests.
  • Hybrid working flexibility subject to business requirements.
  • Digital learning, mentoring and regular performance snapshots.
  • Renowned training programme with Deloitte University.

Join us to make an impact together! Apply now!

title: Junior Tax Consultant – Business Tax, M&A, International Tax – MILANO
description_html:
YOUR OPPORTUNITY

Sei un laureand*, neolaureat* o un giovane professionista con background economico e tributario e vuoi crescere professionalmente nel settore della Fiscalità d’Impresa?

Lo Studio Tributario e Societario Deloitte, Società tra Professionisti dedicata alla consulenza ed assistenza fiscale ad imprese e gruppi italiani ed internazionali, sta ricercando per la sede di Milano giovani Professionisti da inserire nelle Service Line Business Tax, M&A, International Tax.

L’opportunità di inserimento e crescita professionale è dedicata a giovani talenti desiderosi di intraprendere un percorso trasversale e multidisciplinare all’interno di un network di consulenza internazionale.

Se ti piace lavorare in squadra, hai una buona conoscenza della lingua inglese (B2), vuoi intraprendere la pratica da dottore commercialista e, soprattutto, hai voglia di investire su te stess*, questa è l’opportunità che fa per te!

 Business Tax (BT) M&A, International Tax

All’interno delle Service Line Business Tax, M&A, International Tax sarai coinvolt* in un percorso di crescita professionale focalizzato nella consulenza fiscale per società multinazionali e grandi gruppi societari, in ambito ordinario, straordinario e di fiscalità internazionale.

Nel nostro Team potrai occuparti sia di tematiche di fiscalità d’impresa generale (ordinaria e straordinaria) che specialistiche (M&A, Fiscalità Internazionale, Real estate e digitalizzazione processi fiscali d’impresa), operando di un contesto dinamico ed in rapida e costante evoluzione ricco di sfide.

 YOUR ROLE AND RESPONSIBILITIES

Ti sarà affidato un ruolo proattivo e di crescente responsabilità negli incarichi e progetti in cui sarai coinvolt*. Sei il talento che cerchiamo se hai le seguenti caratteristiche:

  • Laureand*/Neolaureat* Magistrali con background economico/fiscale;
    • Esperienza fino a 2 anni nell’ambito della consulenza fiscale e societaria rivolta ad imprese e gruppi sia nazionali che multinazionali, maturata preferibilmente presso primari Studi o società di revisione con specifico riferimento a tematiche di fiscalità d’impresa, International Tax ed M&A;
    • Buona conoscenza della lingua inglese;
    • Conoscenza del pacchetto Microsoft Office;
    • Propensione all’innovazione tecnologica;
    • Motivazione, determinazione e attitudine al team working.

Completano il profilo ottime capacità comunicative e relazionali, autonomia organizzativa, intraprendenza, flessibilità e dinamicità, attitudine e forte motivazione verso il settore della consulenza.

 Quello che troverai all’interno del Team Business Tax è: 

    • Ambiente giovane e dinamico;
    • Retribuzione competitiva;
    • Opportunità di training on the job, oltre a un piano di e-learning personalizzato in base alle aree di interesse;
    • Concrete possibilità di crescita e responsabilizzazione;
    • Contesto internazionale: relazione continua con le sedi estere del Network Deloitte e possibilità di svolgere esperienze lavorative e di formazione all’estero.

 ABOUT SANTA SOFIA 28 - LA NUOVA SEDE DI MILANO

A settembre 2024 Deloitte ha aperto le porte della nuova sede in via Santa Sofia 28 a Milano.

Un "Near Zero Energy Building" che incarna la nostra visione di un ambiente di lavoro flessibile, inclusivo e sostenibile, pensato per favorire creatività e collaborazione. Un ecosistema integrato di tre edifici, contraddistinto da un design all’avanguardia con 48mila metri quadri di spazi innovativi e 1100mq di nuove aree verdi.

 ABOUT STUDIO TRIBUTARIO E SOCIETARIO

Lo Studio Tributario e Societario, Società tra Professionisti dedicata alla consulenza ed assistenza fiscale ad imprese e gruppi italiani ed internazionali, facente parte del network Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu, è presente in Italia con sedi a Milano, Roma, Firenze, Torino, Genova, Bologna, Padova, Napoli e Catania. Lo Studio offre consulenza ed assistenza fiscale e tributaria nei diversi settori di specializzazione con scrupolosa attenzione agli aspetti tecnici, forte impegno verso la qualità e continuo riferimento alle esigenze del cliente.

 MAKE AN IMPACT THAT MATTERS

 Deloitte è un network leader nei servizi professionali alle imprese, presente in oltre 150 Paesi con 457 mila professionisti. Offriamo soluzioni innovative e sostenibili in Audit & Assurance, Consulting, Financial Advisory, Risk Advisory, Tax e Legal. Il nostro obiettivo è supportare le aziende nello sviluppo e nell'implementazione di strategie al passo con il mercato.

 In Deloitte la sostenibilità è un tema centrale. Per questo, attraverso le strategie e le progettualità legate alle tematiche Environmental, Social e Governance (ESG), ci impegniamo a promuovere una crescita responsabile, sostenibile e inclusiva per il Pianeta, le nostre persone e la società. Scopri di più sulle nostre strategie di Corporate Sustainability, tra cui Well-being, la strategia volta a migliorare il benessere fisico, mentale e sociale delle nostre persone, affinché siano felici e piene di energia in tutti gli ambiti della loro vita e WorldClimate, la strategia globale di Deloitte per diventare un’organizzazione Net Zero e per guidare scelte responsabili all’interno e all’esterno dell’organizzazione. #LI-Hybrid

Sei pront* a #MakeAnImpactThatMatter insieme?  Candidati ora!

Le persone interessate possono inviare la propria candidatura con autorizzazione ai sensi del dlgs. 196/2003. La ricerca rispetta il d.lgs. 198/2006, il D.lgs. 215/03 e il D.lgs. 216/03 ed è aperta a candidat* di qualsiasi orientamento o espressione di genere, orientamento sessuale, età, etnia e credo religioso. Il presente annuncio è stato ideato nel rispetto della diversity e dell’inclusività.

title: Experienced - Legal Consultant
description_html:
Experienced – Legal Consultant

We are seeking a Consultant to join the Quality of Risk team in Milan working in a Hybrid mode.
The Quality of Risk business supports our internal clients in the management and negotiation of contracts and legal documentation, identifying risks and ensuring compliance with Deloitte’s principles.

Your Role

The Experienced resource will be integrated into a work team and responsible for:
  • Review, draft, qualify, and negotiate various types of contractual documentation including framework agreements, General Terms & Conditions, consultancy agreements, confidentiality and non-disclosure agreements and letters of intent.
  • Identify risks and deviations from Deloitte contracting principles and, where necessary, obtain senior management approval.
  • Preparation and negotiation of contractual qualifications with new and existing clients.
  • Prepare contract and risk summaries to ensure that all relevant project personnel are aware of contractual obligations, risks and objectives.
  • Negotiate to resolve contractual and business disputes on live projects, consulting with and advising business managers.
  • Maintenance and adherence to all relevant policies, processes and procedures contained within Deloitte’s business management system.

Winning Requirements

  • Degree educated in Law or relevant Business-related qualification.
  • knowledge the structure of the contracts and the ability to draft in a legal/contractual context.
  • 1 or 2 years of experience working preferably within a Contracts or Legal department.
  • Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written, with the ability to build and maintain strong business relationships at all levels and translate to a non-legal audience.

title: Cyber Security SOC Manager
description_html:
Cyber Security SOC Manager


What Impact will you make?


#YourOpportunity


If you understand the very real dangers cyber threats pose and embrace the challenge of helping keep people and networks safe, then Deloitte Cyber is the right place to develop your career. We offer a wide range of opportunities to work with industry-leading clients and projects — and the technological resources to help them tackle their biggest challenges.

A role with Deloitte Cyber, isn’t just a career. It’s a calling. To help make the world more trustworthy, resilient, and secure. If you’re interested in joining a group of people who don’t just want to fix what’s broken but want to build something better, apply for a role with Deloitte Cyber.

We are currently seeking Senior professionals with good analytical skills and a well-rounded personality to become part of our dynamic Cyber team. You will build your knowledge and experience working in a team of diverse and talented professionals who enjoy designing and implementing innovative cybersecurity and data protection strategies, for market leading clients in diverse industries (e.g., Financial Services, Energy, Telecommunications Media & Technology, Life Sciences & Healthcare etc.).

  • You want to be involved in the definition of new and cutting-edge solutions to address cybersecurity challenges for the most relevant and prestigious clients across industry verticals.
  • You want to work with inspiring, ambitious, and supportive people with diverse geographical and academic backgrounds and extensive skills.
  • You are a cyber enthusiast and visionary and you think that it will shape our future.
  • You get excitement in managing clients shifting priorities and accomplish tasks in a challenging, fast-paced environment.
  • You like to nurture people and share your knowledge with others.

 

Deloitte’s Cyber professionals help organizations focus on enterprise-level cyber risks through a strategic approach. Our services help clients reimagine cyber risk to uncover strategic opportunities aligned with their business priorities — to gain competitive advantage and become more trustworthy, resilient, and secure. We help clients conduct cyber assessments and benchmarking that set a foundation for training and reporting across the organization. And we help them identify potential insider threats and design programs to thwart it. Then we turn the lens toward helping clients modernize their core and traditional/ cloud infrastructures with next-generation security controls that help manage cyber risks and exposure.

You will thrive in a global environment, developing and managing innovative strategic initiatives for customers and collaborating with colleagues belonging to different geographies and backgrounds.

 

#YourRole


  • Manage cybersecurity activities within wider projects, identifying, evaluating, and designing best-in-class security services from security operational, architectural, and engineering perspectives, demonstrating operational excellence, vision, and strategic thinking.
  • Responsible for service management of the team including overall use of resources and initiation of corrective action where required for the SOC team.
  • Responsible for the SOC team’s success in security incident monitoring, identification, assessment, quantification, reporting, communication, and mitigation efforts.
  • Participate in incident response (IR) efforts; detect, identify, respond, contain, and remediate information security incidents.
  • Provide tactical support as needed for major incidents impacting clients.
  • Ensure compliance to Service Level Agreements (SLAs), process adherence and process improvement to achieve operational objectives.
  • Coordination and collaboration with Deloitte’s EMEA Cyber Security Centre to support service delivery.
  • Execute complex project activities, coach and support less experienced team members, and coordinate part of the team while supporting your more senior colleagues in managing client relations and expectations to achieve common goals aligned with business objectives.
  • Manage own work against the project plan to ensure a superior client experience.
  • Engage with internal and external stakeholders to strengthen business relations and create business opportunities.
  • Receive training and attain certifications in the use of cutting-edge cybersecurity products and various cybersecurity topics.

  

#WinningRequirements


  • Bachelor and/or Master’s degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, Cyber Security or equivalent.
  • 5 - 7 years of experience in a SOC (leading) position (e.g., SOC Manager, SOC team leader, Incident Respond leader, Security Architect, etc.), preferably in an MSSP or consulting company.
  • Working experience in security technologies such as: Security information and event management (SIEM), IDS/IPS, Data Loss Prevention (DLP), Proxy, Web Application Firewall (WAF), Endpoint detection and response (EDR), Anti-Virus, Sandboxing, network- and host- based firewalls, Threat Intelligence, Penetration Testing, etc.
  • Extensive knowledge of Advanced Persistent Threats (APT) tactics, techniques, and procedures.
  • Understanding of possible attack activities such as network probing/ scanning, DDOS, malicious code activity, etc.
  • Technical expertise in incident response planning, handling and management.
  • Relevant professional certifications, such as CISSP, CISM, GIAC certification, and MS Certification, will be considered a plus.
  • Demonstrate leadership and communication skills.
  • Proven ability to translate complex information sets into specific recommendations that can be actioned by customers to enhance their security posture.
  • Be an independent and collaborative person who cooperates in one or more project teams to deliver high-quality results.
  • Possess interpersonal skills and the ability to develop effective and lasting relationships with clients and colleagues.
  • Fluent knowledge of the English language.
  • Military obligations fulfilled where applicable.

 

#ChooseDeloitteif:

 

  • You want to work with inspiring, ambitious, and supportive people with diverse geographical and academic backgrounds and extensive skills.
  • You get excitement in managing clients shifting priorities and accomplish tasks in a challenging, fast-paced environment.
  • You like to nurture people and share your knowledge with others.

 

#AboutDeloitte

 

Our services

Deloitte offers Global professional services that include Audit, Risk Advisory, Tax, Consulting and Financial Advisory. Our approach combines insight and innovation from multiple disciplines with global business and industry expertise to help our clients excel anywhere in the world.

We deliver outstanding impact on the reputation and success of our clients, in Greece and globally. In pursuing this we contribute to a sustainable and prosperous society, and are firm believers in the positive impact business can and should have on the world it operates within.

 

Our Purpose

Our purpose, “To make an impact that matters for our clients, our people and society “- defines who we are and what we stand for. This is not about size, it's about being the first choice. The first choice for the largest and most influential clients, and the first choice for the best talent.

 

Our values

At Deloitte we foster a collaborative culture where talented individuals can produce their best work. We value innovative thinking, diverse insights and a genuinely distinctive level of customer service. We value difference, with respect at the heart of our inclusive culture, and we support agile working arrangements.

 

Our talent experience

From day one at our firm, practitioners are part of a community. Our development and career progression framework will help them develop the skills and capabilities to succeed. The wellness of our people and the ability to offer agile working arrangements is at the centre of our unique talent experience. We create a workplace that encourages collaboration, creativity, inclusiveness to ensure our staff are supported, encouraged, and feel a sense of purpose and meaning in what they do each day.

 

Sounds like the sort of role for you? Apply now.

title: Trainee public and administrative law Catania
description_html:
What impact will you make?

YOUR OPPORTUNITY
In Deloitte Legal avrai l’opportunità di esplorare il futuro dei servizi legali in un ambiente internazionale e multidisciplinare, dove le nuove idee trovano terreno fertile e le possibilità di crescita sono infinite. Lavorerai nel team Public & Administrative Law presso la nostra sede di Catania. 

Your Role and Responsibilities
Sarai coinvolto/a, con un crescente grado di autonomia, nelle attività di:
