description_html:
Ingegnere Energetico - Global Investment & Innovation Incentives  (GI3) - MILANO

La risorsa sarà inserita nel team di Milano della service line Global Investment and Innovation Incentives (Gi3) dello Studio Tributario e Societario Deloitte.


Il Team Global Investment & Innovation Incentives (GI3)

In Italia, la service line Gi3 - Incentivi governativi è composta da oltre 60 persone tra profili tecnico-scientifici (ingegneri/matematici/biologi) e specialisti fiscali, e offre ai propri clienti servizi ad alto valore aggiunto nel campo degli incentivi per gli investimenti in innovazione. La risorsa avrà l’opportunità di lavorare in un ambiente multinazionale e multidisciplinare, la service line Gi3 a livello globale nel network Deloitte e conta più di 1400 professionisti in più di 40 Paesi in tutto il mondo.

Attualmente siamo alla ricerca di un profilo tecnico per rafforzare il Team di Milano nell’assistenza ai clienti sui principali incentivi e contributi all’innovazione e alla sostenibilità. La risorsa sarà coinvolta nella consulenza per bandi, incentivi fiscali ed altre opportunità di finanziamento per i nuovi investimenti sia a livello regionale, nazionale e comunitario.

Your Role and responsibilities:

Cerchiamo una risorsa da inserire come Junior Consultant, con interesse nella Finanza Agevolata che, tra le altre, avrà le seguenti mansioni:

-          Analisi dei requisiti tecnici per accedere ai principali incentivi/bandi

-          Verifica, anche in campo, della sussistenza dei requisiti

-          Analisi di documenti tecnici del cliente

-          Predisposizione di documenti tecnici richiesti dalle normative

-          Supporto backoffice al team

-          Scouting e screening delle misure incentivanti;

 

Winning Requirements

Desideriamo entrare in contatto con candidati che abbiano:

-          Laurea specialistica in ingegneria (preferibilmente indirizzo energetico)

-          Padronanza di tematiche relative all’energia

-          Ottima conoscenza della lingua inglese scritta e parlata.

-          Ottima conoscenza del pacchetto Office (Excel; Powerpoint);

-          Una mente creativa e curiosa, spiccate capacità analitiche e di sintesi;

-          Capacità relazionali e propensione al lavoro in team multidisciplinari.

-          Completa il profilo la conoscenza dei principali strumenti di agevolazione emanati dal GSE

 

Siamo alla ricerca di profili con brillanti percorsi accademici, preferibilmente con esperienza all’estero, dinamici, motivati e con propensione all’obiettivo, da inserire in un team giovane e multidisciplinare.

 

 ABOUT STUDIO TRIBUTARIO E SOCIETARIO


Con sedi a Bari, Bologna, Brescia, Catania, Firenze, Genova, Milano, Napoli, Padova, Parma, Roma, Torino, Treviso, Varese e Vicenza, lo Studio Tributario e Societario Deloitte può contare su una presenza capillare in tutto il territorio nazionale, ponendosi, grazie ai suoi desk di New York e Hong Kong e allo stretto collegamento con il Network internazionale Deloitte, come un primario interlocutore per un servizio globale di consulenza fiscale e societaria.

Lo Studio offre una vasta gamma di servizi professionali nei diversi settori di specializzazione fiscale con scrupolosa attenzione agli aspetti tecnici, forte impegno verso la qualità e continuo riferimento alle esigenze del cliente.

ABOUT DELOITTE

I nostri servizi

Deloitte offre servizi integrati di Audit, Consulting, Financial Advisory, Risk Advisory, Tax & Legal. Il nostro approccio unisce conoscenze multidisciplinari, esperienza a livello globale, innovazione e servizi di alta qualità. Aiutiamo i nostri clienti a concretizzare le proprie aspirazioni, fornendo loro gli strumenti per affrontare le sfide più complesse del business, in Italia e nel mondo. Crediamo fermamente che il nostro lavoro possa influenzare positivamente la comunità in cui operiamo.

Il nostro purpose

Make an impact that matters. Questo è il nostro obiettivo, e ciò che ci definisce. Significa fare la differenza per i nostri clienti, per i nostri colleghi e nella società, creando un impatto a lungo termine. Vogliamo essere la prima scelta dei clienti, la prima scelta dei talenti e i primi a lasciare un segno.

I nostri valori

Incoraggiamo la collaborazione, la diversità di pensiero e la capacità di pensare fuori dagli schemi. Con questo approccio aiutiamo i talenti a esprimere al meglio le proprie capacità. Per noi la diversity è un valore e il rispetto è al centro della nostra cultura inclusiva.

La nostra talent experience

Chi lavora in Deloitte, fin dal primo giorno, si sente parte di un Network che supporta e incoraggia i colleghi. Il percorso di crescita e di carriera consente di sviluppare le competenze e le capacità per avere successo. In un ambiente di lavoro che incoraggia la collaborazione e la creatività, il benessere delle nostre persone e la flessibilità sono al centro di una talent experience distintiva.

Sei pront* a #MakeAnImpactThatMatter insieme?  Candidati ora! 

La ricerca rispetta il d.lgs. 198/2006, il D.lgs. 215/03 e il D.lgs. 216/03 ed è aperta a candidat* di qualsiasi orientamento o espressione di genere, orientamento sessuale, età, etnia e credo religioso. Il presente annuncio è stato ideato nel rispetto della diversity e dell’inclusività.

title: Trainee/Junior Lawyer – Intangibles, Data & Technology (IDT) Practice Group
description_html:
Trainee/Junior Lawyer – Intangibles, Data & Technology (IDT) Practice Group

Experience the future of law, today!

YOUR OPPORTUNITY

Koimtzoglou-Bakalis-Venieris-Leventis and Associates (KBVL Law Firm), Member firm of Deloitte Legal Network in Greece), is currently looking for a brilliant Trainee/Junior Lawyer to join its dynamic and highly motivating legal practice in Athens.

We are currently seeking to recruit a Trainee/Junior Lawyer, who will join our Intangibles, Data & Technology - IDT practice group.

JOB DESCRIPTION

You will join our IDT team, one of the largest highly specialized Intangibles, Data & Technology teams, dealing with a diversified client portfolio, across industries and borders. We aim to deliver practical, business-oriented solutions that help transform the way our clients operate, enabling innovation and growth through the use of new technologies, while maintaining legal and regulatory compliance.

Our IDT practice covers a wide variety of subject matters including data protection, cybersecurity, cyber-resilience, new technologies (including AI), intellectual property, legal function transformation and contract management automation, telecommunications and media, as well as other types of regulatory compliance e.g. Whistleblowing schemes.

YOUR ROLE AND RESPONSIBILITIES

Your role as a Trainee/Junior Lawyer will focus on the delivery of client engagements, exercising effective communication and relationship-building skills, as well as contributing to the priorities of the team. In this role, you will commit to personal learning and development and explore opportunities to make an impact by delivering exceptional legal services.

During your tenure, you will demonstrate and develop the ability to:

  • Provide legal, practical solutions to complex legal issues while delivering a high-quality output, making an impact for our clients and creating trusted relationships;
  • Provide legal advice relating to:
    • supporting the role of external Data Protection Officer, carrying out data protection tasks, such as handling data subject requests, assisting in personal data breaches, consulting on data protection impact assessments, delivering advice on legal and regulatory requirements on data protection matters and helping deliver privacy trainings to employees;
    • assisting in privacy management operational activities, such as conducting data mapping exercises, drafting or reviewing privacy notices, privacy policies and procedures;
    • Draft, review and support in negotiations of commercial agreements on all data protection, cybersecurity and cyber-resilience matters;
    • cooperate with cross-functional teams to conduct M&A due diligence on data protection, cybersecurity, intellectual property and other legal and regulatory compliance matters.
  • Conduct legal research and analysis on data protection, cybersecurity, intellectual property and artificial intelligence.

OUR REQUIREMENTS

Our ideal candidate is a bright and ambitious young lawyer/trainee lawyer that focuses on delivering work of high quality, commits to a high level of client service, and has the ability to build strong client relationships. We expect that you have strong interpersonal and organizational skills, the ability to work effectively within a team of peers and of more senior team members, have a meticulous attention to detail and deliver practical, business-oriented legal solutions.

In particular, to qualify for the role you must have:

  • An exceptional academic track record from both high school and university;
  • A degree in Law (Bachelor of Laws (LL.B), Juris Doctor (JD) or equivalent;
  • Be registered as a Trainee Attorney-at-Law or already qualified as an Attorney-at-Law in Greece (Athens Bar Association or other Greek Bar Association membership);
  • Zero (0) to three (3) years of relevant work experience;
  • Professional written and spoken English with excellent drafting and presentation skills;
  • Strong organizational and communication skills;
  • Multi-tasker and able to work efficiently and timely under pressure and strict deadlines;
  • Capacity to be detail – oriented and ability to deliver high quality work;
  • Strong collaborative skills – ability to work effectively both independently and within a team;
  • Highly motivated and dynamic personality with a good business development mindset and a demonstrated track record of going above-and-beyond expectations;
  • Ability to conduct legal research, interpret legislation and case law.

Preferred Skills:

  • A Master of Laws (LL.M.) in Data Protection, Cybersecurity or New Technologies from a prominent, well-acclaimed University in Greece or abroad will be considered an asset;
  • Additional languages (French, German, Italian or other) will be considered an asset;
  • Previous experience in data protection, cybersecurity, intellectual property.

Demonstrated interest and sound understanding of new or emerging technologies (e.g. artificial intelligence, data centers, PCs, connected devices, and software)

  • Diploma/Certifications/Seminars in data protection, cybersecurity, artificial intelligence;
  • Diploma/Certifications/Seminars in privacy management platforms;
  • Prior experience working on an in-house legal team and/or law firm.

ABOUT DELOITTE LEGAL

Deloitte member firms have a long standing reputation for helping clients to address complex, cross border issues. Skilled and experienced Deloitte Legal lawyers work together with other Deloitte professionals in tax, consulting, and financial advisory to guide clients through their projects in a coordinated way around the world. Deloitte Legal is able to provide holistic guidance around strategic business decisions as well as offer support services that can increase efficiency and reduce the cost of some routine legal activities.

Deloitte Legal is one of only a few truly global legal service providers. With more than 1,750 professionals in more than 75 countries we comprise one of the top 5 business law practices in Continental Europe and have substantial operations elsewhere in the world.

Deloitte Legal is focused on helping clients to take action today to achieve their business objectives tomorrow.

Koimtzoglou-Bakalis-Venieris-Leventis & Associates Law Partnership ("KBVL Law Firm") is a Greek law partnership regulated by Presidential Decree 81/2005 and Law 4194/2013, as currently in force. It is a registered legal entity member of the Athens Bar Association and is qualified to provide legal services and Greek law advice. KBVL Law Firm is also the sole Greek member of Deloitte Legal, an international network of law firms.

© 2026 For information, contact KBVL Law Firm

title: Junior - Platform Architecture & Governance - NextHub Bari
description_html:
Junior - Platform Architecture & Governance - NextHub Bari

Your Role

• Supportare la definizione e l’implementazione di policy e linee guida di governance  per SharePoint e Microsoft 365. 

• Collaborare con team interni e stakeholder per comprendere i requisiti di business e trasformarli in soluzioni efficaci. 

• Contribuire alla gestione dell’architettura dell’informazione su SharePoint (strutture di siti, permessi, tassonomie). 

• Monitorare l’utilizzo delle piattaforme, generando insight e report per supportare l’adozione e la qualità dei contenuti. 

• Gestire richieste di supporto, configurazioni e piccoli sviluppi no-code/low-code su SharePoint e Power Platform. 

• Promuovere l’utilizzo efficace e sicuro delle piattaforme tramite comunicazione e formazione agli utenti. 

• Supportare l’integrazione con altri strumenti Microsoft 365, come Teams, OneDrive, Planner e Power Automate.

Winning Requirements

• Laurea in Informatica, Ingegneria, Sistemi Informativi o campi affini (anche triennale) o esperienza equivalente

• Certificazioni Microsoft sono un plus ma non obbligatorie (es. MS-900, PL-900, SC-900)

• Da 1 a 2 anni di esperienza in ruoli affini, oppure conoscenza approfondita delle piattaforme Microsoft 365 e SharePoint, anche maturata in ambito consulenziale o accademico

• Familiarità con SharePoint Online: siti, elenchi, permessi, librerie documentali 

• Conoscenza base o intermedia della Power Platform (Power Automate, Power Apps)

• Buona comprensione dell’ecosistema Microsoft 365 (Teams, OneDrive, Outlook, Planner)

• Capacità di scrivere documentazione e linee guida tecniche e funzionali

Nice to have

• Attitudine al lavoro in team e alla collaborazione cross-funzionale 

• Buone capacità analitiche, comunicative e orientamento al problem-solving

• Curiosità, proattività e voglia di crescere in un contesto tecnologicamente evoluto


To Make An Impact That Matters

Il network Deloitte, leader nei servizi professionali alle imprese, opera a livello globale in più di 150 Paesi con oltre 460 mila persone.

In Italia, Deloitte è presente in 24 città con circa 13.400 persone che assistono i clienti offrendo servizi di Audit & Assurance, Technology & Transformation, Strategy, Risk & Transactions Advisory e Tax & Legal.

In qualità di network globale ci impegniamo per affrontare le principali sfide sociali, economiche e ambientali della società di oggi. WorldImpact è il nostro programma globale che riunisce tutte le iniziative attraverso cui vogliamo avere un impatto positivo sulle persone, i clienti, l’ambiente e le comunità in cui operiamo. 

Con Impact for Italy, la declinazione italiana di WorldImpact, Deloitte ha realizzato progetti che – in collaborazione con istituzioni, realtà del terzo settore, università e altri soggetti – hanno lasciato un impatto concreto e una legacy per il futuro su tutto il territorio nazionale.

La ricerca rispetta il d.lgs. 198/2006, il D.lgs. 215/03 e il D.lgs. 216/03 ed è aperta a candidat* di qualsiasi orientamento o espressione di genere, orientamento sessuale, età, etnia e credo religioso. Il presente annuncio è stato ideato nel rispetto della diversity e dell’inclusività.

La risorsa lavorerà su progetti strategici per compagnie assicurative, asset manager e wealth manager, contribuendo all’evoluzione sostenibile del settore finanziario.

title: Experienced - Credit Risk
description_html:
Experienced - Credit Risk 

Stiamo cercando una figura Consultant/Senior Consultant con esperienza dimostrata e competenze nelle attività di sviluppo modelli in ambito Credit Risk. Il candidato verrà inserito nel team Credit Risk nella sede di Milano, con modalità di lavoro Hybrid.

La risorsa verrà inserita per supportare iniziative di business in ambito CRO presso i principali clienti italiani ed europei, contribuendo allo sviluppo di modelli predittivi anche tramite tecniche avanzate quali big data analytics e machine learning, e promuovendo l’integrazione di approcci innovativi a supporto dei processi creditizi.
 
Your Role

La risorsa Experienced verrà inserita in un team di lavoro e si occuperà di:

  • Identificare i bisogni del cliente e contribuire alla formulazione delle più opportune soluzioni progettuali, utilizzando un approccio strutturato ed orientato al problem solving;
  • Contribuire a creare una relazione di fiducia, positiva e collaborativa, all’interno del team e con il cliente;
  • Collaborare efficacemente attraverso il Network Internazionale, al fine di definire e fornire soluzioni in linea con le best practices globali;
  • Definire soluzioni innovative, ad esempio basate su nuove metodologie, analytics e nuove tecnologie, in collaborazione con i colleghi esperti in materia;


Winning Requirements
  • Esperienza di almeno 2 – 4 anni in Società di consulenza o Istituzioni Finanziarie
  • Laurea in materie economiche e statistiche
  • Competenze di sviluppo modelli di stima dei parametri di rischio PD-LGD-EAD e altri modelli previsionali in ambito rischio di credito, utilizzati a fini regolamentari (AIRB) o a supporto dei processi gestionali 
  • Comprovata competenze di programmazione quali ad esempio SAS, SQL, Python.
  • Conoscenza di tecniche avanzate di machine learning e intelligenza artificiale, familiarità con strumenti di data analytics, piattaforme di big data e cloud computing sono considerati un plus
  • Esperienza nella conduzione di stress test EBA/ECB e/o in ambito di stress test gestionali in ambito rischio di credito, inclusa la capacità di progettare, implementare e analizzare scenari di stress testing.
  • La conoscenza delle basi dati segnaletiche COREP/FINREP costituisce un elemento preferenziale
  • Disponibilità ad operare in trasferta anche internazionale
  • Ottimo livello di inglese

Make An Impact That Matters

Deloitte è un network leader nei servizi professionali alle imprese, presente in oltre 150 Paesi con 457 mila professionisti. Offriamo soluzioni innovative e sostenibili in Audit & Assurance, Consulting, Financial Advisory, Risk Advisory, Tax e Legal. Il nostro obiettivo è supportare le aziende nello sviluppo e nell'implementazione di strategie al passo con il mercato.

In Deloitte la sostenibilità è un tema centrale. Per questo, attraverso le strategie e le progettualità legate alle tematiche Environmental, Social e Governance (ESG), ci impegniamo a promuovere una crescita responsabile, sostenibile e inclusiva per il Pianeta, le nostre persone e la società. Scopri di più sulle nostre strategie di Corporate Sustainability, tra cui Well-being, la strategia volta a migliorare il benessere fisico, mentale e sociale delle nostre persone, affinché siano felici e piene di energia in tutti gli ambiti della loro vita e WorldClimate, la strategia globale di Deloitte per diventare un’organizzazione Net Zero e per guidare scelte responsabili all’interno e all’esterno dell’organizzazione.

Sei pront* a #MakeAnImpactThatMatter insieme? Candidati ora!

La ricerca rispetta il d.lgs. 198/2006, il D.lgs. 215/03 e il D.lgs. 216/03 ed è aperta a candidat* di qualsiasi orientamento o espressione di genere, orientamento sessuale, età, etnia e credo religioso. Il presente annuncio è stato ideato nel rispetto della diversity e dell’inclusività.

Experienced - PMO Energy Sector


Stiamo cercando una figura consultant/senior consultant da inserire nel team Enterprise Architecture di Deloitte nella sede di Roma, che lavorerà in modalità Hybrid. 

Il business Enterprise Architecture si occupa di progetti challenging: dalla trasformazione della piattaforma di supporto per grandi clienti, ai processi di Budgeting&Controlling su soluzione Cloud e processi di AFC o Program Management office per grandi e piccoli clienti, sia italiani che internazionali.

Sarai coinvolto nel supporto delle attività di assistenza al CEO e il Top Management dell’azienda nel migliorare la profittabilità e raggiungere l’eccellenza operativa del business model.

  • supportare le aziende nel processo di implementazione di soluzioni tecnologiche, dalla fase di concept fino all'implementazione;
  • supportare nella definizione di piani di trasformazione IT pluriennali e definire la relativa Enterprise Architecture e roadmap di adozione;
  • specializzarsi come Technology Advisory al CXO per supportare la crescita e la trasformazione digitale del business attraverso la tecnologia;
  • sviluppare e integrare soluzioni software e occupandoti di progetti in ambito Technology Strategy.

  • Conoscenza e padronanza di strumenti di Data Analysis (Excel, Power BI, ClickView)
  • Conoscenza approfondita delle metodologie e standard ISO 9000 di gestione della qualità e del ciclo di vita del software;

title: Experienced Data Scientist Digital
description_html:
Experienced Data Scientist Digital 

Stiamo cercando una figura consultant/senior consultant da inserire nel team Customer Analytics di Deloitte Digital nella sede di Milano/Roma che lavorerà in modalità Hybrid. 
Il team Customer Analytics di Deloitte Digital si occupa di supportare i nostri clienti nella individuazione di soluzioni e modelli finalizzati al miglioramento della produttività, efficienza, qualità dei servizi offerti, anche con il supporto delle nuove tecnologie.

Sarai coinvolto nel supporto delle attività legate al mondo della marketing technology: dalla definizione strategica, all’analisi dei requisiti di progetto alla definizione della sua architettura, dallo sviluppo funzionale dell’applicativo fino alla sua delivery.


Your Role


La risorsa Experienced verrà inserita in un team di lavoro:

  • Di sviluppatori impegnati nell'esecuzione di progetti e in attività di ricerca e sviluppo (R&D).
  • Sarà responsabile dello sviluppo e dell'implementazione di tecnologie all'avanguardia (Computer vision, NLP, GenAI).
  • I candidati ideali saranno esperti nell'uso di tecnologie all'avanguardia come computer vision, elaborazione del linguaggio naturale (NLP), GenAI, analisi delle serie temporali, reti neurali grafiche e altri sottodomini dell'AI/ML per risolvere complessi problemi aziendali in settori diversi come il consumo, i servizi finanziari, le telecomunicazioni, le utility, ecc.


Winning Requirements

  • Laurea triennale richiesta, preferibilmente in un campo correlato alle STEM (Data Science, Informatica, Ingegneria, Fisica, Matematica, ecc.)
  • Oltre 2 anni di esperienza in data science e analisi di rete, inclusi lo sviluppo di algoritmi AI/ML e l'analisi dei dati nelle principali modalità di dati da NLP, analisi delle serie temporali, computer vision, a modelli grafici.
  • Oltre 2 anni di esperienza nei linguaggi di programmazione principali e nei pacchetti di data science (Python, Keras, Tensorflow, PyTorch, Pandas, Scikit-learn, Jupyter, XGBoost, lgbm ecc.)
  • Nice to Have:
    • Esperienza di lavoro con LLMs (GPT, LLaMA, Claude, ecc.) e modelli multimodali.
    • Capacità di implementare modelli AI in applicazioni reali utilizzando pipeline ML e servizi cloud (AWS, GCP, Azure).
    • Solida comprensione della modellazione probabilistica, dell'apprendimento non supervisionato e delle tecniche di interpretabilità dei modelli.
    • Esperienza pratica con database vettoriali, generazione aumentata dal recupero (RAG) e ingegneria dei prompt.
    • Familiarità con le pratiche MLOps per il deployment e il monitoraggio scalabile dei modelli.
    • Esperienza con la containerizzazione (Docker) e lo sviluppo di API per il deployment e l'integrazione dei modelli è un plus.

title: Manager – Audit – Industry
description_html:
Manager – Audit – Industry

What Impact will you make?

#DiscoveringDeloitte:

At Deloitte, the spirit of the excellence is part of our DNA. We strive to hire the brightest minds from all around the globe, allowing us to excel in both long-term strategic thinking and business improvement implementation as the undisputed global leader in professional services. We are committed to delivering impacting results for diverse private and public organization clients, linking our peerless talent in audit with unrivalled opportunities for impact – committing ourselves to sustainable growth and investment in our employees’ development and inclusion along the way.

Our culture is rooted in profound shared values. Our values guide us as we live our purpose to serve our clients with quality and distinction, inspire our people to work collaboratively to deliver value, actively contribute to society, and lead the profession by challenging ourselves to do what matters most. Deloitte’s values are what unite us across cultures and geographies, and ultimately help us earn the trust and respect of our people, clients, and society.

 We believe that our differences enable us to #makeanimpactthatmatters.

#ChooseDeloitteif:

  • You want to work with inspiring, enthusiastic, and supportive people with diverse geographical and academic backgrounds and extensive skills
  • You get excitement in handling clients shifting priorities and accomplish tasks in a challenging, fast-paced environment
  •  You like to nurture people and share your knowledge with others

#YourRole:

Your role as a Manager will focus on the management and delivery of client engagements, as well as sales and practice development. In this role, you will develop and coach high performing people and teams, leading, guiding and supporting them to make an impact that matters, and setting the direction to deliver exceptional client service.

During your tenure you will demonstrate and develop your ability to:

  • Build an in-depth knowledge of the client’s business and stay up to date on industry activities, marketplace trends, innovation efforts and leading practices
  • Develop relationships, establish credibility and instil confidence in clients
  • Leverage cross geography insights and practitioners to enhance client service delivery
  • Apply profitability management and sales fundamentals to support projects and pursuits
  • Design holistic and data-driven financial risk management solutions that strengthen client’s financial risk management capabilities, while enhancing shareholder value
  • Maintain professionalism and always strive for high ethical standards
  • Work effectively in diverse teams within an inclusive team culture where people are recognized for their contribution
  • Manage and lead teams, including reviewing work of staff members
  • Develop and mentor more junior members of staff

#WinningRequirements:

Potential candidates should fulfill the following criteria:

  • A minimum of 7-8 years of solid work experience in Audit, Private or Public, Reporting under IFRS
  • Holders of a professional qualification (JES, AMP, SOEL, ACCA, ACA)
  • Strong technical and auditing skills, with exceptional knowledge of IFRS
  • University Degree in: Accounting / Auditing / Finance / Economics / Business Administration and a Postgraduate Qualification in a relevant area. Other academic background with quantitative skills and relevant experience will also be considered as a strong asset
  • Excellent oral and written communication skills in both Greek and English (Proficiency)
  • Ability to work under pressure and maintain a professional demeanor
  • High level of discretion for confidential work and information
  • Strong organizational skills
  • Good interpersonal and supervisory skills and ability to motivate and lead and capacity to work effectively within a team 

#AboutAudit:

Our Audit practice delivers to clients audit assurance and advisory services of the highest quality. We cover a wide range of industries and markets, from financial services in multinational corporations to smaller, owner-managed businesses. As the commercial world grows ever more fiercely regulated, the role of corporate auditor is now spot-lit as never before. Our distinctive audit approach and investment in technology enables our Audit team to deliver seamless global accounting and auditing services. We are forward thinking, risk focused, and insights based.

 

#AboutDeloitte:

Our Services

Deloitte operates in Greece since 1975, as a member of one of the world’s largest professional services networks, Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu. With offices in Athens, Thessaloniki, Heraklion, Patras and Ioannina, Deloitte Greece employs more than 2,900 professionals.

After 50 years of successful and dynamic presence in the Greek market, we bring an unmatched breadth and depth of expertise across audit and assurance, technology & transformation, tax & legal and strategy, risk & transactions advisory services. Operating in a multidisciplinary model enables us to draw from a pool of world-class talent, identifying the ideal skillset for each project, and to collaborate across businesses, to solve the toughest, most challenging issues of our clients. It is with them that we have built a trusted relationship, by delivering innovative solutions and utilizing state-of-the-art tools and technologies across all industries- Consumer Products, Energy Resources & Industrials, Financial Services, Life Sciences & Health Care, Government & Public Services, Technology, Media & Telecommunications.

 

Our Purpose

We are led by a purpose, to make an impact that matters with clients, people and society. This purpose defines who we are and what we stand for. It's not about being the biggest. It’s about being the first choice for the largest and most influential clients, and the first choice for the best talent.

 

Our Values

At Deloitte we foster a collaborative culture where talented individuals can produce their best work. We value innovative thinking, diverse insights and a genuinely distinctive level of customer service through our expertise and professionalism. We value difference, with respect at the heart of our inclusive culture.

 

Our Talent Experience

From day one at our firm, practitioners are part of a community. Our development and career progression framework will help them develop the skills and capabilities to succeed. The wellness of our people and the ability to offer agile working arrangements is at the center of our unique talent experience. We create a workplace that encourages collaboration, creativity, inclusiveness to ensure our staff are supported, encouraged and feel a sense of purpose and meaning in what they do each day.

 

Build your legacy with us. Aim higher: join Deloitte now!


Deloitte is an equal opportunity employer (EOE) and we are committed to providing a working environment that embraces and values diversity and inclusion. Knowing that people work best in different ways, we are happy to discuss alternative arrangements if the working pattern you are looking for is not specifically indicated.


All applications will be considered without distinction, in accordance with our values and in line with our inclusive culture. If you have any support or access requirements, we encourage you to advise us at the time of application to assist you through the recruitment process.

Please, visit our website for more information.

title: Experienced – Agentic GenAI & Hyper-Automation Developer
description_html:
Experienced – Agentic GenAI & Hyper-Automation Developer 

Stiamo cercando una figura consultant/senior consultant da inserire nel team Smart Solutions Lab di Deloitte Business Solution nella sede di Milano/Roma/Bologna, che lavorerà in modalità Hybrid.
Smart Solutions Lab si occupa di supportare i nostri clienti nella individuazione di soluzioni e modelli finalizzati al miglioramento della produttività, efficienza, qualità dei servizi offerti, anche con il supporto delle nuove tecnologie di AI, Robotics Process Automation e Data Visualization. 

Your Role

La risorsa Experienced verrà inserita in un team di lavoro e si occuperà di:

  • Hyper-automation & AI;
  • Implementare soluzioni e applicazioni in ambito AI/GenAI per l’automatizzazione dei processi aziendali. Utilizzare efficientemente le principali tecnologie nell'analisi e progettazione dei processi aziendali end-to-end, dall'identificazione delle inefficienze (utilizzando tecniche quantitative e qualitative), alla progettazione e all'implementazione dei processi aziendali TO-BE;
  • Definire l'avanguardia delle soluzioni aziendali attraverso l'uso innovativo di concetti di intelligenza artificiale, Robotics Process Automation (RPA) e Optical Character Recognition (OCR); oltre all'automazione dei processi, una parte delle attività produttive si concentra sulla creazione di dashboard avanzate in ambito analytics tramite l’utilizzo di strumenti come PowerBI o Qlik Sense;
  • Collaborare efficacemente con colleghi e clienti di diverso background.

Winning Requirements

  • Esperienza di almeno 2 anni su progetti di AI/ML nel ruolo di Data Scientist, nonché conoscenza di tematiche di Deep Learing, NLP e analisi dati non strutturati e dell’architettura di soluzioni di AI/ML;
  • Esperienza di almeno un anno in progetti di sviluppo applicazioni basate su LLM e Agentic AI;
  • Ottima conoscenza di Python e i principali framework moderni di sviluppo soluzioni GenAI, e.g. Langraph, CrewAI, Google ADK, Azure AI Foundry;
  • La conoscenza di linguaggi per lo sviluppo web (HTML5, JSP, HTML, CSS, XML, javascript, jquery, node.js), del tool di RPA UiPathdi e di strumenti di Data Visualization (QlikView, Qlik Sense, PowerBI o Tableau) e servizi cloud su AWS, Azure, ecc. è considerata un plus.


To Make An Impact That Matters

Il network Deloitte, leader nei servizi professionali alle imprese, opera a livello globale in più di 150 Paesi con oltre 460 mila persone.
In Italia, Deloitte è presente in 24 città con circa 13.400 persone che assistono i clienti offrendo servizi di Audit & Assurance, Technology & Transformantion, Strategy, Risk & Transactions Advisory e Tax & Legal.
In qualità di network globale ci impegniamo per affrontare le principali sfide sociali, economiche e ambientali della società di oggi. WorldImpact è il nostro programma globale che riunisce tutte le iniziative attraverso cui vogliamo avere un impatto positivo sulle persone, i clienti, l’ambiente e le comunità in cui operiamo. 
Con Impact for Italy, la declinazione italiana di WorldImpact, Deloitte ha realizzato progetti che - in collaborazione con istituzioni, realtà del terzo settore, università e altri soggetti - hanno lasciato un impatto concreto e una legacy per il futuro su tutto il territorio nazionale.

La ricerca rispetta il d.lgs. 198/2006, il D.lgs. 215/03 e il D.lgs. 216/03 ed è aperta a candidat* di qualsiasi orientamento o espressione di genere, orientamento sessuale, età, etnia e credo religioso. Il presente annuncio è stato ideato nel rispetto della diversity e dell’inclusività.

title: ESG and Assurance Professionals
description_html:
AUDIT & ASSURANCE

ESG and ASSURANCE PROFESSIONAL

Your Story

Can’t wait to make an impact on the world? You’re not alone. Join us in driving progress in the working world and beyond.

Your Journey with Us

We are currently seeking ambitious ESG and Accounting Operations Advisory Professionals with exceptional analytical as well as creative skills to bring a fresh perspective to our dynamic Audit & Assurance Team.

We are looking for professionals at both junior and experienced level. Whether you are a qualified accountant with up to 3 years' experience under your belt, or having just completed your qualification and are looking for your first exciting step in your career, we want to meet with you!

At Deloitte, we recognize there is no one size fits all career path, and global, cross-business mobility and up/re-skilling are all within the range of possibilities to shape a unique and fulfilling career. If you're ready to take your career to the next level in a challenging international environment, focusing on continuous learning and dynamic teamwork, you're ready for Deloitte!

How you will Make an Impact

As an Accounting Operations Advisory Professional with a specialisation in ESG, in the Audit & Assurance Team, you will be responsible for handling the practical application of reporting requirements, with a particular focus on ESG reporting. You will leverage your experience to advise clients on operational matters from a sustainability perspective, support in the implementation of new software applications, and provide guidance on the effectiveness of their operating environment, with a keen eye on ESG implications and overarching strategy.

Your main tasks will include but are not limited to the following:

  • Supporting in the implementation of our clients’ ESG projects and proposal for such projects
  • Conducting technical research in support of ESG projects and proposals
  • Motivates and supports junior staff members to connect to ask technical questions and learn on-the-job and provides technical expertise for junior team members
  • Develops understanding of how the assurance procedures performed relate to the specialist area of involvement
  • Assisting clients with analytics and ways to develop and improve processes within their finance function.
  • Ensure that any professional, technical or client service problems are communicated in a timely fashion to the appropriate individuals
  • Working with other departments (e.g. tax, consulting) to provide coordinated solutions to clients
  • Focus on evolving ESG matters and advice clients with verified ESG information; combine both significant auditing and assurance experience with a deep understanding of such matters and provide technical update training, including board sessions, on climate change risks and other emerging issues.

Let’ s Talk About You

Your Leadership skills:

  • Monitors own results against objectives and seeks feedback to identify ways to enhance quality and personal/team performance. 
  • Supports respect and inclusion by encouraging an open dialogue with colleagues and valuing individual differences and contributions.
  • Builds their own understanding of emerging market trends and new legislation, and educates others accordingly. 
  • Ability to communicate and interact effectively with staff at all organizational levels and ability to work on own initiative or as part of a team with minimal supervision.
  • Projects enthusiasm, optimism and commitment to their work and the teams they are part of.

Your Professional skills:

  • Applies tools and systematic approaches to gather and measure information/data from a variety of sources.
  • Adapts to changing priorities as they arise and seeks guidance from team leaders.
  • Completes all training and other compliance obligations, including professional certifications, if applicable, on a timely basis.
  • Evaluates problem(s) objectively considering facts, relevant professional standards or research, and develops a comprehensive picture of the problem.
  • Strong commitment and proven record of professional and client service excellence.

Your Specialized skills:

  • Candidates must have a sound understanding of the current ESG landscape within the EU include Corporate Social Responsibility Directive (CSRD), Article 8 of EU taxonomy, Sustainable Finance reporting Directive (SFDR) and Greenhouse Gas Emissions (GHGs) estimations.
  • Candidates must be in possession of a finance qualification and looking to study ACCA or a finance degree, if not a Masters level Degree.
  • Practical experience in finance or auditing role will be an asset.
  • Any practical experience in software implementations and use of analytical tools will be considered an asset.
  • Any experience in ESG strategy setting, reporting and/or assurance will be considered an asset.
  • Use of the relevant internal and external knowledge databases and exploitation of the relevant information to benefit clients and the firm.
  • Business acumen and insight to be an effective business advisor to clients.
  • Motivated self-starter with the ambition to continue progressing your career successfully.

Our Story
World-leading professional services firm, we offer value added services in audit & assurance, risk advisory, accounting, tax & legal, consulting and financial advisory. We take great pride in supporting clients with multidisciplinary expertise, industry knowledge, and innovative solutions.

Our Assurance team is a dedicated team of professionals within the audit department with deep financial reporting skills and in-depth industry knowledge. We cover a wide range of industries and markets, from financial services in multinational corporations to smaller, owner-managed businesses. Our distinctive audit approach and investment in technology enables our Audit team to deliver seamless global accounting and auditing services. We are forward thinking, risk focused and insights based.


Why Deloitte?

As a Purpose-led organization, at the heart of everything we do is a set of timeless principles that distinguish the Deloitte culture. We foster diversity and inclusion and encourage you to bring your authentic self to work. Explore, question and collaborate while building a career that inspires and energies you. We tailor a personalized learning experience, offering you the opportunity to grow at your own pace and achieve maximum impact.

Life looks different for each of us, so we created a varied benefits package that you can tap into:

  • Health Insurance cover for yourself and dependents. 
  • Mental health support through sponsored therapy sessions. 
  • Weekly get-togethers 
  • Hybrid working option
  • Digital learning, mentoring and regular performance snapshots. 
  • Renowned training programme with Deloitte University.
  • Ongoing in-house trainings all year round to make sure CPE requirements are met.

Join us to make an impact together! Apply now!

title: Front-End Developer @ Deloitte Digital
description_html:
Front-End Developer @ Deloitte Digital


What Impact will you make?


We are currently looking for enthusiastic Front-End Developers to join our dynamic and highly motivating Deloitte Digital team in Athens. 

Deloitte is the first ranked consulting company delivering business advisory and technology enabled business transformations across the globe. Within Deloitte, our teams focus on delivering trusted high-end technology advisory services.

Should you be an enterprise technologies enthusiast, with a great affinity for the business side of a problem, willing to play an active and hands-on role in supporting our clients in delivering high-end solutions and motivated to take on new challenges across industries, in Greece as well as internationally, this is the opportunity to do so.  

At Deloitte, you will gain exposure to a variety of industries, projects and technologies, helping your career growth and professional development.


#YourRole

Your role as a Front-End Developer in Deloitte Digital will be responsible for building the ‘client-side’ of web and mobile applications. You should be able to translate our customer needs into functional and appealing interactive and user-friendly applications.

We expect you to be a tech-savvy professional, who is curious about new digital technologies and aspires to combine usability with visual design to your projects. 


During your tenure you will demonstrate and develop your ability to:

  • Create user-friendly web and mobile pages
  • Maintain and improve applications
  • Optimize applications for maximum speed
  • Implement mobile-based features
  • Collaborate with back-end developers and web designers to improve usability
  • Get feedback from, and build solutions for, users and customers
  • Write functional requirement documents and guides
  • Create quality mockups and prototypes
  • Help back-end developers with coding and troubleshooting
  • Ensure high quality graphic standards and brand consistency
  • Stay up-to-date on emerging technologies

#WinningRequirements 

To qualify for the role, you must have:

  • University degree in Engineering, Computer Science or technical disciplines
  • Post-graduate degree in relevant fields will be considered an asset
  • At least 2 years of proven experience as a Front-End Developer or similar role
  • Experience with HTML, CSS and responsive design.
  • Extensive Knownledge of Javascript (experience with typescript consider a plus)
  • Hands-on experience in a popular JavaScript libraries/frameworks such as React, React Native, Next.js, Angular.
  • Experience on state management libraries (eg Redux)
  • Familiarity with Git
  • Familiarity with browser and mobile testing and debugging
  • In-depth understanding of the entire web development process (design, development and deployment)
  • Understanding design principals and working with design tools (Figma) and UI/UX teams.
  • Knowledge of SEO principles
  • An ability to perform well in a fast-paced environment
  • Excellent analytical and multitasking skills
  • Organizational skills and attention to detail
  • Self-motivated and willingness to pursue personal development
  • Strong communication and collaboration skills
  • Excellent command in spoken and written English and Greek language

#AboutTechnology & Transformation

Six core competency areas make up our Technology & Transformation service line:

  • Cyber;
  • Engineering, AI & Data;
  • Enterprise Technology & Performance;
  • Finance Transformation;
  • Deloitte Digital;
  • Human Capital.

We exist to solve complex problems

Our consultants are renowned for their straightforward approach to solving some of the world’s largest and most complex business challenges. Each member of our Technology & Transformation team is energized by the challenge a seemingly inscrutable problem presents. Our distinctiveness lies in our refusal to accept a problem at face value - we draw on the depth of our shared insight to ask the right questions, and it’s these questions that uncover answers - answers with impact.


We are committed to collaboration

Our role is to unlock potential for growth and innovation. We believe this requires real collaboration – with our own networks and with our clients. It’s why we commit to truly getting under the skin of our client’s needs, developing a full appreciation for their environment, goals and ambitions. We’re also unafraid to challenge. In so doing, we build long-term and trusted affinities.


We create long-term, sustainable impact

We often work hand-in-hand with our clients to help find the right solution and to help apply that solution. Our aim is to leave behind ambassadors who are equipped to continue the transformation we began. For us, it’s about embedding sustainable change, allowing the impact of our insight to be felt for a long time to come.


WHY DELOITTE

At Deloitte, we create positively differentiated work experiences that enable our people to feel valued and achieve their full potential. We value difference, and embrace people with diverse backgrounds and thinking styles. Knowing that people work best in different ways, we are happy to discuss alternative arrangements if the working pattern you are looking for is not specifically indicated.


ABOUT DELOITTE


Our services

Deloitte offers Global professional services that include Audit, Risk Advisory, Tax, Consulting and Financial Advisory. Our approach combines insight and innovation from multiple disciplines with global business and industry expertise to help our clients excel anywhere in the world.

We deliver outstanding impact on the reputation and success of our clients, in Greece and globally. In pursuing this we contribute to a sustainable and prosperous society, and are firm believers in the positive impact business can and should have on the world it operates within.


Our Purpose

Our purpose, “To make an impact that matters for our clients, our people and society “- defines who we are and what we stand for. This is not about size, it's about being the first choice. The first choice for the largest and most influential clients, and the first choice for the best talent.


Our values

At Deloitte we foster a collaborative culture where talented individuals can produce their best work. We value innovative thinking, diverse insights and a genuinely distinctive level of customer service. We value difference, with respect at the heart of our inclusive culture, and we support agile working arrangements.


Our talent experience

From day one at our firm, practitioners are part of a community. Our development and career progression framework will help them develop the skills and capabilities to succeed. The wellness of our people and the ability to offer agile working arrangements is at the centre of our unique talent experience. We create a workplace that encourages collaboration, creativity, inclusiveness to ensure our staff are supported, encouraged and feel a sense of purpose and meaning in what they do each day.


Sounds like the sort of role for you? Apply now.

Each member of our Technology & Transformation team is energized by the challenge a seemingly inscrutable problem presents. Our distinctiveness lies in our refusal to accept a problem at face value - we draw on the depth of our shared insight to ask the right questions, and it’s these questions that uncover answers - answers with impact.
We are committed to collaboration
Our role is to unlock potential for growth and innovation. We believe this requires real collaboration – with our own networks and with our clients. It’s why we commit to truly getting under the skin of our client’s needs, developing a full appreciation for their environment, goals and ambitions. We’re also unafraid to challenge. In so doing, we build long-term and trusted affinities.
We create long-term, sustainable impact
We often work hand-in-hand with our clients to help find the right solution and to help apply that solution. Our aim is to leave behind ambassadors who are equipped to continue the transformation we began. For us, it’s about embedding sustainable change, allowing the impact of our insight to be felt for a long time to come.
WHY DELOITTE
At Deloitte, we create positively differentiated work experiences that enable our people to feel valued and achieve their full potential. We value difference, and embrace people with diverse backgrounds and thinking styles. Knowing that people work best in different ways, we are happy to discuss alternative arrangements if the working pattern you are looking for is not specifically indicated.
ABOUT DELOITTE
Our services
Deloitte offers Global professional services that include Audit, Risk Advisory, Tax, Consulting and Financial Advisory. Our approach combines insight and innovation from multiple disciplines with global business and industry expertise to help our clients excel anywhere in the world.
We deliver outstanding impact on the reputation and success of our clients, in Greece and globally. In pursuing this we contribute to a sustainable and prosperous society, and are firm believers in the positive impact business can and should have on the world it operates within.
Our Purpose
Our purpose, “To make an impact that matters for our clients, our people and society “- defines who we are and what we stand for. This is not about size, it's about being the first choice. The first choice for the largest and most influential clients, and the first choice for the best talent.
Our values
At Deloitte we foster a collaborative culture where talented individuals can produce their best work. We value innovative thinking, diverse insights and a genuinely distinctive level of customer service. We value difference, with respect at the heart of our inclusive culture, and we support agile working arrangements.
Our talent experience
From day one at our firm, practitioners are part of a community. Our development and career progression framework will help them develop the skills and capabilities to succeed. The wellness of our people and the ability to offer agile working arrangements is at the centre of our unique talent experience. We create a workplace that encourages collaboration, creativity, inclusiveness to ensure our staff are supported, encouraged and feel a sense of purpose and meaning in what they do each day.

title: Junior - Accounting & Bookkeeping
description_html:
Junior – Accounting & Bookkeeping


Stiamo cercando una figura junior da inserire nel team Accounting & Bookkeeping di Deloitte Business Solution nella sede di Bari, che lavorerà in modalità Hybrid.
Accounting & Bookkeeping è specializzata nel fornire servizi di full outsourcing ai propri clienti, con l’obiettivo di rispondere in maniera concreta alla richiesta del mercato di un servizio integrato, che copra tutti gli aspetti di compliance nel rispetto della normativa civilistica e fiscale. Attraverso soluzioni tecnologiche avanzate e “plug&play”, l’offering copre l’intera gestione dei processi relativi al ciclo attivo e passivo, di contabilità generale, di closing, di reporting e di consolidamento, il tutto integrato con servizi di compliance in materia fiscale, societaria e relativi all’area payroll
 
Your Role

La risorsa Junior sarà inserita in un team di lavoro, affiancando colleghi senior e occupandosi di:
  • gestione delle attività ordinarie di accounting e contabilizzazione (registrazione prima nota, fatture, incassi, pagamenti ) utilizzando i principali ERP ‘s a disposizione del mercato
  • verifica e calcolo degli stanziamenti mensili e supporto alle attività di chiusura periodica
  • predisposizione delle scritture di assestamento e di accertamento
  • preparazione del reporting mensile o trimestrale secondo diversi criteri contabili (IFRS o US GAAP)
  • supporto alla redazione del bilancio di esercizio e del bilancio consolidato e delle attività di conversione connesse

Winning Requirements
  • Laurea in materie economiche o affini
  • Conoscenza dei principi contabili nazionali ed internazionali (IFRS), della normativa fiscale in materia di imposte dirette ed indiretta
  • Capacità di analisi dei processi aziendali, in particolare quelli relativi all’area AFC, per identificarne aree di miglioramento
  • Ottima conoscenza della lingua inglese - sarà considerato un plus la conoscenza della lingua cinese
  • Conoscenza autonoma dei principali pacchetti applicativi Microsoft (Office)

To Make an Impact that Matters

Il network Deloitte, leader nei servizi professionali alle imprese, opera a livello globale in più di 150 Paesi con oltre 460 mila persone.

In Italia, Deloitte è presente in 24 città con circa 13.400 persone che assistono i clienti offrendo servizi di Audit & Assurance, Technology & Transformantion, Strategy, Risk & Transactions Advisory e Tax & Legal.


In qualità di network globale ci impegniamo per affrontare le principali sfide sociali, economiche e ambientali della società di oggi. WorldImpact è il nostro programma globale che riunisce tutte le iniziative attraverso cui vogliamo avere un impatto positivo sulle persone, i clienti, l’ambiente e le comunità in cui operiamo.

Con Impact for Italy, la declinazione italiana di WorldImpact, Deloitte ha realizzato progetti che – in collaborazione con istituzioni, realtà del terzo settore, università e altri soggetti – hanno lasciato un impatto concreto e una legacy per il futuro su tutto il territorio nazionale.


Sei pront* a #MakeAnImpactThatMatter insieme? Candidati ora!

La ricerca rispetta il d.lgs. 198/2006, il D.lgs. 215/03 e il D.lgs. 216/03 ed è aperta a candidat* di qualsiasi orientamento o espressione di genere, orientamento sessuale, età, etnia e credo religioso. Il presente annuncio è stato ideato nel rispetto della diversity e dell’inclusività.

title: Experienced - Customer Experience
description_html:
Experienced - Customer Experience 



Stiamo cercando una figura Consultant da inserire nel team Customer & Commercial Strategy nella sede di Milano, che lavorerà in modalità Hybrid. 

Il business Customer & Commercial Strategy si impegna nel definire la strategia ed il percorso di trasformazione digitale per i nostri Clienti operanti nel settore FSI e Corporate abilitando nuovi modelli operativi sempre più incentrati sulla valorizzazione di un’Experience distintiva per la customer base. 
Supportiamo i nostri Clienti nel disegnare e potenziare la Customer Experience dei clienti finali, trasformando i dati e l’ascolto del cliente in insight di valore. 


Your Role

La risorsa Experienced verrà inserita in un team di lavoro e si occuperà di:

  • Digital Strategy Definition, Roadmapping & Cost case e nell’identificazione della lista di interventi, con previsione delle rispettive priorità e dell’impatto economico, da mettere a terra per la realizzazione della trasformazione digitale in risposta ai need identificati
  • Competenze di Diagnostic, Analisi e Reingegnerizzazione dei processi mediante l’assessment dell’attuale stato di digitalizzazione dei clienti e la definizione del modello to-be con la raccolta dei requisiti di business e tecnologici necessari all’implementazione dei nuovi processi target alla base della trasformazione
  • Program & Project Management di iniziative complesse di Digital Transformation finalizzati alla governance end-to-end del percorso di trasformazione, gestendo la relazione con il cliente, coordinando tutti i tavoli di lavoro e i vari stakeholder coinvolti nell’iniziativa - interni ad esterni a Deloitte
  • Design, Build & Deploy di strategie e soluzioni digitali al servizio della Customer Experience a 360°


Winning Requirements

  • Esperienza di 3/4 anni con ruolo di Solution Expert / Solution Architect / Tech Specialist, esperienza in progetti volti all’implementazione di piattaforme Voice of Customer
  • Conoscenza diretta delle piattaforme VOC (es. Qualtrics, Medallia,), con particolare riferimento ad attività di progettazione e configurazione di modelli di rilevazione complessi, processi automatici di gestione del dato raccolto, dashboarding avanzato, interpretazione e produzione insight (data analytics, AI) e rappresentazione del feedback, integrazione con altri sistemi della mappa applicativa
  • Conoscenza dei processi canonici che compongono il framework di rilevazione dell'esperienza cliente (dalla definizione del customer lifecycle, passando per i customer journey, touchpoint, momenti rilevanti, strategia sui canali, frequenza di rilevazione, ...)
Nice to have 
  • Acumen analitico nell’interpretazione dei risultati raccolti, volta all'individuazione di insight di valore e azioni concrete finalizzate alla risoluzione strutturale delle cause di malcontento ed al miglioramento della Customer Experience / Customer satisfaction

title: Experienced - Healthcare - MI/TO/TV/RM/PA
description_html:
Experienced – Healthcare - MI/TO/TV/RM/PA


Stiamo cercando una figura consultant/senior consultant da inserire nel team Digital Care di Deloitte Consulting nella sede di MI/TO/TV/RM/PA, che lavorerà in modalità Hybrid.

Il business Digital Care si occupa di supportare i nostri clienti nella individuazione di soluzioni e modelli finalizzati al miglioramento della produttività, efficienza, qualità dei servizi offerti, anche con il supporto delle nuove tecnologie.


 Sarai coinvolto nel supporto delle attività di assistenza al CEO e il Top Management dell’azienda nel migliorare la profittabilità e raggiungere l’eccellenza operativa del business model.


 Your Role


 La risorsa Experienced verrà inserita in un team di lavoro e si occuperà di:


  • Partecipare alle attività progettuali e produzione dei deliverable, gestendo il coordinamento del team di progetto e essendo a supporto al Manager nella gestione del cliente
  • attività di pianificazione e gestione di progetti (PMO) e redazione della documentazione a supporto e conduzione di ricerche utilizzando fonti e risorse interne ed esterne
  • analisi e ridefinizione delle strutture organizzative dei clienti e change management e mappatura e ridisegno dei processi sanitari delle aziende pubbliche/private sanitarie per la digitalizzazione dei servizi
  • analisi e proposizione degli standard tecnici propri del settore Healthcare necessari a supportare al meglio i provider IT coinvolti nella realizzazione delle soluzioni richieste
  • supporto all’introduzione di soluzioni IT in enti sanitari, quali sistemi di cartella clinica, telemedicina e governo dei processi di assistenza territoriale

Winning Requirements

  • Laurea triennale/magistrale in Ingegneria Biomedica, Clinica, Informatica, Gestionale (con particolare riferimento a percorsi e specializzazioni con focus in ambito sanitario) o in materie STEM e Business
  •  Esperienza di almeno 2 - 5 anni in Società di consulenza e/o di System Integration, con focus sul settore Healthcare oppure in Aziende Sanitarie pubbliche e Gruppi Sanitari privati di rilevanza nazionale in ambito Direzione o Sistemi Informativi
  •  Esperienza in progetti di digital transformation in ambito sanitario, quali ad esempio analisi/implementazione/configurazione di Cartelle Cliniche Elettroniche, sistemi di prenotazione, di ammissione/trasferimento, di pronto soccorso ma anche nella realizzazione di applicazioni a supporto dell'interazione medico - paziente quali ad esempio soluzioni di telemedicina
  • Conoscenza del contesto e delle logiche organizzative del Sistema Sanitario Nazionale/Regionale, delle Aziende Sanitarie Pubbliche e/o dei Grandi gruppi ospedalieri privati e dei principali standard tecnici di integrazione e di interoperabilità propri degli applicativi operanti nel settore Healthcare
  • Disponibilità a trasferte nazionali e internazionali
  • Ottima conoscenza della lingua inglese

Your role

Siamo alla ricerca di una persona appassionata di innovazione digitale nell’ambito della compliance, che abbia voglia di contribuire al successo dei nostri Clienti supportandoli nella valutazione dei rischi correlati all’uso dei dati e delle nuove tecnologie, nonché nell’individuazione dei requisiti di trust e sicurezza all’interno degli ambienti digitali, dei loro processi organizzativi e dei loro modelli di governance.

title: Junior - Cloud and AI Security - NextHub Bari
description_html:
Junior – Cloud and AI Security - NextHub Bari

We are looking for a junior to join the Cloud & AI Security team, based in Bari, with a hybrid working model.

Our team supports clients in both strategic and operational activities, including: 

  • definition of strategies and business processes; 
  • analysis, design, and development of security architectures; 
  • research, development, and implementation of consolidated and emerging security solutions; 
  • operational management of implemented solutions.

Activities are carried out on Cloud Security architectures and solutions, as well as on applications, infrastructures, and AI-based models. The team is composed of both functional (consulting) and technical professionals, offering the opportunity to gain experience in both areas and build a well-rounded career path.

Your role


The Junior resource will be integrated into a work team, working alongside senior colleagues and responsible for:

  • contributing to cross-industry projects in Cloud Security and AI Security, such as:

    • Cloud Security Assessment, Design and Implementation;
    • Cloud DevSecOps and Platform Management;
    • GenAI Security & GenAI Defence Support;

  • supporting the development of a technology observatory, interacting with international vendors, investment funds, and other market players, to identify innovative and emerging solutions in the Cyber landscape.



Winning requirements

  • Bachelor’s and/or Master’s degree in technical or scientific disciplines;
  • familiarity with basic concepts of IT and Networking;
  • curiosity and passion for cybersecurity and digital technologies;
  • excellent communication skills in Italian and English;
  • willingness to travel in Italy and abroad.

Make An Impact That Matters

Deloitte is a leading global network of professional services firms with over 457,000 people in over 150 countries. We offer innovative and sustainable solutions in Audit & Assurance, Consulting, Financial Advisory, Risk Advisory, Tax, and Legal. Our goal is to support companies in developing and implementing strategies that are in line with the market. 

Sustainability is a key theme at Deloitte. Through our strategies and projects related to Environmental, Social and Governance (ESG) issues, we are committed to promoting responsible, sustainable and inclusive growth for the Planet, our people and society. 

Learn more about our Corporate Sustainability strategies, including Well-being, our strategy to improve the physical, mental and social well-being of our people, so that they are happy and full of energy in all areas of their lives, and WorldClimate, Deloitte's global strategy to become a Net Zero organization and to guide responsible choices inside and outside the organization.

Interested candidates can submit their application with authorization under Legislative Decree 196/2003. The search complies with Legislative Decree 198/2006, Legislative Decree 215/03 and Legislative Decree 216/03 and is open to candidates of any sexual orientation or expression, sexual orientation, age, ethnicity and religious belief. This announcement has been designed in respect of diversity and inclusion.

title: Management Assistant @ Thessaloniki
description_html:
Are you looking for an opportunity in Thessaloniki that offers you a hybrid working model?


Are you ready to work on large scale projects for industry-leading clients around the world and elevate your career to an international level?


If so, check below for more info about this career opportunity!


You bring passion, we bring opportunities!


#YourOpportunity

Deloitte is a worldwide leader in Professional Services with a presence in more than 150 countries and territories. Since 2018, Deloitte has been operating its Competence Center in Thessaloniki with satellites in the cities of Patras, Heraklion, and Ioannina - which are model hubs of expertise, training, and innovation, specializing in cutting-edge exponential technologies, in which graduates and young professionals undergo immersive experiences, continuous learning, gaining practical insights and hands-on training that empower them to navigate the complexities of the digital landscape.


Deloitte is an ideal working environment for both young and senior professionals who want to take the next step in their careers, offering them a supportive and international working environment that leverages their expertise and potential. Its corporate culture is based on trust and collaboration and ensures diversity and inclusion so that everyone feels part of a great team.


#AboutYourRole

As a Management Assistant you will play a key role in the daily organization and business support to your dedicated Partners/Senior Directors. As an Assistant you are the first point of contact for our clients, our colleagues and our suppliers. It is therefore key that you like to communicate in different languages in an efficient and respectful manner and that you know to prioritize the following tasks:

  • Calendar / Agenda management for your dedicated Partners/Senior Directors: scheduling calls and meetings, booking meeting rooms and restaurants, solving agenda conflicts, etc.
  • Layout and quality check of documents (presentations, proposals, letters, etc.)
  • Being the go-to person for your team: you know Deloitte and your team’s clients, you know where you can obtain certain information, which actions should be taken in which situations, … You are seen as their lifesaver and make their work life easier!

Besides the above-mentioned tasks, an impeccable administrative follow-up is necessary:
  • Administration support: handling incoming and outgoing e-mails and correspondence, filing/archiving and scanning documents
  • Call management: handling incoming internal and external calls, taking messages and filtering calls
  • Proposal management: layout and quality checks, preparing the admin part (legal certificates, etc.) and making sure the proposal is submitted before the deadline


Ad hoc tasks:

  • Organizing client and internal team events: all practical arrangements such as meeting location/rooms, catering, parking, badges, welcoming the participants, etc.
  • Translation & review of documents
  • Travel arrangements: booking flights, trains, hotels and cars.


Depending on your own interests, the role of your Partners/Senior Directors and the needs of your Partners/Senior Directors/clients, you will be able to take up additional tasks such as project administration and follow-up, onboarding support, attending meetings during which you take minutes and closely follow up the action points discussed, HR tasks such as a buddy role for new Management Assistants or acting as a mentor for Management Assistant interns, etc. in short, a great opportunity to shape your career.


#OurRequirements

Our ideal candidates are bright and ambitious professionals that focus on delivering work of high quality, commit to high levels of service and have the ability to build strong relationships. We expect that you also have strong presentation, interpersonal and organizational skills and the ability to work effectively within a team.

The ideal candidate should have the following requirements:

  • You have a bachelor’s degree in business administration or a related field
  • 1-3 years of experience in administrative roles
  • A good knowledge of English is a necessity, both written and spoken
  • French or Dutch isn’t mandatory, but nice to have
  • You have a good command of MS Office applications (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, etc.)
  • You are very accurate, proactive, communicative and polite
  • You have excellent organizational skills and a strong sense of responsibility
  • You are a real team player
  • You are capable of handling all contacts and information with the required diplomacy and discretion
  • You are flexible in changing circumstances, and you are resistant to stress


If you're ready to take your career to the next level in a challenging international environment, focusing on continuous learning and dynamic teamwork, both in Greece and abroad, you're ready for Deloitte!


#WhatWeOffer

At Deloitte, we know that great people make a great organization. We value our people and offer employees a broad range of benefits:

🏠 Modern hybrid workplace, characterized by flexibility and Smart Working

⚖ Empowered well-being: We provide multiple program offerings to support your well-being needs (flexible working arrangements, extra days of leave, parental allowances)

🌍 Engagement within international large-scale teams and projects, with opportunities to travel for training or client purposes.

📚 Constant opportunities for learning with unlimited access to internal and external learning platforms and sponsored certificates aligned with business needs and technology trends

🚀 Challenging and innovating environment where personal development and growth are encouraged, always with transparency and trust

? Diverse culture and active communities that enable you to bring yourself to work

🎉 Team Building and Corporate Social Responsibility Activities

🏃 A buddy to support you with your onboarding

🌴 Extra days of annual leave

⚕ Private medical health insurance plan

💳 Ticket restaurant card

? Exclusive Discounts to several retail providers, restaurants and others

📱 Mobile phone

🍏 Fresh fruits and unlimited coffee everyday at our offices


Please note that all well-being benefits mentioned above are subject to annual review.


About Deloitte

#OurServices

Deloitte offers integrated services that include Audit & Assurance, Technology & Transformation, Strategy Risk & Transactions Advisory, Tax and Legal. Our approach combines insight and innovation from multiple disciplines with global business and industry expertise to help our clients excel anywhere in the world. We deliver outstanding impact on the reputation and success of our clients, in Italy and globally. In pursuing this we contribute to a sustainable and prosperous society, and are firm believers in the positive impact business can and should have on the world it operates within.

#OurPurpose

We are led by a purpose, to make an impact that matters with clients, people and society. This purpose defines who we are and what we stand for. It's not about being the biggest. It’s about being the first choice for the largest and most influential clients, and the first choice for the best talent.

#OurValues

At Deloitte we foster a collaborative culture where talented individuals can produce their best work. We value innovative thinking, diverse insights and a genuinely distinctive level of customer service through our expertise and professionalism. We value difference, with respect at the heart of our inclusive culture.

#OurTalentExperience

From day one at our firm, practitioners are part of a community. Our development and career progression framework will help them develop the skills and capabilities to succeed. The wellness of our people and the ability to offer agile working arrangements is at the center of our unique talent experience. We create a workplace that encourages collaboration, creativity, inclusiveness to ensure our staff are supported, encouraged and feel a sense of purpose and meaning in what they do each day.


Sounds like the sort of role for you? Apply now.


Location: Thessaloniki

title: Experienced - Esperto in Materia di Pensioni
description_html:
Experienced - Esperto in Materia di Pensioni 

Stiamo cercando una figura consultant/senior consultant da inserire nel team Payroll di DBS di Deloitte Business Solution.
Deloitte Business Solution collabora con i propri clienti/partner nella conduzione, gestione e riorganizzazione dei processi aziendali relativi alle Funzioni Accounting, Finance & Controlling; individua e valuta i cambiamenti necessari, assistendo nell’implementazione di percorsi strutturati di sviluppo, alla ricerca della migliore performance in termini di efficienza, efficacia e controllo.

Your Role

La risorsa Experienced verrà inserita in un team di lavoro e si occuperà di:

  • Consulenza completa in materia di Lavoro e Amministrazione del Personale, tra cui: inquadramento contrattuale, retributivo e normativo dei rapporti di lavoro Dipendenti e dei Contratti atipici, trattamento Fiscale e Previdenziale delle somme e dei valori corrisposti al personale, applicazione degli esoneri e degli incentivi, inquadramento assicurativo INAIL e voci di rischio, gestione del rapporto con gli Istituti Previdenziali e Assistenziali, con i Fondi e le Casse Assistenziali, supporto alla compilazione della modulistica relativa a pratiche INPS, INAIL, Centro dell’Impiego, pari opportunità, collocamento obbligatorio, Ministero del Lavoro, ammortizzatori sociali ordinari e straordinari.
  • Gestione contenzioso e visite ispettive
  • Aggiornamento normativo: stesura di newsletter e circolari informative sulle novità in materia di lavoro e amministrazione del personale. 
  • Due Diligence e payroll assessment: verifica degli elementi retributivi e voci paga rispetto alle disposizioni di legge e alla contrattazione collettivi, check-up INAIL inerente alla verifica del corretto abbinamento delle voci di rischio alla mansione svolta, quadratura dei dati di ritenute e versamenti, compliance alle disposizioni in materia di collocamento mirato disabili, calcolo del cuneo fiscale.

Winning Requirements

  • Esperienza minima di 3 anni in progetti di due diligence payroll e labour e di consulenza su tematiche labour.
  • Disponibilità ad occasionali trasferte sul territorio nazionale.
  • Buona conoscenza della lingua inglese
  • Buona conoscenza della Suite Office, con particolare focus su Microsoft Excel e power point.

To Make An Impact That Matters

Il network Deloitte, leader nei servizi professionali alle imprese, opera a livello globale in più di 150 Paesi con oltre 460 mila persone.
In Italia, Deloitte è presente in 24 città con circa 13.400 persone che assistono i clienti offrendo servizi di Audit & Assurance, Technology & Transformantion, Strategy, Risk & Transactions Advisory e Tax & Legal.
In qualità di network globale ci impegniamo per affrontare le principali sfide sociali, economiche e ambientali della società di oggi. WorldImpact è il nostro programma globale che riunisce tutte le iniziative attraverso cui vogliamo avere un impatto positivo sulle persone, i clienti, l’ambiente e le comunità in cui operiamo. 
Con Impact for Italy, la declinazione italiana di WorldImpact, Deloitte ha realizzato progetti che – in collaborazione con istituzioni, realtà del terzo settore, università e altri soggetti – hanno lasciato un impatto concreto e una legacy per il futuro su tutto il territorio nazionale.

La ricerca rispetta il d.lgs. 198/2006, il D.lgs. 215/03 e il D.lgs. 216/03 ed è aperta a candidat* di qualsiasi orientamento o espressione di genere, orientamento sessuale, età, etnia e credo religioso. Il presente annuncio è stato ideato nel rispetto della diversity e dell’inclusività.
