title: Experienced - Cyber Governance & Compliance
description_html:
Experienced - Cyber Governance & Compliance


We are seeking a consultant/senior consultant to join the Cyber Governance & Compliance team at Deloitte in Milan and Rome, working in a Hybrid mode.

The business supports our clients in identifying solutions and models aimed at improving productivity, efficiency, and the quality of services offered, including with the support of new technologies.
We help our clients optimizing their cybersecurity strategies, design cutting-edge solutions and govern enterprise security programs that increase resilience and better manage cyber risks and, we are actively involved in shaping the regulation of countries, defining national strategies, and driving the direction of policy making.



Your Role


The Experienced resource will be integrated into a work team and responsible for:

  • Manage cybersecurity activities within wider projects, identifying, evaluating, and designing best in class cybersecurity solutions, demonstrating operational excellence, vision and strategic thinking
  • Execute complex project activities, coordinate part of the team while supporting your more senior colleagues in managing client relations and expectations
  • Face and solve customer challenges in innovative and effective way
  • Leverage on technology to provide innovation, operational excellence and new business models to customers
  • Engage with internal and external stakeholders to strengthen business relations and create business opportunities



Winning Requirements


  • 2-5 years of experience, preferably in a Strategic Consulting company
  • Solid expertise in Cyber Security Strategies, Cyber Security Assessment and Benchmarks
  • Fluent knowledge of English language
  • Passion and curiosity for the cybersecurity industry and technology trends, innovations and frameworks, as well as current IT security technologies



Make an Impact that Matters


Deloitte is a global leader in professional services, operating in over 150 countries with a network of more than 460,000 professionals.
In Italy, Deloitte is located in 24 cities with approximately 13,400 professionals supporting clients through services in Audit & Assurance, Technology & Transformation, Strategy, Risk & Transactions Advisory, and Tax & Legal.

As a global network, we are committed to addressing key social, economic, and environmental challenges. WorldImpact is our global program that brings together initiatives designed to create a positive impact on people, clients, the environment, and communities.
Through Impact for Italy, the Italian branch of WorldImpact, Deloitte has launched projects in collaboration with institutions, non-profit organizations, universities, and other stakeholders—leaving a lasting legacy across the country.


The search complies with Legislative Decree 198/2006, Legislative Decree 215/03 and Legislative Decree 216/03 and is open to candidates of any sexual orientation or expression, sexual orientation, age, ethnicity and religious belief. This announcement has been designed in respect of diversity and inclusion.

title: Junior - Categorie Protette - Accounting& Reporting – BANKING & INSURANCE - Assurance
description_html:
Junior - ACCOUNTING & REPORTING– BANKING & INSURANCE - Assurance

Sei pronto a crescere insieme al team Assurance?

Entrando nel Team di Deloitte Assurance Advisory avrai l’occasione di crescere e sviluppare forti competenze trasversali, lavorando su progetti sfidanti e collaborando con moltissimi clienti.

Collaborerai con il team a cui sarai assegnato, occupandoti di attività finalizzate a supportare il cliente in una vasta gamma di servizi, principalmente relativi all’area del Chief Financial Officer (CFO).

In particolare, verrai coinvolto in:  

Attività volte a supportare l’ottimizzazione dei processi di Accounting & Reporting delle società tramite l’inserimento in team integrati:

  • supporterai i clienti con interventi volti a migliorare i processi finanziari, riducendo le tempistiche operative, migliorando l’efficienza delle chiusure contabili, semplificando e riorganizzando le attività di processo per rendere più agile il lavoro e potenziando la struttura operativa. Inoltre, contribuirai ad adeguare i processi dell’area finance post operazioni straordinarie;
  • supporterai i clienti per realizzare interventi mirati a migliorare il reporting contabile, manageriale e regolamentare facilitando l’adozione di nuovi applicativi tecnologici;

 

Attività volte a supportare cambiamenti metodologici e di processo richiesti da nuove normative in vigore (come l’introduzione di nuovi principi contabili o l’adozione di normative che comportano impatti sui processi finanziari delle società).

Grazie a questa esperienza, potrai acquisire un bagaglio culturale utile e ampio in questo ambito operando in una realtà leader nel settore.

#YourRole

I candidati e le candidate parteciperanno ad un percorso di selezione nel quale avranno la possibilità di mettersi alla prova attraverso giornate di assessment, con l’obiettivo di valorizzare competenze e potenzialità personali.

Saranno prese in considerazione tutte le candidature indistintamente, nel rispetto dei nostri valori ed in linea con la nostra cultura inclusiva.

In quanto Analyst avrai la possibilità di imparare dai colleghi più Senior (attraverso il learning on the job) e sviluppare competenze tecniche e relazionali.

Conoscerti ci permetterà di aiutarti a trovare la strada giusta per la tua carriera scegliendo percorsi di formazione e crescita professionale: con la supervisione dei colleghi e colleghe più esperte, sarai responsabile delle attività progettuali nelle quali sarai coinvolto, e della qualità del tuo lavoro e del tuo allineamento alle priorità, agli obiettivi e alle esigenze dei clienti.

Grazie all’ufficio Learning avrai modo di seguire corsi e attività di formazione che ti permetteranno di ampliare e approfondire le tue conoscenze.

I colleghi del Talent invece, si occuperanno in maniera strutturata del tuo avanzamento di carriera con KPI e obiettivi definiti, che se raggiunti, ti garantiranno la revisione del grade e degli economics. 

Si offre inserimento in stage di 6 mesi caratterizzato da un percorso di training ad alto valore formativo.

Sedi di lavoro: Milano, Roma, Bologna, Torino, Verona.

#WinningRequirements

·       Laurea o Master in Economia e Ingegneria Gestionale (costituirà titolo preferenziale un corso di laurea ad indirizzo finanziario/assicurativo)

·       Competenze tecniche in ambito di Financial reporting di società finanziarie (Banche/Intermediari finanziari/ compagnie di assicurazioni) come ad esempio: principi contabili internazionali IAS/IFRS e principali differenze con i corrispettivi principi contabili italiani OIC, regolamenti principali IVASS/Banca d’Italia che disciplinano la redazione del bilancio

·       Buona conoscenza della lingua Inglese (nello scritto ma soprattutto nel’orale)

·       Ottime competenze informatiche (soprattutto Power Point ed Excel)

·       Ottime capacità organizzative e gestionali maturate anche in precedenti percorsi in project managment (sempre ad indirizzo finanziario)

·       Ottime capacità relazionali e comunicative

·       Attitudine al lavoro di gruppo

·       Disponibilità a viaggiare in Italia ed all'estero 

Make An Impact That Matters

Deloitte è un network leader nei servizi professionali alle imprese, presente in oltre 150 Paesi con 457 mila professionisti. Offriamo soluzioni innovative e sostenibili in Audit & Assurance, Strategy, Risk & Transaction Advisory, Tax & Legal e Technology & Transformation. Il nostro obiettivo è supportare le aziende nello sviluppo e nell'implementazione di strategie al passo con il mercato.

In Deloitte la sostenibilità è un tema centrale. Per questo, attraverso le strategie e le progettualità legate alle tematiche Environmental, Social e Governance (ESG), ci impegniamo a promuovere una crescita responsabile, sostenibile e inclusiva per il Pianeta, le nostre persone e la società. Scopri di più sulle nostre strategie di Corporate Sustainability, tra cui Well-being, la strategia volta a migliorare il benessere fisico, mentale e sociale delle nostre persone, affinché siano felici e piene di energia in tutti gli ambiti della loro vita e WorldClimate, la strategia globale di Deloitte per diventare un’organizzazione Net Zero e per guidare scelte responsabili all’interno e all’esterno dell’organizzazione.

Sei pront* a #MakeAnImpactThatMatter insieme? Candidati ora!

La ricerca rispetta il d.lgs. 198/2006, il D.lgs. 215/03 e il D.lgs. 216/03 ed è aperta a candidat* di qualsiasi orientamento o espressione di genere, orientamento sessuale, età, etnia e credo religioso. Il presente annuncio è stato ideato nel rispetto della diversity e dell’inclusività.

title: Junior Tax Consultant - Transfer Pricing - ROMA
description_html:
YOUR ROLE

 Desideri dedicarti alla consulenza fiscale connessa ai prezzi di trasferimento infragruppo?

 Lo Studio Tributario e Societario Deloitte, Società tra Professionisti dedicata alla consulenza ed assistenza fiscale ad imprese e gruppi italiani ed internazionali, per la sede di Roma sta ricercando laureandi o neolaureati, con un percorso di studi in ambito economico / tributario, da inserire nella Service Line Transfer Pricing.

  All’interno della Service Line Transfer Pricing sarai coinvolto/a in un percorso di crescita professionale focalizzato sulla consulenza fiscale per società multinazionali e grandi gruppi societari in materia di Transfer Pricing, dedicandoti all’attività di analisi di mercato e studi di comparabilità, di predisposizione della documentazione delle transazioni in ottemperanza alle normative vigenti nelle diverse giurisdizioni, a progetti di business restructuring, progetti per lo sviluppo di modelli di servizi centralizzati, ecc.

  Grazie all’attività consulenziale e alla formazione continua interna allo Studio (Master di Diritto Tributario, meeting di aggiornamento periodici, possibilità di collaborare ad attività pubblicistiche, corsi di inglese) avrai modo di sviluppare ottime competenze pratiche e teoriche, il tutto all’interno di una primaria realtà riconosciuta a livello Globale come sinonimo di eccezionale qualità.

 WINNING REQUIREMENTS

  Ti sarà affidato un ruolo proattivo e di crescente responsabilità negli incarichi e progetti in cui sarai coinvolto/a. Sei il talento che cerchiamo se hai le seguenti caratteristiche:

 * Laurea specialistica in Economia (LM 77 - LM56);

 * Forte propensione a conseguire l’abilitazione alla Professione di Dottore Commercialista;

 * Conoscenza del pacchetto Microsoft Office;

 * Buona conoscenza della lingua inglese;

 * Motivazione, determinazione e propensione al team working.

  Completano il profilo ottime capacità comunicative e relazionali, autonomia organizzativa, intraprendenza, flessibilità e dinamicità, attitudine e forte motivazione verso il settore della consulenza. 

  Quello che troverai all’interno del Team è:

 * Ambiente giovane e dinamico;

 * Retribuzione competitiva;

 * Opportunità di training on the job;

 * Concrete possibilità di crescita e responsabilizzazione;

 * Contesto internazionale: relazione continua con le sedi estere del Network Deloitte e possibilità di svolgere esperienze lavorative e di formazione all’estero.

  ABOUT STUDIO TRIBUTARIO E SOCIETARIO

description_html:
What Impact will you make? 

Are you looking for an opportunity in Thessaloniki that offers you a hybrid working model?  

Are you ready to work on large scale projects for industry-leading clients around the world and elevate your career to an international level? 

If so, check below for more info about this career opportunity! 

You bring passion, we bring opportunities! 
 

#YourOpportunity 

Deloitte is a worldwide leader in Professional Services with a presence in more than 150 countries and territories. Since 2018, Deloitte has been operating its Competence Center in Thessaloniki with satellites in the cities of Patras, Heraklion, and Ioannina - which are model hubs of expertise, training, and innovation, specializing in cutting-edge exponential technologies, in which graduates and young professionals undergo immersive experiences, continuous learning, gaining practical insights and hands-on training that empower them to navigate the complexities of the digital landscape. 

Deloitte is an ideal working environment for both young and senior professionals who want to take the next step in their careers, offering them a supportive and international working environment that leverages their expertise and potential. Its corporate culture is based on trust and collaboration and ensures diversity and inclusion so that everyone feels part of a great team. 

We are currently seeking for ambitious team players to become part of our Data Analytics & AI team within our Strategy Risk & Transactions Advisory department in Thessaloniki.


#AboutYourTeam 
Data Analytics & AI team is a key department within Strategy Risk & Transactions Advisory with an ambitious plan in terms of growth, innovation, talent management and market recognition. We help clients take advantage of the benefits of innovative new digital technology, support their digital transformation, regulatory compliance and control assurance, provide improved data driven leadership insights, and thus support growth and innovation. Our 200+ talented professionals are unified by a collaborative culture that fosters integrity, outstanding value to markets and clients, commitment to each other, and strength from cultural diversity.


#AboutYourRole
As a GenAI Developer in our Strategy Risk & Transactions Advisory department, you will play a key role in helping clients identify, assess, and manage risks that impact their strategic objectives, while leveraging cutting-edge Generative AI technologies to drive innovation and efficiency. You will design, train, and integrate GenAI models into a transformative suite of AI-powered tools that automate and optimize core business processes. Your work will include developing Agentic AI capabilities that enable autonomous, intelligent decision-making within these applications. You will build end-to-end AI components using prompt engineering and Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG), collaborating closely with cross-functional teams to deliver scalable, intelligent, and context-aware solutions. This role offers a unique opportunity to work on diverse projects, apply your consulting expertise alongside technical proficiency in AI, and contribute to innovative solutions that enhance business performance.

#OurRequirements


Key Qualifications 

  • Bachelor’s and/or Master’s degree in Data Science, Computer Engineering, or a related field.
  • 1-2 years of professional experience in Generative AI and backend development, with hands-on work involving LLMs.
  • Strong proficiency in Python and GenAI related frameworks (e.g., Hugging Face, LangChain).
  • Solid knowledge of ETL pipelines, SQL and NoSQL databases.
  • Solid knowledge of prompt-engineering and RAG.
  • Working experience in cloud platforms (Azure/AWS/GCP) and cloud storage.
  • Strong attention to detail, analytical mindset, and problem-solving skills.
  • Good communication and teamwork abilities, with the capacity to explain data insights clearly.
  • Strong command of the English language (written and verbal).
Preferred Qualifications 

  • Familiarity with CI/CD practices, asynchronous programming and DevOps.
  • Familiarity with LLM Gateway, Guardrails and overall security.
  • Working experience in version control tools such as Git.
If you're ready to take your career to the next level in a challenging international environment, focusing on continuous learning and dynamic teamwork, both in Greece and abroad, you're ready for Deloitte!



#WhatWeOffer

At Deloitte, we know that great people make a great organization. We value our people and offer employees a broad range of benefits:

🏠 Modern hybrid workplace, characterized by flexibility and Smart Working
⚖ Empowered well-being: We provide multiple program offerings to support your well-being needs (flexible working arrangements, extra days of leave, parental allowances) 
🌍 Engagement within international large-scale teams and projects, with opportunities to travel for training or client purposes. 
📚 Constant opportunities for learning with unlimited access to internal and external learning platforms and sponsored certificates aligned with business needs and technology trends 
🚀 Challenging and innovating environment where personal development and growth are encouraged, always with transparency and trust 
? Diverse culture and active communities that enable you to bring yourself to work  
🎉 Team Building and Corporate Social Responsibility Activities
🏃 A buddy to support you with your onboarding
🌴 Extra days of annual leave
⚕ Private medical health insurance plan 
💳 Ticket restaurant card 
? Exclusive Discounts to several retail providers, restaurants and others 
📱  Mobile phone 
🍏 Fresh fruits and unlimited coffee everyday at our offices  


Please note that all well-being benefits mentioned above are subject to annual review.

#YourServiceLine

Strategy, Risk & Transactions (SR&T) Advisory
Strategy, Risk & Transactions (SR&T) is an end-to-end strategic advisory practice, enabling our C-suite clients to make informed, robust decisions and strategic choices. It integrates the full scale of Deloitte's M&A capabilities, consolidates Climate & Sustainability advisory capabilities, and tightens the connection between strategy development and risk management to assist clients with navigating uncertainty and change.



About Deloitte
 

#OurServices
Deloitte offers integrated services that include Audit & Assurance, Technology & Transformation, Strategy Risk & Transactions Advisory, Tax and Legal. Our approach combines insight and innovation from multiple disciplines with global business and industry expertise to help our clients excel anywhere in the world. We deliver outstanding impact on the reputation and success of our clients, in Italy and globally. In pursuing this we contribute to a sustainable and prosperous society, and are firm believers in the positive impact business can and should have on the world it operates within.
 
#OurPurpose
We are led by a purpose, to make an impact that matters with clients, people and society. This purpose defines who we are and what we stand for. It's not about being the biggest. It’s about being the first choice for the largest and most influential clients, and the first choice for the best talent.
 
#OurValues
At Deloitte we foster a collaborative culture where talented individuals can produce their best work. We value innovative thinking, diverse insights and a genuinely distinctive level of customer service through our expertise and professionalism. We value difference, with respect at the heart of our inclusive culture.
 
#OurTalentExperience
From day one at our firm, practitioners are part of a community. Our development and career progression framework will help them develop the skills and capabilities to succeed. The wellness of our people and the ability to offer agile working arrangements is at the center of our unique talent experience. We create a workplace that encourages collaboration, creativity, inclusiveness to ensure our staff are supported, encouraged and feel a sense of purpose and meaning in what they do each day.




Sounds like the sort of role for you? Apply now. 

Location: Thessaloniki

YOUR ROLE

 Lo Studio Tributario e Societario, Società tra Professionisti dedicata alla consulenza ed assistenza fiscale ad imprese e gruppi italiani ed internazionali, facente parte del network Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu, ricerca per la sede di Bologna figure professionali da inserire nel team dei professionisti dedicati ad attività prevalentemente di compliance, finalizzate alla verifica della situazione catastale degli immobili e delle relative imposte comunali.

Tale attività sarà condotta sotto la supervisione e il coordinamento di professionisti esperti e con l’ausilio di apposite banche dati.

In particolare, vogliamo incontrare:

-      giovani laureati in ingegneria e/o architettura;

-      ingegneri e/o architetti con 1/2 anni di esperienza maturata principalmente in ambito catastale che abbiano una forte attitudine per il lavoro in team;

-      geometri con almeno 2/3 anni di esperienza maturata principalmente in ambito catastale che abbiano una forte attitudine per il lavoro in team.

WINNING REQUIREMENTS

 Sei il talento che cerchiamo se hai le seguenti caratteristiche:

-      Diploma di geometra o laurea triennale e/o specialistica in ingegneria e/o architettura;

-      Iscrizione negli appositi albi di appartenenza (ingegneri, architetti, geometri);

-      Disponibilità professionale esclusiva;

-      Conoscenza del pacchetto Microsoft Office;

-      Disponibilità di connessione internet adeguata per lo svolgimento dell’attività in modalità remoto;

-      Disponibilità ad effettuare trasferte nell’ambito del territorio nazionale;

-      Motivazione, determinazione e propensione al team working.

 Completano il profilo buone capacità comunicative e relazionali, autonomia organizzativa, intraprendenza, flessibilità e dinamicità, attitudine e motivazione verso il settore della consulenza.

title: Junior- Forensic- Nexthub
description_html:
Junior – Forensic - NextHub 

Stiamo cercando una figura junior da inserire nel team di Forensic di Deloitte NextHub nella sede di Bari, che lavorerà in modalità Hybrid. Il team di Bari, nato meno di due anni fa e in rapida crescita, opera in sinergia con i team leader di Milano e Roma, offrendo un supporto qualificato e strategico nelle attività di progetto. 

La function del Forensic si occupa di fornire supporto ai propri Clienti nell’ambito di contenziosi, procedimenti (penali, civili, arbitrali) nonché potenziali eventi di financial crime che possono essere realizzati da soggetti interni o esterni alla società o banca (o istituzioni finanziarie).   
In tale contesto, il team di Bari contribuisce attivamente a tutti i progetti, con attività di due diligence reputazionale e finanziaria su terze parti, svolgimento di analisi e ricostruzioni economico-contabili e finanziarie anche tramite l’utilizzo di specifici tool di Digital. 

Your Role 

La risorsa Junior sarà inserita in un team di lavoro dinamico e collaborativo, affiancando colleghi senior e occupandosi di: 

  • Attività di business intelligence e compliance volte a identificare potenziali rischi di integrità reputazionale di soggetti terzi; 
  • Fornire supporto nello svolgimento di attività di eDiscovery conducendo, tramite l’effettuazione di ricerche mirate sulla base di keywords, analisi e/o review di documenti ed e-mail presenti su dispositivi e/o server aziendali acquisiti; 
  • Consulenza e assistenza nella ricostruzione di transazioni e analisi di natura documentale, procedurale, contabile e bilancistica, di accadimenti aziendali complessi nonché ai fini della prevenzione degli stessi; 
  • Condurre attività preventive di Risk Assessment e Gap Analysis . 

 Winning Requirements 

  • Laurea specialistica in materie economiche; skills in ambito finanza e contabilità e nonché interesse verso temi di legislazione d'impresa; 
  • Ottima conoscenza della lingua inglese sia scritta che parlata; 
  • Disponibilità a trasferte in Italia e all’estero; 
  • Elevata attitudine a lavorare sia autonomamente che in team, capacità di multitasking e problem solving, proattività, gestione dello stress; 
  • Esperienza di stage/tesi di laurea su tematiche Forensic, Fraud & Investigation (nice to have); 
  • Frequentato corsi in materia Open Source Intelligence - OSINT (nice to have).

WorldImpact è il nostro programma globale che riunisce tutte le iniziative attraverso cui vogliamo avere un impatto positivo sulle persone, i clienti, l’ambiente e le comunità in cui operiamo. La gestione riguarda tutte le fasi di gara dalla predisposizione dell’offerta, alla comprova requisiti, giustificazione offerte anomale e stipula contratto

  • Gestire degli adempimenti per l’accreditamento agli albi fornitori
  • Utilizzare di piattaforme e-procurement (Bravosolution, Sintel, Ariba, ecc.) ai fini della partecipazione alle gare, ricezione RDO, iscrizione agli albi

Winning Requirements


  • 2 o 3 anni di esperienza in Uffici Gare che servono più società di gruppi multinazionali operanti nei settori servizi o lavori
  • Preferibile la laurea in discipline giuridiche o economiche
  • Esperienza nella gestione degli aspetti amministrativi di gare caratterizzate da elementi di elevata complessità, quali importi elevati, partecipazione in RTI, ricorso all’avvalimento, coinvolgimento di società estere, fideiussione.

title: Junior Developer @ Thessaloniki
description_html:
What Impact will you make?

Junior Developer @ Thessaloniki, Patra, Ioannina & Crete

Are you looking for an opportunity in Thessaloniki, Patra, Ioannina or Crete, that offers you a hybrid working model?

Are you ready to work on international projects for industry-leading clients around the world and elevate your tech consulting career to an international level?

If so, check below for more info about this career opportunity!

You bring passion, we bring opportunities!

#YourOpportunity

Deloitte is a worldwide leader in Professional Services with a presence in more than 150 countries and territories. Since 2018, Deloitte has been operating its Competence Center in Thessaloniki with satellites in the cities of Patras, Heraklion, and Ioannina - which are model hubs of expertise, training, and innovation, specializing in cutting-edge exponential technologies, in which graduates and young professionals undergo immersive experiences, continuous learning, gaining practical insights and hands-on training that empower them to navigate the complexities of the digital landscape.


Deloitte is an ideal working environment for both young and senior professionals who want to take the next step in their careers, offering them a supportive and international working environment that leverages their expertise and potential. Its corporate culture is based on trust and collaboration and ensures diversity and inclusion so that everyone feels part of a great team.

#YourServiceLine: Technology & Transformation

Our Technology & Transformation teams empower organizations to navigate the future through technology-driven business transformation. Combining deep industry knowledge with cutting-edge technology, we deliver tailored solutions that drive innovation, enhance efficiency, promote cybersecurity, and foster sustainable growth.

#AboutYourTeam

Deloitte Salesforce professionals lead the technological development trend through cutting edge technologies, oriented to the Cloud environment.

We are looking for a Salesforce Full Stack Developer in Thessaloniki, Patra, Ioannina or Crete. You will have the chance to participate in important international projects, working on the Salesforce platform and its products. You will focus on implementing and delivering complex applications, carrying out actively and responsibly your project-related activities. Acting with progressively increasing autonomy within multi-functional teams, you will be responsible for the quality of your work and its alignment with the clients’ priorities, targets, and needs.

If you want to find out more and go further, within our Division, you will get a chance to express your potential while being supported by training and structured career paths.

 

For a full coverage of your role, you ought to be able to:

  • Customize and develop new technical functionalities on Salesforce platform, as well as to come up with solutions supporting the client’s goals.
  • Be able to produce solid and business-oriented functionalities, throughout tools and resources that will be made available to you, and the rest of the team.
  • Communicate your ideas and proposals in a clear, structured, and concise fashion.
  • Single out possible issues and come up with the ideal solutions and proposals related to the project and swiftly share them with the rest of the team.
  • Fruitfully cooperate with inter-functional and international teams. 
  • Be able to follow the workflow process in order to enable efficient development.
 

#OurRequierements

Key Qualifications

To qualify for the role, you must have:

  • Bachelor/master’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or in similar technical-scientific disciplines.
  • Knowledge of an Object-Oriented programming language
  • Knowledge of Web Frontend Development (JavaScript/HTML/CSS)
  • Knowledge of relational databases and query languages (e.g. SQL).
  • English proficiency.
  • Availability to travel, domestically and abroad.
  • Proactivity, genuine enthusiasm and curiosity, teamwork attitude.

Bonus Qualifications

  • Cloud Computing fundamentals.
  • Knowledge of CRM/Information Systems.
  • Experience in development frameworks (e.g. Node.js, Angular, React).
  • Communication Protocols such as HTTP, JSON, API, WS, SOAP, REST, XML.

The profile is rounded up by excellent analytical skills, precision, self-management capacities and a strong goal-oriented inclination.

 

#WhoWeAreLookingFor

Individuals who have a strong will to expand their knowledge of new technologies, a passion to grow within the company and aspirations for career growth. At Deloitte we foster a consultative culture because the best decisions are made in collaboration with others. We approach our work with a collaborative mindset, teaming across businesses, geographies, and skill sets to deliver tangible, measurable, attributable impact. These are not aspirations, but principles that we all commit to today and every day.

#WhatWeOffer

At Deloitte, we know that great people make a great organization. We value our people and offer employees a broad range of benefits:

🏠 Modern hybrid workplace, characterized by flexibility and Smart Working

⚖ Empowered well-being: We provide multiple program offerings to support your well-being needs (flexible working arrangements, extra days of leave, parental allowances)

🌍 Engagement within international large-scale teams and projects, with opportunities to travel for training or client purposes.

📚 Constant opportunities for learning with unlimited access to internal and external learning platforms and sponsored certificates aligned with business needs and technology trends

🚀 Challenging and innovating environment where personal development and growth are encouraged, always with transparency and trust

🌈 Diverse culture and active communities that enable you to bring yourself to work

🎉 Team Building and Corporate Social Responsibility Activities

🏃 A buddy to support you with your onboarding

🌴 Extra days of annual leave

⚕️Private medical health insurance plan

💳 Ticket restaurant card

🏷️Exclusive Discounts to several retail providers, restaurants, and others

📱 Mobile phone

What Impact will you make?


Junior Cyber & Technology Compliance Consultant @ Deloitte Competence Center

Are you looking for an opportunity in Thessaloniki that offers you a hybrid working model?

Are you ready to work on international projects for industry-leading clients around the world and elevate your tech consulting career to an international level?

If so, check below for more info about this career opportunity!

You bring passion, we bring opportunities!

#YourOpportunity 

Deloitte is a worldwide leader in Professional Services with a presence in more than 150 countries and territories. Since 2018, Deloitte has been operating its Competence Center in Thessaloniki with satellites in the cities of Patras, Heraklion, and Ioannina - which are model hubs of expertise, training, and innovation, specializing in cutting-edge exponential technologies, in which graduates and young professionals undergo immersive experiences, continuous learning, gaining practical insights and hands-on training that empower them to navigate the complexities of the digital landscape. 

Deloitte is an ideal working environment for both young and senior professionals who want to take the next step in their careers, offering them a supportive and international working environment that leverages their expertise and potential. Its corporate culture is based on trust and collaboration and ensures diversity and inclusion so that everyone feels part of a great team. 

We are currently seeking for ambitious team players to become part of our IT Compliance team within our Technology & Transformation department in Thessaloniki.



#YourServiceLine: Technology & Transformation

Our Technology & Transformation teams empower organizations to navigate the future through technology-driven business transformation. Combining deep industry knowledge with cutting-edge technology, we deliver tailored solutions that drive innovation, enhance efficiency, promote cybersecurity, and foster sustainable growth.


#Would you like to learn more AboutYourTeam

Our IT Compliance Team sits within Technology & Transformation, one of the fastest growing practices in Deloitte.

As a team member of our IT Compliance Team, you ‘ll be responsible to ensure that data protection risks and internal compliance requirements are addressed within Deloitte’s Global Technology Operating Model process. You will be providing expert advice on cyber critical areas such as information protection, secure systems development life cycle, third party security management, cyber risk management and applying project management skills to ensure that newly acquired or developed IT assets are introduced to Deloitte’s IT environment in a secure manner, compliant with Deloitte’s policy framework.

Below you can find some daily tasks of your potential role:

  • Support of the security review and risk assessment of IT assets process for Deloitte’s Greek, Italian and Maltese offices
  • Ensure adherence to policies, procedures, work instructions related to regulatory, quality and technology compliance requirements.
  • Communication with Deloitte’s IT, Cyber and Business stakeholders such as Business Relationship Managers, IT Risk & Compliance Officer, Cyber / Infrastructure / Applications / IT Procurement Leads
  • Coordination of risk assessment and management activities for IT third party (vendor) products and services
  • Support of Deloitte’s Secure Systems Development Life Cycle (SSDLC) process
  • Monitoring of security and compliance activities in project management for IT assets’ implementation
  • Prepare regulatory & internal process compliance documents or reviewing relevant material for completeness and accuracy.
  • Design compliance controls and develop reporting dashboards
  • Report to the IT Risk & Compliance Manager

#OurRequirements

  • Strong understanding of IT controls and cybersecurity requirements
  • Influencing and communication skills with the ability to engage and collaborate with technical and non-technical senior stakeholders in a dynamic environment.  
  • Familiarization with various technologies and platforms including Cloud environments, Operating Systems, Databases, Network Infrastructure
  • Proven experience effectively prioritizing workload to meet deadlines and work objectives
  • Ability to operate and understand excellent project and program management disciplines including production of project plans and key quality program deliverables 
  • Ability to work in geographically dispersed virtual teams
  • Very Good command of written and spoken English 
  • Excellent knowledge in MS office applications especially in PowerPoint, Word and Excel and must possess good report building and presentation skills 
  • Analytical thought, strong problem solving and communication skills
  • Commitment to teamwork and ability to demonstrate strong interpersonal relationships
  • Ability to maintain professionalism and strive for high ethical standards at all times

Key Qualifications

  • University degree in Information Technology, Computer Science or Information Security
  • 0-2 years of experience in cybersecurity, IT compliance or risk management fields

Bonus Qualifications

·       Professional certifications (partially completed or completed) like CISSP, CISM, ISO 27001 Lead Auditor or Implementer, CISA, will be considered a plus



If you're ready to take your career to the next level in a challenging international environment, focusing on continuous learning and dynamic teamwork, both in Greece and abroad, you're ready for Deloitte!

#WhatWeOffer

At Deloitte, we know that great people make a great organization. We value our people and offer employees a broad range of benefits:

🏠 Modern hybrid workplace, characterized by flexibility and Smart Working

⚖ Empowered well-being: We provide multiple program offerings to support your well-being needs (flexible working arrangements, extra days of leave, parental allowances) 

🌍 Engagement within international large-scale teams and projects, with opportunities to travel for training or client purposes. 

📚 Constant opportunities for learning with unlimited access to internal and external learning platforms and sponsored certificates aligned with business needs and technology trends 

🚀 Challenging and innovating environment where personal development and growth are encouraged, always with transparency and trust 

? Diverse culture and active communities that enable you to bring yourself to work  

🎉 Team Building and Corporate Social Responsibility Activities
🏃 A buddy to support you with your onboarding
🌴 Extra days of annual leave

⚕ Private medical health insurance plan 

💳 Ticket restaurant card 

? Exclusive Discounts to several retail providers, restaurants and others 

📱  Mobile phone 

🍏 Fresh fruits and unlimited coffee everyday at our offices  


Please note that all the well-being benefits mentioned above are subject to annual review


About Deloitte
 
#OurServices
Deloitte offers integrated services that include Audit, Technology & Transformation, Strategy Risk & Transactions Advisory, Tax and Legal. Our approach combines insight and innovation from multiple disciplines with global business and industry expertise to help our clients excel anywhere in the world. We deliver outstanding impact on the reputation and success of our clients, in Italy and globally. In pursuing this we contribute to a sustainable and prosperous society, and are firm believers in the positive impact business can and should have on the world it operates within.
 
#OurPurpose
We are led by a purpose, to make an impact that matters with clients, people and society. This purpose defines who we are and what we stand for. It's not about being the biggest. It’s about being the first choice for the largest and most influential clients, and the first choice for the best talent.
 
#OurValues
At Deloitte we foster a collaborative culture where talented individuals can produce their best work. We value innovative thinking, diverse insights and a genuinely distinctive level of customer service through our expertise and professionalism. We value difference, with respect at the heart of our inclusive culture.
 
#OurTalentExperience
From day one at our firm, practitioners are part of a community. Our development and career progression framework will help them develop the skills and capabilities to succeed. The wellness of our people and the ability to offer agile working arrangements is at the center of our unique talent experience. We create a workplace that encourages collaboration, creativity, inclusiveness to ensure our staff are supported, encouraged and feel a sense of purpose and meaning in what they do each day.

Sounds like the sort of role for you? Apply now. 

Location: Thessaloniki

We are currently seeking for ambitious team players to become part of our dynamic Cyber Security team within our Technology & Transformation department in Thessaloniki.


#YourServiceLine: Technology & Transformation

Our Technology & Transformation teams empower organizations to navigate the future through technology-driven business transformation. Combining deep industry knowledge with cutting-edge technology, we deliver tailored solutions that drive innovation, enhance efficiency, promote cybersecurity, and foster sustainable growth.


#AboutYourRole
As a Consultant in our Technology and Transformation department, you will play a pivotal role in supporting our clients in identifying, assessing, and managing risks that may impact their business objectives. This role offers a unique opportunity to work on diverse projects, collaborating with cross-functional teams and leveraging your expertise to deliver value-added insights.

In your role as Cyber Risk & Compliance Consultant, will be focused on proactive and responsible execution of project tasks, supporting the senior team members in Cyber Risk & Compliance activities. As a Cyber Risk & Compliance Consultant, you’ll work on exciting projects, collaborate with top professionals in the field, and shape the future of cybersecurity strategies for organizations across industries.

As part of your role, under the coordination of Managers and more expert colleagues, you will be required to contribute to the design and implementation of cyber security solutions, through:

  • Develop and implement comprehensive cybersecurity strategies tailored to client needs.

  • Conduct cybersecurity assessments and risk analysis to identify vulnerabilities, recommend improvements and propose mitigating measures.

  • Ensure that security practices are aligned with applicable regulations and industry standards (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA, ISO 27001, DORA, NIS2, NIST) to fulfill legal and compliance obligations.

  • Develop clear procedures for detecting, responding to, and recovering from security incidents to reduce potential downtime, minimize damages and ensure smooth operations.

  • Collaborate with the client executives, business leaders, and IT teams to understand business objectives and align the cybersecurity strategy with the organizational goals. Clearly and effectively communicate complex cybersecurity concepts to non-technical stakeholders.

  • Ensure the existence of robust security protocols to ensure sensitive data's confidentiality, integrity, and availability.

  • Work with other Deloitte teams to deliver complete cybersecurity solutions that meet the business requirements.

  • Stay ahead of emerging cybersecurity trends, technologies, and frameworks to keep clients secure.

#OurRequirements

We’re looking for motivated and passionate professionals to join our Cyber Risk & Compliance team. Whether you’re just starting your career or bring years of experience, we welcome individuals who are eager to make a meaningful impact in the ever-evolving field of cybersecurity. Are you looking for an opportunity in Thessaloniki that offers you a hybrid working model?

Are you ready to work on large scale projects for industry-leading clients around the world and elevate your career to an international level?

If so, check below for more info about this career opportunity!

You bring passion, we bring opportunities!

#YourOpportunity 

At Deloitte, the spirit of excellence is part of our DNA. We strive to hire the brightest minds from all around the globe, allowing us to excel in both long-term strategic thinking and business improvement implementation as the undisputed global leader in professional services. We are committed to delivering impacting results for diverse private and public organization clients, linking our peerless talent in audit with unrivaled opportunities for impact – committing ourselves to sustainable growth and investment in our employees’ development and inclusion along the way.

Since 2018, Deloitte has been operating its Competence Center in Thessaloniki with satellites in the cities of Patras, Heraklion, and Ioannina - which are model hubs of expertise, training, and innovation, specializing in cutting-edge exponential technologies, in which graduates and young professionals undergo immersive experiences, continuous learning, gaining practical insights and hands-on training that empower them to navigate the complexities of the digital landscape.

Deloitte is an ideal working environment for both young and senior professionals who want to take the next step in their careers, offering them a supportive and international working environment that leverages their expertise and potential. Its corporate culture is based on trust and collaboration and ensures diversity and inclusion so that everyone feels part of a great team.

#YourServiceLine 

Tax & Legal  

As global forces fundamentally shift how the tax function operates, tax leaders must become strategic advisors. We collaborate closely with our clients, connecting them to expertise, capabilities, technology, and innovative ideas that enhance agility, enabling them to lead their businesses through complexity with confidence. KBVL, member of the Deloitte Legal international network, is an independent law firm registered with the Athens Bar, that offers legal services aligned with clients’ key business objectives.

#AboutYourTeam

We are revolutionizing the tax and legal industries by orchestrating autonomous agents and intelligent AI assistants. Our mission is to enhance operational efficiency across the Deloitte Central Mediterranean (DCM) region including Greece, Italy, and Malta by building production-ready Generative AI solutions that solve complex regulatory challenges.

#AboutYourRole

We are seeking a Junior up to Mid-Level AI Engineer to join our Thessaloniki hub. You will go beyond standard coding to architect multi-agent systems and scalable backends using Python and modern AI orchestration frameworks. You will be contributing in the full LLMOps lifecycle, ensuring our AI applications are robust, secure, and context-aware.

#KeyResponsibilities

  • Design and implement agentic workflows using LangChain, LangGraph, or similar frameworks.
  • Build high-performance APIs and microservices using FastAPI, Flask, or Django.
  • Utilize the Model Context Protocol (MCP) and advanced RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) to connect LLMs with specialized data.
  • Manage containerized environments via Docker and maintain high-standard DevOps/LLMOps practices.
  • Partner with Data Scientists and cross-functional teams to bridge the gap between AI research and production-grade software.

#RequiredSkills

  • Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Electrical & Computer Engineering, or a related field.
  • Strong proficiency in Python (asynchronous programming is a plus).
  • Hands-on experience with FastAPI, Flask, or Django.
  • Solid understanding of HTML5, CSS3, and modern JavaScript (ES6+).
  • Solid understanding of Docker, Git version control, and RESTful API design.
  • A production-first approach, focusing on building maintainable, scalable, and reliable codebases.

#PreferredSkills

  • Previous experience implementing RAG pipelines, vector databases, or agentic tool-use.
  • Familiarity with LangChain, LlamaIndex, or the MCP standard.
  • Experience with React, Angular, or Vue.js and modern styling tools like Tailwind CSS.
  • Active GitHub profile showcasing AI-driven projects or open-source contributions.

#WhatWeOffer

🏠 Modern hybrid workplace, characterized by flexibility and Smart Working

⚖ Empowered well-being: We provide multiple program offerings to support your well-being needs (flexible working arrangements, extra days of leave, parental allowances)

🌍 Engagement within international large-scale teams and projects, with opportunities to travel for training or client purposes.

📚 Constant opportunities for learning with unlimited access to internal and external learning platforms and sponsored certificates aligned with business needs and technology trends

🚀 Challenging and innovating environment where personal development and growth are encouraged, always with transparency and trust

? Diverse culture and active communities that enable you to bring yourself to work

🏃 A buddy to support you with your onboarding

⚕ Private medical health insurance plan

💳 Ticket restaurant card

📱 Mobile phone

🍏 Fresh fruits and unlimited coffee everyday at our offices

*Please note that all the well-being benefits mentioned above are subject to annual review

Our approach combines insight and innovation from multiple disciplines with global business and industry expertise to help our clients excel anywhere in the world. We deliver outstanding impact on the reputation and success of our clients, in Italy and globally. In pursuing this we contribute to a sustainable and prosperous society, and are firm believers in the positive impact business can and should have on the world it operates within.

#AboutYourTeam

Our Cloud Native Development & Migration practices support our customers, in various projects, in understanding and adopting the most advanced technological solutions, identifying and implementing cloud architectures to support the development and deployment of cloud-native solutions.

Through our services, we help our customers to create safe and reliable innovations that guarantee a real competitive advantage in the market:

  • Cloud-native Platform Implementation: We specialize in deploying agile applications across software development, integration, and testing realms, fostering innovation and efficiency.

  • Advanced Technological Architectures: Our expertise lies in designing architectures that seamlessly integrate modern Cloud applications with enterprise systems, ensuring compatibility and scalability.



#OurRequirements

Key Qualifications

  • Own a degree from a University or Technological Educational Institution in Informatics, Computer Science, Software Engineering or similar technical course of study
  • Passion for developing with programing languages such as: Java, JavaScript, Python or any other object-oriented programming language
  • Fundamental knowledge of relational databases and SQL.
  • Basic understanding of Cloud Computing concepts
  • Good command of the English Language
  • Ability and willingness to work in a team, but also autonomously if necessary
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
  • High motivation for consulting field
  • Availability to travel (when needed based on business needs)

  • Familiarity and use of any VCS (e.g., git)
  • Exposure to any major public cloud platform (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP)
  • Experience with Docker and Kubernetes
  • Background in any web development framework (e.g., Spring, Express, Django, React, Angular)

Individuals who have a strong will to expand their knowledge of new technologies, a passion to grow within the company and aspirations for career growth. At Deloitte we foster a consultative culture because the best decisions are made in collaboration with others. We approach our work with a collaborative mindset, teaming across businesses, geographies, and skill sets to deliver tangible, measurable, attributable impact. These are not aspirations, but principles that we all commit to today and every day.

🌍 Engagement within international large-scale teams and projects, with opportunities to travel for training or client purposes.

Deloitte offers integrated services that include Audit & Assurance, Tax and Legal, Strategy-Risk & Transactions Advisory, and Technology & Transformation. Our approach combines insight and innovation from multiple disciplines with global business and industry expertise to help our clients excel anywhere in the world. We deliver outstanding impact on the reputation and success of our clients, in Italy and globally. In pursuing this we contribute to a sustainable and prosperous society, and are firm believers in the positive impact business can and should have on the world it operates within.


#OurPurpose

We are led by a purpose, to make an impact that matters with clients, people and society. This purpose defines who we are and what we stand for. It's not about being the biggest. From day one at our firm, practitioners are part of a community. Our development and career progression framework will help them develop the skills and capabilities to succeed. The wellness of our people and the ability to offer agile working arrangements is at the center of our unique talent experience. We create a workplace that encourages collaboration, creativity, inclusiveness to ensure our staff are supported, encouraged and feel a sense of purpose and meaning in what they do each day.

Junior Gen AI & Prompt Engineer @ Deloitte Competence Center

Are you looking for an opportunity in Thessaloniki, that offers you a hybrid working model?

If so, check below for more info about this career opportunity!

You bring passion, we bring opportunities!


#YourOpportunity

Deloitte is an ideal working environment for both young and senior professionals who want to take the next step in their careers, offering them a supportive and international working environment that leverages their expertise and potential. Its corporate culture is based on trust and collaboration and ensures diversity and inclusion so that everyone feels part of a great team.




#YourServiceLine

Technology & Transformation​

Our Technology & Transformation teams empower organizations to navigate the future through technology-driven business transformation. Combining deep industry knowledge with cutting-edge technology, we deliver tailored solutions that drive innovation, enhance efficiency, promote cybersecurity, and foster sustainable growth.​


#AboutYourTeam

Our Cloud Strategy and architecture practices supports our customers in various projects, enabling them to understand and adopt the most advanced Generative AI solutions. We specialize in identifying and implementing AI-driven architectures that support the development and deployment of intelligent, cloud-native applications.

Through our services, we help our customers to create safe and reliable innovations that guarantee a real competitive advantage in the market:


  • GenAI-Native Platform Implementation: We specialize in deploying GenAI-powered applications across software development, integration, and testing, enabling organizations to accelerate the adoption of Generative AI solutions while ensuring robustness, security, and scalability.
  • Accelerated AI Capabilities: Our services drive the rapid adoption of Generative AI by integrating advanced AI models into enterprise environments, unlocking new opportunities for automation, content generation, knowledge management, and enhanced decision-making.
  • Advanced AI Architectures: Our expertise lies in designing architectures that seamlessly integrate Generative AI models with enterprise systems, enabling a secure, scalable, and compliant AI ecosystem that maximizes business value.


#OurRequirements

Key Qualifications

  • Own a degree from a University or Technological Educational Institution in Informatics, Computer Science, Software Engineering or similar technical course of study.
  • Basic experience with Large Language Models (LLMs) and Generative AI architectures for tasks such as text generation, summarization, translation, and code generation.
  • Understanding of prompt engineering techniques.
  • Familiarity with integrating Generative AI models into applications using LangChain, LlamaIndex, or similar tools.
  • Understanding of embedding models and vector databases for knowledge retrieval and context enhancement.
  • Proficiency in Python for AI-related development, scripting, and automation.


Bonus Qualifications

  • Knowledge of cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) and AI model deployment strategies.
  • Experience with LLM APIs (e.g., OpenAI, Anthropic) and using pre-trained AI models for real-world applications.
  • Experience with Django and FastAPI for developing backend services and APIs for AI-powered applications.
  • Familiarity with React.js for building interactive front-end interfaces for AI-driven applications.
  • Eagerness to learn and experiment with new AI techniques, models, and frameworks to improve generative AI capabilities.

Individuals who have a strong will to expand their knowledge of new technologies, a passion to grow within the company and aspirations for career growth.   • Empowered well-being: We provide multiple program offerings to support your well-being needs (flexible working arrangements, extra days of leave, parental allowances)
  • Engagement within international large-scale teams and projects, with opportunities to travel for training or client purposes.
  • Constant opportunities for learning with unlimited access to internal and external learning platforms and sponsored certificates aligned with business needs and technology trends
  • Challenging and innovating environment where personal development and growth are encouraged, always with transparency and trust
  • Diverse culture and active communities that enable you to bring yourself to work
  • Team Building and Corporate Social Responsibility Activities
  • A buddy to support you with your onboarding
  • Private medical health insurance plan
  • Ticket restaurant card
  • Exclusive Discounts to several retail providers, restaurants and others
  • Mobile phone
  • Fresh fruits and unlimited coffee every day at our offices

Please note that all the well-being benefits mentioned above are subject to annual review

#OurServices

Deloitte offers integrated services that include Audit & Assurance, Tax and Legal, Strategy-Risk & Transactions Advisory, and Technology & Transformation. title: Junior – Cloud Developer - NextHub Bari
description_html:
Junior – Cloud Developer – NextHub Bari 

Stiamo cercando una figura junior da inserire nel team Platform Development & Integration di Deloitte NextHub nella sede di Bari, che lavorerà in modalità Hybrid.    

Il team di Platform Development & Integration fornisce supporto al cliente nel dare risposte ad esigenze di business in termini di definizione delle soluzioni architetturali e sviluppo di applicativi Cloud Native. Opera in maniera agnostica sui principali Cloud provider, sui diversi modelli IaaS, PaaS, FaaS, SaaS, CaaS, sui principali paradigmi cloud (DevOps, CI/CD, Container).    

 Your Role   

La risorsa Junior sarà inserita in un team di lavoro, affiancando colleghi senior e occupandosi di:   

  • Supportare i clienti nella definizione della Cloud strategy, nel disegno dell’architettura target, nella migrazione dei workload in Cloud, nello sviluppo di applicazioni moderne e Cloud native, fino alla governance delle soluzioni Cloud implementate 
  • Raccogliere e analizzare i requisiti ed i dati a supporto dell’elaborazione di soluzioni per i clienti  
  • Possedere un forte orientamento al team working, alla collaborazione e al supporto dei colleghi, mantenendo sempre un approccio positivo alle situazioni  

Winning Requirements   

  • Laurea triennale/specialistica in Informatica, Ingegneria Informatica o discipline tecnico/scientifiche affini  
  • Conoscenza di almeno un DB SQL e/o NoSQL, della programmazione ad oggetti, sviluppo di soluzioni con architettura RESTful e conoscenza di almeno un linguaggio di programmazione (ad es. C#, Javascript, Python o Java)   
  • Gradita la conoscenza di piattaforme cloud come AWS, Azure e GCP  
  • Buona conoscenza, scritta e parlata, della lingua inglese  
  • Disponibilità a trasferte

title: Transfer Pricing Advisor – Padova
description_html:
YOUR ROLE

Vuoi intraprendere la Professione di Dottore Commercialista e dedicarti alla consulenza economica, fiscale e societaria connessa ai prezzi di trasferimento infragruppo? Lo Studio Tributario e Societario Deloitte è alla ricerca, per la sede di Padova, di neolaureati o giovani professionisti con background economico e tributario da inserire all’interno della Service Line Transfer Pricing (TP).

 

Avrai l’opportunità di maturare, oltre alle competenze tipiche della professione, spiccate esperienze in ambito aziendalistico e analitico quantitativo e ti occuperai in particolare di:

·       svolgere analisi economiche e finanziarie di bilancio, nonché analisi di mercato (anche tramite softwares e database di ricerca);

·       effettuare analisi funzionali, della Value Chain e dellaSupply Chain e valutazione di Intangible Assets;

·       effettuare studi di comparabilità per determinare la corretta remunerazione da applicare nelle transazioni infragruppo;

·       predisporre Report in conformità con le normative nazionali e le OECD Guidelines, Masterfile e Country Files / Transfer Pricing Policy;

·       partecipare a progetti multidisciplinari nell’ambito di procedure con le Autorità Finanziarie quali verifiche fiscali, Mutual Agreement Procedure e Advance Pricing Agreement;

·       svolgere analisi relative a complesse operazioni di Business Restructuring.

Grazie all’attività consulenziale ed alla formazione continua interna allo Studio (corso di formazione per i neoentrati, meeting di aggiornamento periodici, possibilità di collaborare ad attività pubblicistiche, corsi di inglese, corsi di materie digitali e STEM, etc) avrai modo di sviluppare ottime competenze pratiche e teoriche, il tutto all’interno di una primaria realtà riconosciuta a livello Globale come sinonimo di eccezionale qualità, che mette al centro della propria attività la diversità e l’inclusione delle persone.

About Transfer Pricing

I professionisti Transfer Pricing, tutti specialisti dedicati alla materia sotto il profilo tributario, giuridico od economico-aziendale, sono in grado di assistere le imprese multinazionali ad affrontare e risolvere qualunque problematica fiscale connessa ai prezzi di trasferimento infragruppo: dall’analisi e riorganizzazione della “catena del valore”, al “disegno” di più efficienti “politiche di prezzo”, alla documentazione delle transazioni tra entità consociate, in ottemperanza alle normative vigenti nelle diverse giurisdizioni ed all’assistenza nei rapporti con le autorità fiscali.

WINNING REQUIREMENTS

Ti sarà affidato un ruolo proattivo e di crescente responsabilità negli incarichi e progetti in cui sarai coinvolt*, costantemente supportat* all’interno dei Team di lavoro da associate e senior esperti in materia, coordinati da partner Deloitte.

Sei il profilo che cerchiamo se hai le seguenti caratteristiche:

•                Background economico e tributario

•                Laureand* in corsi di laurea in Economia (LM-77 LM-56);

•                Neolaureat* in Economia o con minima esperienza maturata in Studi Professionali;

•                Ottima conoscenza della lingua inglese;

•                Conoscenza di applicazioni standard (Microsoft Excel, Word, Power Point, Outlook);

•                Motivazione, determinazione e propensione al team working;

•                Predisposizione al problem solving.

Cerchiamo persone motivate, appassionate alle materie tributarie e contabili, che vogliano intraprendere un percorso trasversale e multidisciplinare di crescita professionale che li conduca ad acquisire le competenze tecniche e personali necessarie sia per l’abilitazione e l’esercizio della Professione di Dottore Commercialista sia per un soddisfacente percorso di carriera nell'ambito della consulenza fiscale di nuova generazione.

ABOUT STUDIO TRIBUTARIO E SOCIETARIO

 

Lo Studio Tributario e Societario, Società tra Professionisti dedicata alla consulenza ed assistenza fiscale ad imprese e gruppi italiani ed internazionali, facente parte del network Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu, è presente in Italia con sedi a Milano, Roma, Firenze, Torino, Genova, Bologna, Padova, Napoli e Catania. Lo Studio offre consulenza ed assistenza fiscale e tributaria nei diversi settori di specializzazione con scrupolosa attenzione agli aspetti tecnici, forte impegno verso la qualità e continuo riferimento alle esigenze del cliente.

MAKE AN IMPACT THAT MATTERS

Deloitte è un network leader nei servizi professionali alle imprese, presente in oltre 150 Paesi con 457 mila professionisti. Offriamo soluzioni innovative e sostenibili in Audit & Assurance, Consulting, Financial Advisory, Risk Advisory, Tax e Legal. Il nostro obiettivo è supportare le aziende nello sviluppo e nell'implementazione di strategie al passo con il mercato.

In Deloitte la sostenibilità è un tema centrale. Per questo, attraverso le strategie e le progettualità legate alle tematiche Environmental, Social e Governance (ESG), ci impegniamo a promuovere una crescita responsabile, sostenibile e inclusiva per il Pianeta, le nostre persone e la società. Scopri di più sulle nostre strategie di Corporate Sustainability, tra cui Well-being, la strategia volta a migliorare il benessere fisico, mentale e sociale delle nostre persone, affinché siano felici e piene di energia in tutti gli ambiti della loro vita e WorldClimate, la strategia globale di Deloitte per diventare un’organizzazione Net Zero e per guidare scelte responsabili all’interno e all’esterno dell’organizzazione. #LI-Hybrid

Sei pront* a #MakeAnImpactThatMatter insieme?  Candidati ora!

La ricerca rispetta il d.lgs. 198/2006, il D.lgs. 215/03 e il D.lgs. 216/03 ed è aperta a candidat* di qualsiasi orientamento o espressione di genere, orientamento sessuale, età, etnia e credo religioso. Il presente annuncio è stato ideato nel rispetto della diversity e dell’inclusività.

#DiscoveringDeloitte


At Deloitte, the spirit of the excellence is part of our DNA. We strive to hire the brightest minds from all around the globe, allowing us to excel in both long-term strategic thinking and business improvement implementation as the undisputed global leader in professional services.


Our culture is rooted in profound shared values. Our values guide us as we live our purpose to serve our clients with quality and distinction, inspire our people to work collaboratively to deliver value, actively contribute to society, and lead the profession by challenging ourselves to do what matters most. Deloitte’s values are what unite us across cultures and geographies, and ultimately help us earn the trust and respect of our people, clients, and society.


We believe that our differences enable us to #makeanimpactthatmatters.


#ChooseDeloitteIf:

  • You want to work with inspiring, ambitious, and supportive people with diverse geographical and academic backgrounds and extensive skills;
  • You get excitement by accomplishing tasks in a challenging, fast-paced environment;
  • You like to nurture people and share your knowledge with others.


#YourRole

Your role as a Technology Business Analysis Professional will focus on the delivery of client engagements, by understanding objectives for clients and Deloitte, aligning your own work to objectives and setting personal priorities, teaming with others across businesses and borders and taking accountability for own and team results. In this role, you will build relationships and exercise your communication skills to positively influence your peers and other stakeholders. You will commit to personal learning and development by actively seeking opportunities for growth, you will share knowledge and experience with others, and act as a strong brand ambassador, embracing our purpose and values in order to put these into practice in your professional life.


During your tenure as a Technology Business Analysis Professional, you will demonstrate and develop your ability to:

  • Engage with stakeholders to define requirements through workshops and meetings. Document business processes, user stories, and functional specifications;
  • Analyze business needs and translate them into clear, actionable specifications;
  • Design business solutions aligned with technical feasibility. Develop wireframes, prototype and acceptance criteria. Lead the design, development, and implementation of technology solutions, ensuring adherence to best practices;
  • Work cross - functionally with UX, Development and QA Teams. Communicate requirements clearly and ensure timely project delivery. Manage client expectations and foster strong client relationships;
  • Create and execute test plans, monitor defects, and coordinate User Acceptance Testing (UAT). Ensure system enhancements meet user needs and business goals;
  • Evaluate implemented solutions for efficiency. Identify opportunities for process optimization and guide ongoing system improvements;
  • Provide ongoing support and training to end - users on new systems and processes;

#WinningRequirements 

To qualify for the role, you must have:

  • A degree in Business Administration, Information Technology, Engineering, Mathematics, or a related field. A Master's degree in Business Administration or IT is a plus;
  • At least 3 years of experience in business analysis within Technology Projects preferably in Financial Services (Banking/Insurance), Energy, or Telecommunications;
  • Strong understanding of business process design, application, and systems (CRM, ERP, RPA, BPM);
  • Familiarity with Business Analysis methods and techniques (Design Thinking, UML, BPMN);
  • Experience with workflow, low - code tools, and bug tracking/test management tools is a plus;
  • Strong problem - solving, analytical, and organizational skills;
  • Experience in Project Management or Project Management Office (PMO) is an advantage. Familiarity with the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) and Agile methodologies is a plus;
  • Strong written and oral communication skills in Greek and English;
  • Ability to plan, prioritize, and manage tasks effectively to ensure timely project delivery;
  • Self - motivated, with a passion for continuous learning and development;
  • Fulfilled military obligations, where applicable.

#AboutTechnology & Transformation

Six core competency areas make up our Technology & Transformation service line:

  • Cyber;
  • Engineering, AI & Data;
  • Enterprise Technology & Performance;
  • Finance Transformation;
  • Deloitte Digital;
  • Human Capital.

We exist to solve complex problems

Our consultants are renowned for their straightforward approach to solving some of the world’s largest and most complex business challenges. Each member of our Technology & Transformation team is energized by the challenge a seemingly inscrutable problem presents. Our distinctiveness lies in our refusal to accept a problem at face value - we draw on the depth of our shared insight to ask the right questions, and it’s these questions that uncover answers - answers with impact.


We are committed to collaboration

Our role is to unlock potential for growth and innovation. We believe this requires real collaboration – with our own networks and with our clients. It’s why we commit to truly getting under the skin of our client’s needs, developing a full appreciation for their environment, goals and ambitions. We’re also unafraid to challenge. In so doing, we build long-term and trusted affinities.


We create long-term, sustainable impact

We often work hand-in-hand with our clients to help find the right solution and to help apply that solution. Our aim is to leave behind ambassadors who are equipped to continue the transformation we began. For us, it’s about embedding sustainable change, allowing the impact of our insight to be felt for a long time to come.


WHY DELOITTE

At Deloitte, we create positively differentiated work experiences that enable our people to feel valued and achieve their full potential. We value difference, and embrace people with diverse backgrounds and thinking styles. Knowing that people work best in different ways, we are happy to discuss alternative arrangements if the working pattern you are looking for is not specifically indicated.


ABOUT DELOITTE


Our services

Deloitte offers Global professional services that include Audit, Risk Advisory, Tax, Consulting and Financial Advisory. Our approach combines insight and innovation from multiple disciplines with global business and industry expertise to help our clients excel anywhere in the world.

We deliver outstanding impact on the reputation and success of our clients, in Greece and globally. In pursuing this we contribute to a sustainable and prosperous society, and are firm believers in the positive impact business can and should have on the world it operates within.


Our Purpose

Our purpose, “To make an impact that matters for our clients, our people and society “- defines who we are and what we stand for. This is not about size, it's about being the first choice. The first choice for the largest and most influential clients, and the first choice for the best talent.


Our values

At Deloitte we foster a collaborative culture where talented individuals can produce their best work. We value innovative thinking, diverse insights and a genuinely distinctive level of customer service. We value difference, with respect at the heart of our inclusive culture, and we support agile working arrangements.


Our talent experience

From day one at our firm, practitioners are part of a community. Our development and career progression framework will help them develop the skills and capabilities to succeed. The wellness of our people and the ability to offer agile working arrangements is at the centre of our unique talent experience. We create a workplace that encourages collaboration, creativity, inclusiveness to ensure our staff are supported, encouraged and feel a sense of purpose and meaning in what they do each day.


Sounds like the sort of role for you? Apply now.

description_html:
YOUR ROLE

    La Service Line Global Employer Services (GES) dello Studio Tributario e Societario Deloitte è alla ricerca di una figura da inserire come Global Mobility Specialist - Immigration Consultant presso la sede di Roma.

  La risorsa si occuperà di gestire le pratiche immigrative relative al trasferimento in Italia e/o all'estero di personale dirigenziale e/o altamente specializzato e di fornire la relativa consulenza in materia, ed in particolare:

   * Acquisizione delle informazioni necessarie per la richiesta e l'ottenimento della documentazione propedeutica all'ingresso e al soggiorno in Italia per motivi di lavoro o per altri motivi (Nulla Osta, Visto, Permesso di Soggiorno);

  * Comunicazione delle procedure atte alla realizzazione di quanto sopra in base alle normative vigenti in materia di immigrazione;

   * Redazione e compilazione della relativa modulistica;

   * Assistenza diretta al cliente nella gestione delle pratiche amministrative correlate alla tipologia di servizio (assistenza e supporto presso gli uffici pubblici).

 WINNING REQUIREMENTS

   * Esperienza di 2/3 anni nel medesimo ruolo;

   * Fluente conoscenza della lingua inglese, parlata e scritta;

   * Capacità di lavorare in team

   Completano il profilo: ottime capacità relazionali, buona organizzazione del lavoro e la predisposizione al problem solving.

   ABOUT STUDIO TRIBUTARIO E SOCIETARIO

   Lo Studio Tributario e Societario, Società tra Professionisti dedicata alla consulenza ed assistenza fiscale ad imprese e gruppi italiani ed internazionali, facente parte del network Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu, è presente in Italia con sedi a Milano, Roma, Firenze, Torino, Genova, Bologna, Padova, Napoli e Catania. Lo Studio offre consulenza ed assistenza fiscale e tributaria nei diversi settori di specializzazione con scrupolosa attenzione agli aspetti tecnici, forte impegno verso la qualità e continuo riferimento alle esigenze del cliente.

   MAKE AN IMPACT THAT MATTERS

    Deloitte è un network leader nei servizi professionali alle imprese, presente in oltre 150 Paesi con 457 mila professionisti. Offriamo soluzioni innovative e sostenibili in Audit & Assurance, Consulting, Financial Advisory, Risk Advisory, Tax e Legal. Il nostro obiettivo è supportare le aziende nello sviluppo e nell'implementazione di strategie al passo con il mercato.

    In Deloitte la sostenibilità è un tema centrale. Per questo, attraverso le strategie e le progettualità legate alle tematiche Environmental, Social e Governance (ESG), ci impegniamo a promuovere una crescita responsabile, sostenibile e inclusiva per il Pianeta, le nostre persone e la società. Scopri di più sulle nostre strategie di Corporate Sustainability, tra cui Well-being, la strategia volta a migliorare il benessere fisico, mentale e sociale delle nostre persone, affinché siano felici e piene di energia in tutti gli ambiti della loro vita e WorldClimate, la strategia globale di Deloitte per diventare un’organizzazione Net Zero e per guidare scelte responsabili all’interno e all’esterno dell’organizzazione.    #LI-Hybrid

    Sei pront* a #MakeAnImpactThatMatter insieme?  Candidati ora!

    La ricerca rispetta il d.lgs. 198/2006, il D.lgs. 215/03 e il D.lgs. 216/03 ed è aperta a candidat* di qualsiasi orientamento o espressione di genere, orientamento sessuale, età, etnia e credo religioso. Il presente annuncio è stato ideato nel rispetto della diversity e dell’inclusività.

Cyber Intelligence Center Security Analyst (Athens, Thessaloniki, Patras)


What Impact will you make?


#YourOpportunity


At Deloitte, the spirit of the excellence is part of our DNA. We strive to hire the brightest minds from all around the globe, allowing us to excel in both long-term strategic thinking and business improvement implementation as the undisputed global leader in professional services.
